title: Micron scale 3D imaging with a multi-camera array
author: Amey Chaware, Kevin C. Zhou, Vinayak Pathak, Clare B. Cook, Ramana Balla, Kanghyun Kim, Lucas Kreiss, Bryan Hilley, Julia McHugh, Praneeth Chakravarthula, Roarke Horstmeyer
summary: . We present a novel approach for capturing gigapixel-resolution micron-scale three-dimensional (3D) images of large complex macroscopic objects using a 9 × 6 multi-camera array paired with a custom 3D reconstruction algorithm. Our system overcomes inherent trade-offs among resolution, field of view (FOV), and depth of field (DOF) by capturing stereoscopic focal stacks across multiple perspectives, enabling an effective FOV of approximately 135 × 128 degrees and capturing surface depth maps at lateral resolutions less than 40 μ m and depth resolutions of about 0.5 mm. To achieve all-in-focus RGB (red, green, and blue) composites with precise depth, we employ a novel self-supervised neural network that integrates focus and stereo cues, resulting in highly accurate 3D reconstructions robust to variations in lighting and surface reflectance. We validate the proposed approach by scanning 3D objects, including those with known 3D geometries, and demonstrate sub-millimeter depth accuracy across a variety of scanned objects. This represents a powerful tool for digitizing large complex forms, allowing for near-microscopic details in both depth mapping and high-resolution image reconstruction.
title_cn: 使用多相机阵列进行微米级 3D 成像
abstract_cn: 。我们提出了一种新颖的方法，使用 9 × 6 多相机阵列与自定义 3D 重建算法配对，捕获大型复杂宏观物体的十亿像素分辨率微米级三维 (3D) 图像。我们的系统通过捕获多个视角的立体焦点堆栈，克服了分辨率、视场 (FOV) 和景深 (DOF) 之间固有的权衡，实现了约 135 × 128 度的有效 FOV，并以小于 40 μm 的横向分辨率和约 0.5 mm 的深度分辨率捕获表面深度图。为了实现具有精确深度的全焦点 RGB（红色、绿色和蓝色）合成图像，我们采用了一种新颖的自监督神经网络，该网络集成了焦点和立体线索，从而实现高度准确的 3D 重建，并且对光照和表面反射率的变化具有鲁棒性。我们通过扫描 3D 对象（包括具有已知 3D 几何形状的对象）来验证所提出的方法，并在各种扫描对象上展示亚毫米深度精度。这代表了一种用于数字化大型复杂形状的强大工具，可以在深度映射和高分辨率图像重建中实现近乎微观的细节。

title: Diffusion-driven lensless fiber endomicroscopic quantitative phase imaging toward digital pathology
author: Zhaoqing Chen, Jiawei Sun, Xibin Yang, Xinyi Ye, Bin Zhao, Xuelong Li, Juergen W. Czarske
summary: Lensless fiber endomicroscope is an emerging tool for in-vivo microscopic imaging, where quantitative phase imaging (QPI) can be utilized as a label-free method to enhance image contrast. However, existing single-shot phase reconstruction methods through lensless fiber endomicroscope typically perform well on simple images but struggle with complex microscopic structures. Here, we propose a speckle-conditioned diffusion model (SpecDiffusion), which reconstructs phase images directly from speckles captured at the detection side of a multi-core fiber (MCF). Unlike conventional neural networks, SpecDiffusion employs iterative phase denoising steps for speckle-driven phase reconstruction. The iteration scheme allows SpecDiffusion to break down the phase reconstruction process into multiple steps, gradually building up to the final phase image. This attribute alleviates the computation challenge at each step and enables the reconstruction of rich details in complex microscopic images. To validate its efficacy, we build an optical system to capture speckles from MCF and construct a dataset consisting of 100,000 paired images. SpecDiffusion provides high-fidelity phase reconstruction results and shows powerful generalization capacity for unseen objects, such as test charts and biological tissues, reducing the average mean absolute error of the reconstructed tissue images by 7 times. Furthermore, the reconstructed tissue images using SpecDiffusion shows higher accuracy in zero-shot cell segmentation tasks compared to the conventional method, demonstrating the potential for further cell morphology analysis through the learning-based lensless fiber endomicroscope. SpecDiffusion offers a precise and generalized method to phase reconstruction through scattering media, including MCFs, opening new perspective in lensless fiber endomicroscopic imaging.
title_cn: 面向数字病理学的扩散驱动无透镜光纤内窥镜定量相位成像
abstract_cn: 无透镜光纤内窥镜是一种新兴的体内显微成像工具，其中定量相位成像（QPI）可用作无标记方法来增强图像对比度。然而，现有的通过无透镜光纤内窥镜的单次相位重建方法通常在简单图像上表现良好，但在处理复杂的微观结构时却表现不佳。在这里，我们提出了一种散斑条件扩散模型（SpecDiffusion），它直接从多芯光纤（MCF）检测侧捕获的散斑重建相位图像。与传统的神经网络不同，SpecDiffusion 采用迭代相位去噪步骤来进行散斑驱动的相位重建。迭代方案允许 SpecDiffusion 将相位重建过程分解为多个步骤，逐渐构建最终的相位图像。此属性减轻了每个步骤的计算挑战，并能够重建复杂显微图像中的丰富细节。为了验证其功效，我们构建了一个光学系统来捕获 MCF 中的散斑，并构建了一个由 100,000 个配对图像组成的数据集。 SpecDiffusion提供高保真相位重建结果，并对不可见物体（例如测试图和生物组织）表现出强大的泛化能力，将重建组织图像的平均绝对误差降低7倍。此外，与传统方法相比，使用 SpecDiffusion 重建的组织图像在零次细胞分割任务中显示出更高的准确性，证明了通过基于学习的无透镜光纤内窥镜进行进一步细胞形态分析的潜力。 SpecDiffusion 提供了一种通过散射介质（包括 MCF）进行相位重建的精确且通用的方法，为无透镜光纤内显微成像开辟了新的视角。

title: Super-resolution imaging using reflective tomography LiDAR over 10 km
author: Xinyuan Zhang, Leqi Shan, Jiajie Fang, Rui Guo, Shilong Xu, Yicheng Wang, Yulin Guo, Xing Yang, Fei Han, Yihua Hu
summary: . Overcoming the diffraction barrier in long-range optical imaging is recognized as a critical challenge for space situational awareness and terrestrial remote sensing. This study presents a super-resolution imaging method based on reflective tomography LiDAR (RTL), breaking through the traditional optical diffraction limit to achieve 2 cm resolution imaging at a distance of 10.38 km. Aiming at challenges such as atmospheric turbulence, diffraction limits, and data sparsity in long-range complex target imaging, the study proposes the applicable methods of the nonlocal means (NLM) algorithm, combined with a self-developed RTL system to solve the problem of high-precision reconstruction of multi-angle projection data. Experimental results show that the system achieves a reconstruction resolution for complex targets (NUDT WordArt model) that is better than 2 cm, which is 2.5 times higher than the 5 cm diffraction limit of the traditional 1064 nm laser optical system. In sparse data scenarios, the NLM algorithm outperforms traditional algorithms in metrics such as information entropy (IE) and structural similarity (SSIM) by suppressing artifacts and maintaining structural integrity. This study presents the first demonstration of centimeter-level tomographic imaging for complex targets at near-ground distances exceeding 10 km, providing a new paradigm for fields such as space debris monitoring and remote target recognition.

title: Metasurface-assisted adaptive quantum phase contrast imaging
author: Xiaojing Feng, Juanzi He, Xingyu Liu, Xiaoshu Zhu, Yifan Zhou, Xinyang Feng, Shuming Wang
summary: Quantum imaging employs the nonclassical correlation of photons to break through the noise limitation of classical imaging, realizing high sensitivity, high SNR imaging and multifunctional image processing. To enhance the flexibility and imaging performance of the optical systems, metasurfaces composed of subwavelength structural units provide a powerful optimization approach, enabling advanced applications in quantum state modulation and high-precision imaging. Conventional phase contrast imaging is fundamentally constrained by its single-phase modulation scheme, precluding adaptive switching between imaging modalities. Therefore, the development of high-contrast imaging techniques that can be used in any combination of phases has been a challenge in the field of optical imaging. Here, we propose a novel imaging scheme combining a polarization-entangled light source and a polarization multiplexed metasurface, which realizes remotely switchable bright-dark phase contrast imaging, demonstrating the flexibility and high integration of the system. Experiments show the system can realize high contrast and high SNR imaging under low phase gradient conditions (phase difference as low as {\pi}/5) and exhibit excellent phase resolution. In addition, the system is suitable for imaging biological samples under low-throughput light conditions, providing an efficient and non-destructive shooting solution for biomedical imaging and promoting the development of phase-sensitive imaging technology.

title: 3D Gaussian adaptive reconstruction for Fourier light-field microscopy
author: Chenyu Xu, Zhouyu Jin, Chengkang Shen, Hao Zhu, Zhan Ma, Bo Xiong, You Zhou, Xun Cao, Ning Gu
summary: Compared to light-field microscopy (LFM), which enables high-speed volumetric imaging but suffers from non-uniform spatial sampling, Fourier light-field microscopy (FLFM) introduces sub-aperture division at the pupil plane, thereby ensuring spatially invariant sampling and enhancing spatial resolution. Conventional FLFM reconstruction methods, such as Richardson-Lucy (RL) deconvolution, exhibit poor axial resolution and signal degradation due to the ill-posed nature of the inverse problem. While data-driven approaches enhance spatial resolution by leveraging high-quality paired datasets or imposing structural priors, Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF)-based methods employ physics-informed self-supervised learning to overcome these limitations, yet they are hindered by substantial computational costs and memory demands. Therefore, we propose 3D Gaussian Adaptive Tomography (3DGAT) for FLFM, a 3D gaussian splatting based self-supervised learning framework that significantly improves the volumetric reconstruction quality of FLFM while maintaining computational efficiency. Experimental results indicate that our approach achieves higher resolution and improved reconstruction accuracy, highlighting its potential to advance FLFM imaging and broaden its applications in 3D optical microscopy.

summary: The segmented design of large-aperture telescope primary mirrors overcomes manufacturing and launch constraints while enabling high-resolution observations through schemes such as foldable on-orbit deployment or in-space assembly, extending effective apertures beyond 10 m. Achieving desired observation performance requires precise sensing and control of co-phase errors between sub-apertures. Traditional methods, often relying on complex wavefront sensors or iterative algorithms, suffer from limited real-time capability, narrow capture range, and slow convergence. Systems with high degrees of freedom also face the curse of dimensionality, and multi-physical field coupling further complicates collaborative mirror control, hindering nanometer-level phase accuracy. Deep learning techniques, with their strong nonlinear modeling and end-to-end mapping capabilities, offer promising alternatives. They enable sub-nanometer sensing accuracy, a capture range of ± 200 μ m , microsecond-scale response, and wavefront residuals below 10 nm in systems with hundreds of segments under dynamic disturbances. This review outlines traditional co-phase error detection methods, systematically summarizes recent deep learning advances in segmented mirror phasing, and identifies key challenges and future directions. The presented approaches are applicable not only to large astronomical telescopes but also to space optical payload calibration, laser communication phase compensation, high-resolution medical imaging, and industrial precision inspection, establishing a versatile paradigm for high-accuracy phase control across disciplines.

title: Statistical compressive sensing method for Hadamard-based single-pixel microscopy supported by kernel density estimators
author: H. Tobon-Maya, S. I. Zapata-Valencia, M. Obando, F. Lucka, E. Tajahuerce, J. Lancis
summary: . Hadamard-based single-pixel microscopy (HSPM) is a versatile non-conventional imaging technique where a binary function base is projected over the sample in a microscope setup to recover its information. One HSPM ’ s main challenge is the need to project numerous patterns to retrieve the image of the object under study. This leads to potential phototoxicity damage and a reduction in temporal resolution. Aiming to reduce the total pattern projection time, this study explores the use of statistical compressive sensing (CS) using the kernel density estimator (KDE) approach to learn the probability distribution of the most relevant Hadamard spectrum (HS) sampling coefficients, based on a large-scale dataset of 50,000 histopathology images. The probability distribution can then be sampled to generate the set of Hadamard patterns to be projected. The proposed KDE-guided CS method is implemented and tested on biological and non-biological samples. An image resolution of 550 lp/mm was recovered at a 25% sampling ratio (SR) using the proposed method, a level not reached by the well-established TV-based approach. Moreover, compared to TV-based sampling, the Michelson contrast increased from 0.09 to 0.17 at a 25% SR and from 0.12 to 0.29 at a 30% SR. These results demonstrate the feasibility of the proposed method for HSPM CS applications.

author: Unknown
summary: In computational imaging, the mismatch between physical forward models and real-world measurements is a fundamental challenge that limits reconstruction fidelity, especially under practical imperfections such as illumination misalignment and optical aberrations. Traditional Fourier ptychographic microscopy (FPM) reconstruction methods, based on pixel-wise error minimization, struggle to maintain robustness when these model assumptions break down. Here, we propose mean structural similarity index measure Fourier ptychography (MSSIM-FP), a reconstruction framework that shifts the optimization target from direct intensity matching to maximizing statistical consistency between observations and model estimations. By embedding the MSSIM into the reconstruction process as a differentiable loss function, MSSIM-FP improves resilience to system imperfections while preserving both high-frequency detail and low-frequency contrast. Through a combination of statistical error backpropagation, random batch updates, and a reduced-overlap acquisition strategy, MSSIM-FP enables artifact-free, seamless full-field reconstructions with faster convergence and lower data requirements. Experimental validations demonstrate that MSSIM-FP maintains imaging fidelity across a range of challenging conditions, offering a practical and scalable solution for high-throughput biomedical imaging and computational microscopy.

title: TS-BCDPN: a tool for breast cancer classification based on dual-path neural networks with terahertz spectroscopy
author: Jianwei Li, Pengcheng Li, Xuxu Ma, Meng Zhao, Xueguang Wang
summary: <jats:p>Terahertz (THz) spectroscopy has demonstrated substantial potential for the early detection and diagnosis of cancer due to its high sensitivity and specificity to biological tissues. However, the analysis of THz spectral data remains challenging owing to factors such as high dimensionality, significant noise, considerable spectral overlap, and complex nonlinear characteristics. This paper proposes a dual-path neural network model, termed TS-BCDPN, designed for the diagnosis of breast cancer in murine tissues. The model integrates a multi-scale convolutional neural network (multi-scale-CNN) with a sliding window-based long short-term memory network (sw-LSTM). It leverages multi-scale convolution and residual blocks to extract features at various scales from frequency-domain data, employs a two-layer LSTM to capture temporal dependencies in time-domain data, and combines these features using a self-attention mechanism. Experimental evaluations on a THz spectral dataset of mouse breast cancer demonstrate the superior performance of the model, achieving an accuracy (ACC) of 0.9680, an area under the ROC curve (AUC) of 0.9863, an area under the Precision–Recall curve (AUPR) of 0.9891, a precision of 0.9769, a recall of 0.9695, and an F1-score of 0.9732. These results confirm the model’s high diagnostic accuracy. Furthermore, comparative analysis with state-of-the-art (SOTA) methods indicates that TS-BCDPN achieves optimal performance. The proposed model effectively supports accurate breast cancer diagnosis based on THz spectral data and holds promise as a generalizable framework for diagnosing other types of cancer using terahertz spectroscopy. The source code and experimental data for TS-BCDPN are available at https://github.com/paper-codes-data/TS-BCDPN.</jats:p>
title_cn: TS-BCDPN：基于太赫兹光谱双路神经网络的乳腺癌分类工具
abstract_cn: <jats:p>太赫兹 (THz) 光谱由于其对生物组织的高灵敏度和特异性，在癌症早期检测和诊断方面具有巨大的潜力。然而，由于高维、显着噪声、相当大的光谱重叠和复杂的非线性特性等因素，太赫兹光谱数据的分析仍然具有挑战性。本文提出了一种称为 TS-BCDPN 的双路径神经网络模型，旨在用于诊断小鼠组织中的乳腺癌。该模型集成了多尺度卷积神经网络（multi-scale-CNN）和基于滑动窗口的长短期记忆网络（sw-LSTM）。它利用多尺度卷积和残差块从频域数据中提取各种尺度的特征，采用两层 LSTM 捕获时域数据中的时间依赖性，并使用自注意力机制组合这些特征。对小鼠乳腺癌太赫兹光谱数据集的实验评估表明该模型具有优越的性能，准确率（ACC）为0.9680，ROC曲线下面积（AUC）为0.9863，精确率-召回率曲线下面积（AUPR）为0.9891，精确度为0.9769，召回率为0.9695，F1分数为0.9732。这些结果证实了该模型的高诊断准确性。此外，与最先进（SOTA）方法的比较分析表明 TS-BCDPN 实现了最佳性能。所提出的模型有效支持基于太赫兹光谱数据的准确乳腺癌诊断，并有望成为使用太赫兹光谱诊断其他类型癌症的通用框架。 TS-BCDPN 的源代码和实验数据可在 https://github.com/paper-codes-data/TS-BCDPN 获取。</jats:p>

title: Femtosecond asymmetric multi-pulse shaping via spectral intensity modulation
author: Koyo Watanabe, Kazuki Kawai, Ryu Niigaki
summary: <jats:p>In this study, we experimentally validate the intensity optimization iterative Fourier transform algorithm (IO-IFTA). This method derives spectral intensity modulation patterns in combination with spectral phase control to achieve enhanced waveform shaping precision. We apply the modulation patterns obtained from IO-IFTA in a spatial light modulator-based pulse-shaping system to generate asymmetric double pulses. The designed intensity modulation suppressed unwanted higher-order pulses and reduced the pulse duration by approximately 11%, improving agreement with the target waveform. Quantitative analysis further confirmed the superiority of IO-IFTA, showing an 89.6% reduction in deviation from the target peak intensity ratio compared to the case without intensity modulation. These findings provide a promising approach to achieving high-precision pulse shaping, which is essential for advanced ultrafast optical applications.</jats:p>
title_cn: 通过光谱强度调制的飞秒非对称多脉冲整形
abstract_cn: <jats:p>在这项研究中，我们通过实验验证了强度优化迭代傅立叶变换算法 (IO-IFTA)。该方法结合光谱相位控制导出光谱强度调制模式，以实现增强的波形整形精度。我们将从 IO-IFTA 获得的调制模式应用于基于空间光调制器的脉冲整形系统中，以生成不对称双脉冲。设计的强度调制抑制了不需要的高阶脉冲，并将脉冲持续时间减少了约 11%，从而提高了与目标波形的一致性。定量分析进一步证实了IO-IFTA的优越性，与没有强度调制的情况相比，目标峰强度比的偏差减少了89.6%。这些发现为实现高精度脉冲整形提供了一种有前景的方法，这对于先进的超快光学应用至关重要。</jats:p>

title: ZrNCl-ZrNBr heterostructure-based UV photodetectors polarization sensitivity study
author: Zhengdao Li, Zongyao Zhang, Yulin Zhou, Yan Jiang, Benrun Xie, Yuxin Wang, Yu Wang, Liyuan Jiang, Xinxin Zhao, Jianbao Wu
summary: <jats:p>Through first-principles calculations and quantum transport simulations, this study investigates the polarization sensitivity of ZrNCl-ZrNBr van der Waals heterostructures (vdW) as ultraviolet (UV) photodetectors. While ZrNCl and ZrNBr monolayers show C<jats:sub>3</jats:sub> V symmetry and polarization-dependent photocurrents in the UV range, their response is limited by material symmetry and optical absorption. The ZrNCl-ZrNBr vdWh heterostructure, however, exhibits significantly enhanced optical responsivity due to reduced symmetry and a type II band arrangement, achieving a photocurrent response amplified by up to three orders of magnitude in the 3.5–6.0 eV UV range under zero bias, with a maximum extinction ratio of 180.73. These improvements are attributed to C<jats:sub>1</jats:sub> symmetry-induced polarization dependence and reduced electron-hole recombination. The heterostructure's wide bandgap, self-power capability, and high polarization sensitivity make it a promising candidate for UV photodetection, offering a new theoretical and material basis for advanced photodetector design and understanding of photoelectric phenomena in wide-bandgap semiconductors.</jats:p>
title_cn: 基于ZrNCl-ZrNBr异质结构的紫外光电探测器偏振灵敏度研究
abstract_cn: <jats:p>通过第一性原理计算和量子输运模拟，本研究研究了 ZrNCl-ZrNBr 范德华异质结构 (vdW) 作为紫外 (UV) 光电探测器的偏振灵敏度。虽然 ZrNCl 和 ZrNBr 单层在紫外范围内表现出 C<jat:sub>3</jat:sub> V 对称性和偏振相关光电流，但它们的响应受到材料对称性和光吸收的限制。然而，由于对称性降低和II型能带排列，ZrNCl-ZrNBr vdWh异质结构表现出显着增强的光学响应度，在零偏压下在3.5-6.0 eV紫外范围内实现了高达三个数量级的光电流响应放大，最大消光比为180.73。这些改进归因于 C<jats:sub>1</jats:sub> 对称性引起的极化依赖性和减少的电子空穴复合。该异质结构的宽带隙、自供电能力和高偏振灵敏度使其成为紫外光电探测的有希望的候选者，为先进光电探测器的设计和理解宽带隙半导体中的光电现象提供了新的理论和材料基础。</jats:p>

title: Highly stable dynamically controlled linear polarization converter for THz applications
author: Shobit Agarwal, Muhammad Fayyaz Kashif, Junaid Yaseen, Zahra Mazaheri, Antonio Iodice, Antonello Andreone, Daniele Riccio
summary:
<jats:p>
                    This study presents a reflective linear-to-linear (L2L) cross-polarization converter (CPC) for terahertz (THz) applications. The unit cell features a modified wheel-shaped geometry, achieved by merging concentric circular rings of varying radii, placed on a polyimide substrate optimized for THz operation. The proposed design exhibits an ultra-wide bandwidth of 0.370 THz (0.345–0.715 THz) and achieves a polarization conversion ratio (PCR) exceeding 75% for most of the operational band. The polarization conversion mechanism is dynamically controlled via vanadium dioxide (VO
                    <jats:sub>2</jats:sub>
                    ), a thermally responsive phase-change material. Below its threshold temperature (68°), VO
                    <jats:sub>2</jats:sub>
                    remains in its insulating state, enabling efficient polarization conversion, while transitioning to a metallic state above this temperature suppresses the conversion entirely. Furthermore, angular stability analysis confirms robust performance under oblique incidence angles up to 50°, demonstrating its practicality for real-world applications.
                  </jats:p>
title_cn: 适用于太赫兹应用的高度稳定的动态控制线性偏振转换器
abstract_cn:
<贾茨：p>
                    本研究提出了一种适用于太赫兹 (THz) 应用的反射式线性至线性 (L2L) 交叉偏振转换器 (CPC)。该单元具有改进的轮形几何形状，通过合并不同半径的同心圆环实现，放置在针对太赫兹操作优化的聚酰亚胺基板上。所提出的设计具有 0.370 THz (0.345–0.715 THz) 的超宽带宽，并在大部分工作频段实现了超过 75% 的偏振转换比 (PCR)。偏振转换机制通过二氧化钒（VO
                    <贾茨：子>2</贾茨：子>
                    ），一种热响应相变材料。低于其阈值温度 (68°)，VO
                    <贾茨：子>2</贾茨：子>
                    保持其绝缘状态，从而实现有效的偏振转换，而高于该温度转变为金属状态会完全抑制转换。此外，角度稳定性分析证实了在高达 50° 的斜入射角下的稳健性能，证明了其在实际应用中的实用性。
                  </贾茨：p>

title: Design of underwater optical antenna transmission and reception systems based on ant colony optimization
author: Cheng Qiu, Yunjie Teng, Yang Liu, Jun Ma, Hao Qin, Minyang Zhang
summary: <jats:p>This study presents a fast design method based on ant colony optimization (ACO) to address the high-dimensional, nonlinear optimization of aspheric lenses in collimating optical systems for underwater optical antenna transmission and reception. The ACO algorithm employs distributed exploration and pheromone-based positive feedback, combined with a dynamic weighting strategy to balance global and local search capabilities, preventing local optima and ensuring rapid convergence. These results demonstrate the effectiveness of the ACO algorithm in optimizing collimating optical systems and its potential for global optimization of optical system design, enabling the development of high-performance collimating optical systems for optical antenna transmission and reception.</jats:p>
title_cn: 基于蚁群优化的水下光学天线发射接收系统设计
abstract_cn: <jats:p>本研究提出了一种基于蚁群优化 (ACO) 的快速设计方法，用于解决水下光学天线传输和接收准直光学系统中非球面透镜的高维非线性优化问题。 ACO算法采用分布式探索和基于信息素的正反馈，并结合动态加权策略来平衡全局和局部搜索能力，防止局部最优并确保快速收敛。这些结果证明了ACO算法在优化准直光学系统方面的有效性及其对光学系统设计全局优化的潜力，为开发用于光学天线发射和接收的高性能准直光学系统提供了可能。</jats:p>

title: Label-free classification of single-cell lymphoma based on scattering imaging flow cytometry and machine learning
author: Linyan Xie, Mengfei Wang, Kai Yang, Xiangyu Wei, Wenli Hou, Xuezhi Zhou
summary: <jats:p>Label-free classification of single-cell lymphoma is essential for advancing cancer diagnostics. This study presents a method combining scattering imaging flow cytometry (SIFC) with machine learning to classify normal CD4+ T lymphocytes and T lymphoblastic leukemia (SUP-T1) cells based on distinct scattering patterns. Scattering data were captured using a microfluidic chip integrated with the laser-based SIFC system, and different lymphoma cells were classified based on the feature values of scattering images by means of machine learning. The results of five-fold cross-validation demonstrate that the model has excellent discriminatory power and reliability, with AUC values ranging from 0.945 to 0.964 (average: 0.957), validation set accuracies ranged from 86.3% to 92.0% (average: 89.0%), sensitivity, indicating correct identification of SUP-T1 cells, ranged from 89.0% to 93.0% (average: 91.6%), and specificity, indicating correct identification of CD4+ T lymphocytes, ranged from 83.0% to 91.5% (average: 86.4%). These findings indicate that SIFC, combined with machine learning, offers a promising approach for label-free, high-accuracy, and low-cost single-cell classification, with potential applications in cancer diagnostics.</jats:p>
title_cn: 基于散射成像流式细胞术和机器学习的单细胞淋巴瘤无标记分类
abstract_cn: <jats:p>单细胞淋巴瘤的无标签分类对于推进癌症诊断至关重要。本研究提出了一种将散射成像流式细胞术 (SIFC) 与机器学习相结合的方法，根据不同的散射模式对正常 CD4+ T 淋巴细胞和 T 淋巴细胞白血病 (SUP-T1) 细胞进行分类。使用与基于激光的SIFC系统集成的微流控芯片捕获散射数据，并通过机器学习的方式根据散射图像的特征值对不同的淋巴瘤细胞进行分类。五倍交叉验证结果表明，该模型具有优异的判别力和可靠性，AUC值范围为0.945至0.964（平均值：0.957），验证集准确率范围为86.3%至92.0%（平均值：89.0%），灵敏度（表明正确识别SUP-T1细胞）范围为89.0%至93.0%（平均值：91.6%），特异性（表明正确识别 CD4+ T 淋巴细胞）范围为 83.0% 至 91.5%（平均值：86.4%）。这些研究结果表明，SIFC 与机器学习相结合，为无标记、高精度和低成本的单细胞分类提供了一种有前景的方法，在癌症诊断方面具有潜在的应用前景。</jats:p>

title: Design and testing of a topology-optimized lattice mirror with high specific stiffness
author: Jiajun Long, Lijun Sun, Yueqi Zhu, Shanliang Ke, Anan Zhou, Wencong Chen, Qiang Zhao, Siyuan Li, Bingliang Hu
summary: <jats:p>To achieve a lightweight, high-stiffness, and high-surface-figure-accuracy spatial mirror design, this study introduces a topology-optimized lattice mirror design method with high specific stiffness. First, what we believe to be a novel high-specific-stiffness lattice structure (TFFCC, Topology optimization framework face-centered cubic) was developed through topology optimization. Subsequently, a topology-optimized lattice mirror was developed by integrating topology optimization methodology. Finally, selective laser melting (SLM) technology was utilized to fabricate the mirror blank, followed by modal testing to determine its vibration characteristics. Experimental results demonstrate that compared with a conventional mirror of equivalent lightweight ratio, the topology-optimized lattice mirror exhibits significant advantages. Its first-order natural frequency increases from 1826.71 Hz to 2942.35 Hz, representing an improvement of 61.08%. This method provides an innovative solution for the lightweight design of high-stiffness mirrors.</jats:p>
title_cn: 高比刚度拓扑优化晶格镜的设计与测试
abstract_cn: <jats:p>为了实现轻量化、高刚度和高面形精度的空间镜设计，本研究引入了一种具有高比刚度的拓扑优化晶格镜设计方法。首先，我们认为通过拓扑优化开发了一种新颖的高比刚度晶格结构（TFFCC，面心立方拓扑优化框架）。随后，通过集成拓扑优化方法开发了拓扑优化晶格镜。最后，利用选择性激光熔化（SLM）技术来制造镜毛坯，然后进行模态测试以确定其振动特性。实验结果表明，与等效轻量比的传统反射镜相比，拓扑优化的点阵反射镜表现出显着的优势。其一阶固有频率从1826.71 Hz增加到2942.35 Hz，提高了61.08%。该方法为高刚度反射镜的轻量化设计提供了创新的解决方案。</jats:p>

title: Locating a single point source of light using an analytic estimator enabled by spatial mode demultiplexing
author: Chao-Ning Hu, Jun Xin, Xiao-Ming Lu
summary: <jats:p>Advances in single-particle tracking (SPT) have heightened the importance of accurately locating a single point source of light. In traditional direct imaging, the optimal method is maximum likelihood estimation, which can attain the Cramér-Rao bound but typically requires iterative methods or grid searches. In this proof-of-principle experiment, we demonstrated that under high signal-to-noise ratio conditions, the analytic estimator enabled by the spatial mode demultiplexing (SPADE) measurement scheme can achieve localization accuracy comparable to that of the maximum likelihood estimator with a single calculation. These results highlight the computational advantage of SPADE, suggesting its potential utility in SPT tasks where both accuracy and efficiency are important.</jats:p>
title_cn: 使用空间模式解复用启用的分析估计器来定位单点光源
abstract_cn: <jats:p>单粒子跟踪 (SPT) 的进步提高了精确定位单点光源的重要性。在传统的直接成像中，最佳方法是最大似然估计，它可以达到 Cramér-Rao 界，但通常需要迭代方法或网格搜索。在这个原理验证实验中，我们证明了在高信噪比条件下，空间模式解复用（SPADE）测量方案启用的分析估计器可以通过单次计算实现与最大似然估计器相当的定位精度。这些结果凸显了 SPADE 的计算优势，表明其在准确性和效率都很重要的 SPT 任务中的潜在实用性。</jats:p>

title: Efficient, inverse large-scale optimization of diffractive lenses
author: Marco Gerhardt, Sungkun Hong, Moosung Lee
summary: <jats:p>Scalable photonic optimization holds the promise of significantly enhancing the performance of diffractive lenses across a wide range of photonic applications. However, the high computational cost of conventional full three-dimensional electromagnetic solvers has thus far been a major obstacle to large-scale-domain optimization. Here, we address this limitation by integrating the convergent Born series with the adjoint-field optimization framework, enabling inverse design with its domain size up to 110 × 110 × 46 μm<jats:sup>3</jats:sup> volume—corresponding to 0.1 gigavoxels—using a single, cost-effective graphics card. The optimized lens achieves a 9% improvement in axial resolution and a 20% increase in focusing efficiency compared to a standard Fresnel lens of identical diameter and numerical aperture. These gains point to application opportunities for optimizing high-performance microscopy, photolithography, and optical trapping systems using modest computational resources.</jats:p>
title_cn: 衍射透镜的高效逆大规模优化
abstract_cn: <jats:p>可扩展的光子优化有望在各种光子应用中显着增强衍射透镜的性能。然而，传统全三维电磁求解器的高计算成本迄今为止一直是大规模域优化的主要障碍。在这里，我们通过将收敛 Born 级数与伴随场优化框架集成来解决这一限制，使用单个经济高效的显卡实现域尺寸高达 110 × 110 × 46 μm<jats:sup>3</jats:sup> 体积（相当于 0.1 gigavoxels）的逆向设计。与相同直径和数值孔径的标准菲涅尔透镜相比，优化后的透镜轴向分辨率提高了9%，聚焦效率提高了20%。这些成果为使用适度的计算资源优化高性能显微镜、光刻和光学捕获系统提供了应用机会。</jats:p>

title: Enhanced performance for single-shot quantitative phase imaging based on spatial frequency modulation using the phase transfer function
author: Yusuke Saita, Kazunari Sawamura, Takanori Nomura
summary: <jats:p>Quantitative phase imaging (QPI) is a valuable technique for non-invasive, label-free characterization of transparent specimens, offering access to parameters such as refractive index and thickness. Among various QPI methods, transport-of-intensity equation-based approaches are attractive due to their non-interferometric implementation and compatibility with partially coherent illumination. However, conventional finite difference and polynomial fitting techniques often involve trade-offs between spatial resolution and noise robustness, and require sequential acquisition of defocused intensity distributions. In this study, we propose a single-shot QPI method based on spatial frequency modulation and phase transfer function (PTF) analysis. Multiple defocused intensity distributions are captured simultaneously, and the defocus distances are selected using the PTF, enabling accurate phase reconstruction without prior knowledge of the object or the system. Experimental results confirm that the proposed method outperforms conventional single-shot QPI techniques in terms of phase reconstruction quality.</jats:p>
title_cn: 使用相位传递函数的基于空间频率调制的单次定量相位成像的增强性能
abstract_cn: <jats:p>定量相位成像 (QPI) 是一种对透明样本进行非侵入式、无标记表征的宝贵技术，可以获取折射率和厚度等参数。在各种 QPI 方法中，基于强度传输方程的方法因其非干涉测量实现以及与部分相干照明的兼容性而颇具吸引力。然而，传统的有限差分和多项式拟合技术通常涉及空间分辨率和噪声鲁棒性之间的权衡，并且需要顺序采集散焦强度分布。在本研究中，我们提出了一种基于空间频率调制和相位传递函数（PTF）分析的单次 QPI 方法。同时捕获多个散焦强度分布，并使用 PTF 选择散焦距离，从而无需事先了解物体或系统即可实现精确的相位重建。实验结果证实，该方法在相位重建质量方面优于传统的单次QPI技术。</jats:p>

title: Spatial and temporal modulation in time-domain diffuse optical tomography
author: Jarjish Rahaman, Meghdoot Mozumder, Andrea Farina, Tanja Tarvainen
summary: <jats:p>Diffuse optical tomography (DOT) utilizes visible and near-infrared light to non-invasively study biological structures and functions, such as imaging breast cancer and brain activity. Time-domain DOT systems use pulsed light and measure the time-varying temporal point spread function. Time-domain DOT provides information from both superficial and deep tissue, and thus it is regarded as a technique that provides the richest information, among other measurement types in DOT, such as continuous-wave and intensity-modulated DOT. However, modeling and image reconstruction of time-domain data as such is computationally expensive. To overcome this problem, different transformations of data types in DOT have been utilized with an aim to compress the data while maintaining the rich information content. Furthermore, different structural illuminations have been utilized in DOT to enhance the imaging modality. In this work, we study the use of temporal and spatial modulation in time-domain DOT using numerical simulations. For temporal modulation, a truncated Fourier-series approximation is utilized and the use of different numbers of frequencies is studied. Furthermore, structural illumination and detection are implemented using Hadamard patterns. The use of different numbers and different complexities of patterns is studied. The simulations show that the resolution and contrast of reconstructed absorption and scattering images can be improved by increasing the number of Fourier frequencies and the number of Hadamard patterns in the data. However, it was also noticed that, after a certain level of improvement, including more frequencies and Hadamard patterns do not change reconstructed images significantly.</jats:p>
title_cn: 时域漫射光学断层扫描中的空间和时间调制
abstract_cn: <jats:p>漫反射光学断层扫描 (DOT) 利用可见光和近红外光来非侵入性地研究生物结构和功能，例如对乳腺癌和大脑活动进行成像。时域 DOT 系统使用脉冲光并测量时变时间点扩散函数。时域DOT提供来自表层和深层组织的信息，因此被认为是在DOT的其他测量类型（例如连续波和强度调制DOT）中提供最丰富信息的技术。然而，时域数据的建模和图像重建本身的计算成本很高。为了克服这个问题，DOT 中使用了不同的数据类型转换，目的是在压缩数据的同时保持丰富的信息内容。此外，DOT 中还利用了不同的结构照明来增强成像模式。在这项工作中，我们通过数值模拟研究了时域 DOT 中时间和空间调制的使用。对于时间调制，利用截断的傅立叶级数近似并研究了不同数量的频率的使用。此外，结构照明和检测是使用 Hadamard 模式实现的。研究了不同数量和不同复杂程度的模式的使用。模拟表明，通过增加数据中的傅里叶频率数量和哈达玛图案数量，可以提高重建吸收和散射图像的分辨率和对比度。然而，人们还注意到，经过一定程度的改进后，包括更多频率和哈达玛模式并不会显着改变重建图像。</jats:p>

title: Analysis of scrambler function and its impact on the spectral performance of Earth observation spectrometers
author: Carmen Vázquez-Pérez, Andrea García-Moreno, Luis M. González-Fernández, Tomás Belenguer-Dávila, Marianela Fernández-Rodríguez
summary: <jats:p>Spectrometers are one of the most commonly used instruments in Earth observation applications. Among others, they are designed to measure atmospheric compounds by absorption spectroscopy with high precision, and in this case, the use of optical elements such as scramblers, also called depolarizers, is essential to eliminate or reduce the degree of polarization of the light mainly resulting from Rayleigh scattering. Understanding how they depolarize light is crucial to ensure accurate radiometric measurements. Additionally, since they are integrated into a spectrometer, it is important to assess their impact on the system’s overall performance, particularly in optical quality and spectral resolution. A study has been carried out to characterize the main optical properties of scramblers that influence the variation of the degree of polarization and, consequently, the performance of Earth observation spectrometers. The methodology has been based on simulations using Code V (Synopsys, USA) optical design software, complemented with the Mueller matrix formalism to analyze the optical and polarimetric behavior of these elements. The results obtained allow establishing optical design guidelines for these elements, optimizing their configuration according to the specific polarization requirements, without compromising the optical quality and spectral resolution of the system.</jats:p>
title_cn: 扰码器功能及其对对地观测光谱仪光谱性能的影响分析
abstract_cn: <jats:p>光谱仪是地球观测应用中最常用的仪器之一。其中，它们旨在通过高精度吸收光谱来测量大气化合物，在这种情况下，使用扰频器（也称为消偏器）等光学元件对于消除或减少主要由瑞利散射产生的光的偏振度至关重要。了解它们如何消偏振光对于确保准确的辐射测量至关重要。此外，由于它们集成到光谱仪中，因此评估它们对系统整体性能的影响非常重要，特别是在光学质量和光谱分辨率方面。已经进行了一项研究来表征扰频器的主要光学特性，这些特性影响偏振度的变化，从而影响地球观测光谱仪的性能。该方法基于使用 Code V（Synopsys，美国）光学设计软件进行的模拟，并辅以 Mueller 矩阵形式来分析这些元件的光学和偏振行为。获得的结果可以为这些元件建立光学设计指南，根据特定的偏振要求优化其配置，而不会影响系统的光学质量和光谱分辨率。</jats:p>

title: Psychophysical evaluation of the Helmholtz–Kohlrausch effect using virtual reality head mounted displays
author: Ujjayanta Bhaumik, Frédéric B. Leloup
summary: <jats:p>The Helmholtz–Kohlrausch effect is a well-known phenomenon which defines that for a chromatic stimulus with constant luminance, an increase in chroma is accompanied by an increase in perceived brightness. Many studies on the Helmholtz–Kohlrausch effect have been performed on conventional displays in the past. Yet, the advent of virtual reality provides new opportunities to explore the effect in immersive media. In this paper, the Helmholtz–Kohlrausch effect is investigated using a commercially available head mounted display, the Meta Quest 2. Three psychophysical experiments were conducted, in which observers estimated the brightness of chromatic stimuli in a 2D and 3D context. Based on the results, the suitability of different models for capturing the Helmholtz-Kohlrausch effect is assessed.</jats:p>
title_cn: 使用虚拟现实头戴式显示器对亥姆霍兹-科尔劳施效应进行心理物理学评估
abstract_cn: <jats:p>亥姆霍兹-科尔劳施效应是一种众所周知的现象，它定义了对于具有恒定亮度的色度刺激，色度的增加伴随着感知亮度的增加。过去，许多关于亥姆霍兹-科尔劳施效应的研究都是在传统显示器上进行的。然而，虚拟现实的出现为探索沉浸式媒体效果提供了新的机会。在本文中，使用商用头戴式显示器 Meta Quest 2 研究了亥姆霍兹-科尔劳施效应。进行了三个心理物理学实验，观察者在 2D 和 3D 环境中估计了色彩刺激的亮度。根据结果​​，评估了不同模型捕获亥姆霍兹-科尔劳施效应的适用性。</jats:p>

title: Power division multiplexing scheme for diverse-origin, dual polarization optical communication links
author: Meredith Caveney, C. Alex Kaylor, Prankush Agarwal, Stephen E. Ralph
summary: <jats:p>We numerically simulate and experimentally demonstrate a power division multiplexing scheme for asynchronous, dual polarization signaling in a digital coherent receiver. This shared spectrum scheme supports a secondary signal with a bounded, adjustable bandwidth that can be inserted at any point along a transport fiber from a completely independent source—with distinct polarization, carrier frequency, and phase—successfully enabling recovery of both signals. Successive interference cancellation enables recovery of both signals through inversion of the demodulation chain, and the accumulated chromatic dispersion provides an estimated insertion location. We analyze how the insertion location, polarization alignment, baud rate, and power ratio impact system performance and discuss strategies to optimize this flexible scheme under practical constraints.</jats:p>
title_cn: 用于不同来源、双偏振光通信链路的功分复用方案
abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们通过数值模拟和实验演示了数字相干接收机中异步双偏振信令的功分复用方案。这种共享频谱方案支持具有有限的、可调节带宽的辅助信号，该信号可以从完全独立的源沿着传输光纤插入到任何点，具有不同的偏振、载波频率和相位，从而成功地恢复两个信号。连续的干扰消除能够通过解调链的反转来恢复两个信号，并且累积的色散提供估计的插入位置。我们分析了插入位置、偏振对齐、波特率和功率比对系统性能的影响，并讨论了在实际约束下优化这种灵活方案的策略。</jats:p>

title: Scalable photonic quantum processing via isometric energy-conserving transformations: bridging hybrid optical modes
author: Donya Sadat Rezaeishad, Foroogh Sadat Tabataba
summary: <jats:p>The precise manipulation of quantum states of light lies at the heart of advancing photonic technologies, yet scalable solutions for hybrid photonic systems—where disparate optical modes such as polarization, time-bin, and frequency must coherently interact—remain a critical challenge. While current literature demonstrates various energy-conserving devices that effectively map between Hilbert spaces of unequal dimensions, there is a growing need for frameworks that address variable-dimensional transformations in a more unified manner. In this paper, we introduce an operator-level framework that systematically integrates both unitary and rectangular isometric energy-conserving transformations in multi-dimensional photonic systems. Unlike prior mode-specific approaches, our formalism enables modular modeling of hybrid optical modes within effective signal spaces, offering practical tools for scalable photonic quantum processors. By classifying these transformations into fixed- and variable-dimensional regimes, we derive universal design criteria for energy-conserving photonic signal processors. This work not only advances the fundamental understanding of photonic quantum processing but also delivers actionable tools for engineering next-generation scalable optical technologies, including multi-purpose, programmable photonic circuits, energy-efficient optical signal processing in reconfigurable networks, and high-dimensional quantum key distribution with hybrid mode encoding.</jats:p>
title_cn: 通过等距能量守恒变换的可扩展光子量子处理：桥接混合光学模式
abstract_cn: <jats:p>光量子态的精确操控是先进光子技术的核心，但混合光子系统的可扩展解决方案（其中不同的光学模式，如偏振、时间段和频率必须相干地相互作用）仍然是一个关键挑战。虽然当前的文献展示了各种可以在不等维的希尔伯特空间之间有效映射的节能设备，但对以更统一的方式解决可变维变换的框架的需求日益增长。在本文中，我们介绍了一种算子级框架，该框架系统地集成了多维光子系统中的酉和矩形等距节能变换。与之前的特定模式方法不同，我们的形式可以在有效信号空间内对混合光学模式进行模块化建模，为可扩展的光子量子处理器提供实用的工具。通过将这些变换分类为固定维和可变维体系，我们得出了节能光子信号处理器的通用设计标准。这项工作不仅增进了对光子量子处理的基本理解，而且还为设计下一代可扩展光学技术提供了可行的工具，包括多用途、可编程光子电路、可重构网络中的节能光信号处理以及具有混合模式编码的高维量子密钥分发。</jats:p>

title: Implementation of fully connected layers in optical convolutional neural networks for pre-sensor computing
author: Ruidong Li, Caihua Zhang, Kejian Zhu, Zheng Huang, Conghe Wang, Shukai Wu, Hongwei Chen
summary: <jats:p>Fully connected computing is a crucial computational function in neural networks. However, in the implementation of optical neural networks, there exist issues such as the absence of fully connected layers under incoherent light conditions and high overhead caused by reliance on electronic layers. To address these problems, this paper proposes an incoherent optical fully connected computing method based on light intensity modulation. A fully connected computing system is constructed using a microlens array (MLA), an amplitude-type liquid crystal spatial light modulator (SLM), and an image sensor. By utilizing the MLA to replicate the target scene into a sub-image array, combined with pixel-wise weight modulation via the SLM and data acquisition by the image sensor, a multi-input multi-output fully connected computing architecture is realized. The design principles for system parameters are derived theoretically, and experiments verify the designed fully connected computing function. A 6-bit linear modulation is achieved through SLM calibration. Finally, an optical neural network system is built, and a classification accuracy of 93.5% on the MNIST dataset is achieved. As an important component of optical neural networks research, this system will be applied to the implementation of all-optical neural networks and holds significant application prospects in the era of artificial intelligence.</jats:p>
title_cn: 用于预传感器计算的光学卷积神经网络中全连接层的实现
abstract_cn: <jats:p>全连接计算是神经网络中至关重要的计算功能。然而，在光神经网络的实现中，存在非相干光条件下缺乏全连接层以及依赖电子层导致的高开销等问题。针对这些问题，本文提出一种基于光强调制的非相干光学全连接计算方法。使用微透镜阵列（MLA）、振幅型液晶空间光调制器（SLM）和图像传感器构建了全连接计算系统。利用MLA将目标场景复制到子图像阵列中，结合SLM的像素级权重调制和图像传感器的数据采集，实现了多输入多输出的全连接计算架构。从理论上推导了系统参数的设计原则，并通过实验验证了所设计的全连接计算功能。通过SLM校准实现6位线性调制。最后搭建了光学神经网络系统，在MNIST数据集上实现了93.5%的分类准确率。该系统作为光神经网络研究的重要组成部分，将应用于全光神经网络的实现，在人工智能时代具有重要的应用前景。</jats:p>

title: High-sensitivity strain sensor based on two different specialty fibers and the Vernier effect
author: Angel I. Correa, Jose R. Vento Alvarez, Marko Galarza, Romain Dauliat, Raphael Jamier, Philippe Roy, Rosa A. Perez-Herrera, Manuel Lopez-Amo
summary: <jats:p>What we believe to be a novel strain sensor based on a three-core fiber (3MCF-V) and the Vernier effect was developed and characterized, offering a wide strain measurement range and temperature compensation. The sensor combined a Fabry-Perot interferometer (FPI) formed by a hollow-core fiber (HCF) and a super-modes interferometer (SMI) using a multicore fiber (MCF). By combining these two interferometers in a parallel Michelson configuration, a Vernier envelope amplified the response of the system, achieving higher strain sensitivity compared to conventional approaches. The sensor demonstrated a linear response, with a sensitivity of 5 pm/µε for a 30 mm fiber segment, out of the 230 mm that make up the SMI, and up to 22.2 pm/µε when the length of the segment under deformation was increased to 85 mm, reaching a deformation of up to 6280 µε without causing the fiber to break. Additionally, a thermal analysis validated a temperature sensitivity of 766.5 pm/°C, confirming the robustness and accuracy of the proposed design. These results highlight the potential of the sensor for advanced strain or temperature monitoring applications requiring high resolution over a broad dynamic range.</jats:p>
title_cn: 基于两种不同特种光纤和游标效应的高灵敏度应变传感器
abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们认为这是一种基于三芯光纤 (3MCF-V) 和游标效应的新型应变传感器，已开发并进行了表征，可提供较宽的应变测量范围和温度补偿。该传感器结合了由空心光纤（HCF）形成的法布里-珀罗干涉仪（FPI）和使用多芯光纤（MCF）的超模干涉仪（SMI）。通过将这两个干涉仪组合成并行的迈克尔逊配置，游标包络放大了系统的响应，与传统方法相比，实现了更高的应变灵敏度。该传感器表现出线性响应，对于构成 SMI 的 230mm 的 30mm 光纤段，其灵敏度为 5 pm/με；当变形下的光纤段长度增加到 85mm 时，灵敏度高达 22.2 pm/με，变形量高达 6280με，而不会导致光纤断裂。此外，热分析验证了 766.5 pm/°C 的温度灵敏度，证实了所提出设计的稳健性和准确性。这些结果凸显了该传感器在需要宽动态范围内高分辨率的高级应变或温度监测应用中的潜力。</jats:p>

title: Operation speed tuning for infrared computer vision testing with pixel integration structures of carbon nanotube photo-thermoelectric imagers
author: Miki Kubota, Mitsuki Kosaka, Daiki Shikichi, Noa Izumi, Tomoki Nishi, Minami Yamamoto, Hayato Hamashima, Yukio Kawano, Kou Li
summary: <jats:p>This work demonstrates real-time non-destructive monitoring satisfying material identification and structure reconstruction for multi-layered three-dimensional objects. This system conducts visual-hull (a representative computer vision) under broadband transmissive infrared-irradiation with a large-area-view camera. Visual-hull acquires two-dimensional silhouette of targets in different viewing-angles for reverse-projection, and hollows overlapped bodies out from the reference voxel into three-dimensional reconstruction. The camera comprises sensitive photo-thermoelectric carbon-nanotube pixels and aggregates broadband infrared information from targets. This work non-destructively visualizes constituents (glass, metal, semiconductor, and polymer) of opaque multi-layered three-dimensional objects at a 976 nm–10.3 µm wavelength range in a 16-seconds-speed and a 6%-error ratio.</jats:p>
title_cn: 碳纳米管光热电成像仪像素集成结构红外计算机视觉测试的运行速度调节
abstract_cn: <jats:p>这项工作展示了实时无损监测，满足多层三维物体的材料识别和结构重建。该系统利用大视场摄像机在宽带透射红外照射下进行视觉船体（一种代表性的计算机视觉）。 Visual-hull获取不同视角下目标的二维轮廓进行反投影，并将参考体素中重叠的物体挖空进行三维重建。该相机由敏感的光热电碳纳米管像素组成，可聚合来自目标的宽带红外信息。这项工作以 16 秒的速度和 6% 的错误率，在 976 nm–10.3 μm 波长范围内无损地可视化不透明多层三维物体的成分（玻璃、金属、半导体和聚合物）。</jats:p>

title: Investigation of heat-spreaders as a passive thermal management element in SWIR fiber lasers
author: Helena Picmausová, Michael Písařík, Clément Romano, Dieter Panitzek, Jan Farlík, Marc Eichhorn, Christelle Kieleck
summary: <jats:p>This article examines the utility of heat spreaders as an alternative to conventional heat management techniques for fiber lasers and amplifiers by numerical modeling scalable for prediction of heat loads in high power laser amplifiers and the model’s experimental verification. A special focus is placed on the section of a fiber splice, given its importance and potential issues associated with signal loss and subsequent heat generation during laser operation. Temperature change is analyzed and compared both numerically and experimentally for three passive cooling architectures: a loose, recoated fiber splice attached to a copper plate via Kapton tape, a recoated fiber splice placed in a thermal interface material (TIM) filled U-shaped groove in an aluminum plate, and finally a non-recoated splice placed in a heat-spreader, with the recoating material serving instead of TIM. The benefits and utility of fiber heat spreaders are shown and discussed, and their superior thermal transfer rate is demonstrated.</jats:p>
title_cn: 研究散热器作为短波红外光纤激光器中的无源热管理元件
abstract_cn: <jats:p>本文通过可扩展的数值建模来预测高功率激光放大器的热负载以及模型的实验验证，探讨了散热器作为光纤激光器和放大器传统热管理技术替代方案的实用性。考虑到光纤接头部分的重要性以及与激光操作过程中信号损失和随后产生的热量相关的潜在问题，我们特别关注光纤接头部分。对三种被动冷却架构的温度变化进行了数值和实验分析：通过 Kapton 胶带将松散的重涂光纤接头连接到铜板上，将重涂光纤接头放置在铝板的热界面材料 (TIM) 填充的 U 形凹槽中，最后将非重涂接头放置在散热器中，并用重涂材料代替 TIM。展示和讨论了纤维散热器的优点和实用性，并证明了其卓越的传热率。</jats:p>

title: Underwater optical-acoustic interactive communication system and demonstration experiment
author: Tingwei Fan, Xiaoming Zhang, Guyu Hu, Shanjiang Hu, Tianhua Zhou
summary: <jats:p>Along with the rapid development of underwater craft such as autonomous underwater vehicles and remotely operated vehicles, underwater wireless communication is a rapidly growing field. We developed an underwater wireless optical communication system; the divergence angle and communication rate of the system can be adjusted to adapt to different communication conditions. We also integrate the underwater acoustic communication and ranging module in the system for interaction. The innovative use of acoustic signals to interact with states and instructions is proposed, which is convenient for adaptive parameter adjustment to achieve optical alignment and establish the high-speed communication link. We have realized the functional verification in the water tank for what we believe to be the first time. Limited by the maximum diagonal length of 22 m of the water tank, the system can transmit an equivalent 66 m distance in Jerlov I water, with a highest communication rate of nearly 100 Mbps. It is seamlessly connected to the traditional 100 Mbps Ethernet without protocol adaptation. The results of this paper have important reference value for promoting the practical application of underwater optical communication.</jats:p>
title_cn: 水下光声交互通信系统及演示实验
abstract_cn: <jats:p>随着自主水下航行器和遥控航行器等水下航行器的快速发展，水下无线通信是一个快速发展的领域。我们开发了水下无线光通信系统；系统的发散角和通信速率均可调节，以适应不同的通信条件。我们还在系统中集成了水声通信和测距模块进行交互。创新性地利用声信号与状态和指令交互，便于自适应参数调整，实现光学对准并建立高速通信链路。我们认为这是第一次在水箱中实现了功能验证。受水箱最大对角线长度22米的限制，系统在Jerlov I水中可传输等效66米的距离，最高通信速率近100Mbps。与传统100Mbps以太网无缝连接，无需协议适配。论文研究成果对于推动水下光通信的实际应用具有重要的参考价值。</jats:p>

title: Impact of annealing on low-loss sputtered aluminum nitride: insights from optics to advanced material characterization
author: S. Mardani, W. A. P. M. Hendriks, M. Dijkstra, M. D. Nguyen, S. M. García-Blanco
summary: <jats:p>Aluminium nitride (AlN) exhibits Pockels electro-optic, non-linear, and piezo-electric coefficients, which, together with a large bandgap (i.e., 6.2 eV), make it a very interesting material for photonic integrated circuits (PICs) with operation down to the ultraviolet wavelength range. In this work, AlN films were deposited by reactive RF sputter deposition. The influence of thermal post-deposition treatment at temperatures ranging from 400 °C to 1150 °C in a nitrogen atmosphere on the optical, morphological, chemical, and crystallographic properties of AlN films is studied. Preliminary slab propagation losses as low as 4.03 dB/cm at 633 nm of wavelength have been measured for as-deposited layers. The losses reduce to ∼1.60 dB/cm at 633 nm after annealing at 600 °C. Atomic force microscopy (AFM) measurements show that the surface roughness experiences a drastic reduction after annealing at 600 °C, which greatly reduces the propagation losses. X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS) reveals that annealing at 600 °C decreases the oxygen content, leading to a more stoichiometric AlN. High-resolution transmission electron microscopy (TEM) and X-ray diffraction (XRD) show that the as-deposited material exhibits a hexagonal wurtzite polycrystalline structure, the degree of crystallinity increasing after annealing at increasing temperatures with preferential orientation along the C axis.</jats:p>
title_cn: 退火对低损耗溅射氮化铝的影响：从光学到先进材料表征的见解
abstract_cn: <jats:p>氮化铝 (AlN) 具有普克尔斯电光系数、非线性系数和压电系数，再加上大带隙（即 6.2 eV），使其成为一种非常有趣的光子集成电路 (PIC) 材料，可在紫外波长范围内工作。在这项工作中，AlN 薄膜是通过反应射频溅射沉积来沉积的。研究了在氮气气氛中 400 °C 至 1150 °C 温度范围内的热沉积后处理对 AlN 薄膜的光学、形态、化学和晶体学性质的影响。经测量，沉积层在 633nm 波长处的初步板传播损耗低至 4.03dB/cm。 600 °C 退火后，633 nm 处的损耗降低至 ∼1.60 dB/cm。原子力显微镜 (AFM) 测量表明，在 600 °C 退火后，表面粗糙度大幅降低，从而大大降低了传播损耗。 X 射线光电子能谱 (XPS) 表明，600 °C 下的退火会降低氧含量，从而产生化学计量更高的 AlN。高分辨率透射电子显微镜（TEM）和X射线衍射（XRD）表明沉积态材料呈现六方纤锌矿多晶结构，升高温度退火后结晶度增加，并沿C轴择优取向。</jats:p>

title: Surface recovery method with phase error suppression in white light phase-shifting interferometry
author: Shaokang Tang, Hang Zhao, Zhengqiong Dong, Lei Nie
summary: <jats:p>White light phase-shifting interferometry is a well-established measurment method in precision manufacturing, widely applied to the surface measurement of complex micro- and nano-structures. In practical applications, background fluctuations caused by light source stability and intensity noise of the camera disturbs the interference signal, leading to inaccurate localization of zero optical path difference and reconstruction of surface topography. In this paper, an anti-noise recovery algorithm based on moving half-period difference and real-frequency domain combinatorial localization is proposed to suppress the random intensity error and background drift. Step height standard samples and an in-house etched step were tested to evaluate the proposed algorithm. Experimental results demonstrate that the absolute error and repeatability for the step height standard are 7.00 nm and 0.005% respectively, and the absolute error of the in-house etched step is 1.5 nm. The measurement comparisons with four widely utilized algorithms prove the effectiveness of the proposed algorithm.</jats:p>
title_cn: 白光相移干涉测量中相位误差抑制的表面恢复方法
abstract_cn: <jats:p>白光相移干涉测量是精密制造领域成熟的测量方法，广泛应用于复杂微纳结构的表面测量。在实际应用中，光源稳定性和相机强度噪声引起的背景波动会干扰干涉信号，导致零光程差定位和表面形貌重建不准确。本文提出一种基于移动半周期差和实频域组合定位的抗噪声恢复算法来抑制随机强度误差和背景漂移。对台阶高度标准样品和内部蚀刻台阶进行了测试，以评估所提出的算法。实验结果表明，台阶高度标准的绝对误差和重复性分别为7.00 nm和0.005%，内部蚀刻台阶的绝对误差为1.5 nm。与四种广泛使用的算法的测量比较证明了该算法的有效性。</jats:p>

title: Microstructured vertical-cavity surface-emitting laser with large scanning range for LiDAR
author: Mengqi Wang, Lei Yu, Yibo Yang, Yifan Xin, Yufei Wang, Pengfei Wang, Yanmei Su, Yejin Zhang, Jiaoqing Pan
summary: <jats:p>Microstructured lasers play a crucial role in LiDAR applications; however, the turning angle of current edge-emitting structures is constrained to less than 90 degrees due to inherent limitations. In contrast, microstructured vertical-cavity surface-emitting lasers (MSVCSELs) offer a simpler manufacturing process and a wider turning angle, rendering them more promising. This study presents the successful demonstration of an MSVCSEL based on the 940 nm III-V system. Utilizing a microstructure period of 5 μm, the MSVCSEL achieves a deflection angle of ±50°. Furthermore, an experimental investigation was conducted into the impact of oxidation effects on the high aluminum layer concerning the far-field intensity distribution of the MSVCSEL, offering strong support for the subsequent MSVCSEL design.</jats:p>
title_cn: 用于激光雷达的大扫描范围微结构垂直腔面发射激光器
abstract_cn: <jats:p>微结构激光器在激光雷达应用中发挥着至关重要的作用；然而，由于固有的限制，当前的边缘发射结构的转动角度被限制在小于90度。相比之下，微结构垂直腔表面发射激光器（MSVCSEL）提供更简单的制造工艺和更宽的转向角度，使其更具前景。本研究成功演示了基于 940nm III-V 系统的 MSVCSEL。 MSVCSEL 利用 5 μm 的微结构周期，实现了 ±50° 的偏转角。此外，还通过实验研究了氧化效应对高铝层对MSVCSEL远场强度分布的影响，为后续MSVCSEL设计提供了有力支持。</jats:p>

title: Overlay detection for multiple nanoimprint lithography in optical microscopic fields of view using Mie resonator arrays
author: Tomoya Oshikiri, Tomoki Kawase, Hiromasa Niinomi, Masaru Nakagawa
summary: <jats:p>This study proposes what we believe to be a novel method for detecting overlay accuracy in multiple ultraviolet nanoimprint lithography (UV-NIL) patterning using Mie resonances of silicon nanodisk (Si-ND) arrays. Overlay differences were quantified by analyzing the optical spectra of the Si-ND arrays through numerical simulations. Overlay difference between the first and second UV-NIL processes resulted in ellipsoidal anisotropic Si-NDs, which exhibited distinct optical responses depending on the linear polarization direction of the incident light. A calibration curve between overlay difference and the spectral shift of the magnetic dipole (MD) mode demonstrated excellent linearity, thereby enabling sub-nanometer precision in overlay detection. These spectral changes caused by geometric anisotropy are systematically explained using a well-defined Mie resonance model. As the method relies on microscopic spectroscopy, it is scalable, nondestructive, and suitable for large-scale fabrication of metasurfaces and meta-optics, thereby offering significant advantages over conventional techniques.</jats:p>
title_cn: 使用米氏谐振器阵列在光学显微视场中进行多重纳米压印光刻的重叠检测
abstract_cn: <jats:p>这项研究提出了一种我们认为是利用硅纳米盘 (Si-ND) 阵列的米氏共振来检测多重紫外纳米压印光刻 (UV-NIL) 图案中重叠精度的新方法。通过数值模拟分析 Si-ND 阵列的光谱来量化重叠差异。第一次和第二次 UV-NIL 过程之间的重叠差异导致了椭球各向异性 Si-ND，它根据入射光的线性偏振方向表现出不同的光学响应。叠加差异和磁偶极子 (MD) 模式的光谱偏移之间的校准曲线表现出出色的线性度，从而实现了叠加检测的亚纳米级精度。使用定义明确的米氏共振模型系统地解释了由几何各向异性引起的这些光谱变化。由于该方法依赖于显微光谱，因此具有可扩展性、无损性，适合大规模制造超表面和超光学，从而比传统技术具有显着优势。</jats:p>

title: Machine learning approach to predict the optical properties of the superposition-assisted structure of homogeneous multi-core fiber
author: Shaharior Anik, Mohammad Musa Jawad, Kazi Rajwan Sultan, Md. Shezan Haque Shovo, Md. Ashaduzzaman Niloy
summary:
<jats:p>
                    In order to harness the full potential of the increased data carrying capacity, the concept of multi-core fibers (MCFs) was born, i.e., to have multiple cores in a single fiber. MCFs are engineered with superposition-assisted structures (SASs) that allow the control of mode coupling and interference. This development would enable high-throughput communication, high-power beam delivery, and increased efficiency and functionality in nonlinear photonics. This work applies machine learning methodologies to predict key optical parameters of solid-core SAS-MCFs, including effective refractive index, mode effective area, inter-core crosstalk, and confinement loss. Artificial neural networks (ANNs) are trained on simulation datasets spanning relevant design ranges: wavelengths from 0.6 to 1.95
                    <jats:italic toggle="yes">μm</jats:italic>
                    , structural variations like relative refractive index (RI) of core-clad, Δ
                    <jats:sub>1</jats:sub>
                    between 0.5% and 1%, relative RI of clad-trench, Δ
                    <jats:sub>2</jats:sub>
                    between 0.98% and 0.34%, and fiber geometries comprising 14 cores arranged in two concentric rings. In contrast to traditional numerical solvers, our proposed direct neural network architecture enables rapid and accurate predictions for unseen fiber configurations, significantly reducing both computational time and the need for large-scale training datasets. The accuracy and efficiency of the proposed machine learning model are validated by comparing its results to those obtained from full-vector simulations using COMSOL Multiphysics. The findings confirm that the ANN-based approach offers a robust and computationally efficient tool for the optical characterization and design optimization of SAS-MCFs.
                  </jats:p>
title_cn: 机器学习方法预测同质多芯光纤叠加辅助结构的光学特性
abstract_cn:
<贾茨：p>
                    为了充分发挥数据承载能力增加的潜力，多芯光纤 (MCF) 的概念诞生了，即在单根光纤中具有多个芯。 MCF 采用叠加辅助结构 (SAS) 进行设计，可以控制模式耦合和干扰。这一发展将实现高通量通信、高功率光束传输以及非线性光子学的效率和功能的提高。这项工作应用机器学习方法来预测实芯 SAS-MCF 的关键光学参数，包括有效折射率、模式有效面积、芯间串扰和限制损耗。人工神经网络 (ANN) 在涵盖相关设计范围的模拟数据集上进行训练：波长从 0.6 到 1.95
                    <jats：斜体切换=“是”>微米</ jats：斜体>
                    ，结构变化，如纤芯包层的相对折射率 (RI)、Δ
                    <jats:sub>1</jats:sub>
                    0.5% 至 1% 之间，包层沟槽的相对 RI，Δ
                    <贾茨：子>2</贾茨：子>
                    介于 0.98% 和 0.34% 之间，光纤几何形状包括排列在两个同心环中的 14 个芯。与传统的数值求解器相比，我们提出的直接神经网络架构能够快速准确地预测看不见的光纤配置，从而显着减少计算时间和对大规模训练数据集的需求。通过将其结果与使用 COMSOL Multiphysics 进行全矢量模拟获得的结果进行比较，验证了所提出的机器学习模型的准确性和效率。研究结果证实，基于 ANN 的方法为 SAS-MCF 的光学表征和设计优化提供了强大且计算高效的工具。
                  </贾茨：p>

                    <jats:italic toggle="yes">nm/RIU</jats:italic>

                    detection applications.

title: Optical microcavity with a pair of suspended resonant mirrors
author: Mikkel Kirkegaard, Trishala Mitra, Gurpreet Singh, Aurélien Dantan
summary:
<jats:p>
                    We report the realization of an optical microcavity consisting of the plane-plane arrangement of two suspended
                    <jats:italic>resonant</jats:italic>
                    mirrors with spectrally overlapping high-quality-factor internal resonances. We first investigate its generic transmission spectra as the cavity length is varied based on a simple linear Fabry-Perot model, compare them with those of broadband mirror cavities or cavities possessing a single resonant mirror, and then present an experimental realization using a pair of highly pretensioned, ultrathin silicon nitride films patterned with one-dimensional photonic crystal structures.
                  </jats:p>

title: Solving the inverse problem in intensity correlation imaging: an attention U-net for SNR-robust image reconstruction
author: Xiyu Li, Shuai Liu, Sanfeng Hao, Xin Gao
summary:
<jats:p>
                    Intensity correlation imaging (ICI) holds significant promise for deep-space object recognition, yet faces fundamental limitations in low-photon regimes where only noise-corrupted spectral modulus measurements are obtainable. The critical challenge lies in solving the severely ill-posed inverse problem that concurrently requires spectral denoising and phase retrieval—a dual task where traditional Fourier iterative algorithms exhibit catastrophic performance degradation in low signal-to-noise-ratio (
                    <jats:italic>SNR</jats:italic>
                    ). To address this, we develop an end-to-end neural architecture that solves ill-posed inverse problems under photon-limited regimes (
                    <jats:italic>SNR</jats:italic>
                     ≥ 1). This establishes the first systematic framework for deep learning in ICI. The proposed model integrates an attention U-Net architecture with a multi-constrained joint optimization framework to achieve direct spatial reconstruction from spectral modulus measurements. This approach simultaneously addresses modulus denoising and phase recovery via unified frequency-space feature propagation. Numerical simulations across three satellite types show our method significantly outperforms conventional Fourier-based phase retrieval at SNR 1–10, preserving sub-pixel features in reconstructed images. This breakthrough establishes the first practical solution for ICI image reconstruction under photon-starved conditions, with immediate applications in on-orbit spacecraft characterization and deep-space situational awareness systems.
                  </jats:p>
title_cn: 解决强度相关成像中的逆问题：用于 SNR 鲁棒图像重建的注意力 U 网
abstract_cn:
<贾茨：p>
                    强度相关成像（ICI）对于深空物体识别具有重大前景，但在低光子范围内面临基本限制，在低光子范围内只能获得噪声破坏的光谱模量测量。关键的挑战在于解决严重不适定的反问题，该问题同时需要谱去噪和相位检索——这是一项双重任务，传统的傅立叶迭代算法在低信噪比下表现出灾难性的性能下降（
                    <jats:斜体>信噪比</jats:斜体>
                    ）。为了解决这个问题，我们开发了一种端到端的神经架构，可以解决光子限制条件下的不适定逆问题（
                    <jats:斜体>信噪比</jats:斜体>
                     ≥ 1）。这为ICI建立了第一个深度学习的系统框架。所提出的模型将注意力 U-Net 架构与多约束联合优化框架相集成，以实现从谱模量测量直接空间重建。该方法通过统一的频率空间特征传播同时解决模数去噪和相位恢复问题。三种卫星类型的数值模拟表明，我们的方法在 SNR 1-10 下显着优于传统的基于傅立叶的相位检索，保留了重建图像中的子像素特征。这一突破为光子匮乏条件下的 ICI 图像重建建立了第一个实用解决方案，可立即应用于在轨航天器表征和深空态势感知系统。
                  </贾茨：p>

title: Electrically driven MIM tunnel junctions for polarized light generation
author: Saurabh Kishen, Vinod Sharma, Jinal Tapar, Naresh Kumar Emani
summary:
<jats:p>
                    We numerically investigate electrically driven polarized light emission from metal–insulator–metal (MIM) tunnel junctions based on inelastic electron tunneling (IET). The device comprises an Ag–SiO
                    <jats:sub>2</jats:sub>
                    –Ag stack, where the top electrode is patterned into subwavelength nanoantennas to tailor the polarization state of the emitted light. Linearly polarized emission is achieved using paired rectangular nanoslit antennas, oriented to define the polarization axis. Full-wave simulations reveal a degree of linear polarization (DoLP) of 100%, indicating pure
                    <jats:italic toggle="yes">x</jats:italic>
                    - or
                    <jats:italic toggle="yes">y</jats:italic>
                    -polarized emission depending on the slot configuration. Circularly polarized light is obtained by employing a
                    <jats:italic toggle="yes">z</jats:italic>
                    -shaped chiral nanoantenna, yielding a degree of circular polarization (DoCP) of 0.35 at the resonance wavelength. Stokes parameters calculated from absorption cross-sections and dipole-based emission models confirm the strong polarization control enabled by nanoantenna geometry. These results demonstrate a compact, electrically driven platform for polarization-selective light generation, offering a viable route toward integrated, tunable polarization sources in nanophotonic and optoelectronic systems.
                  </jats:p>

title: Direct fiber-coupled soliton microcomb system with enhanced stability and reproducibility via high numerical-aperture polarization-maintaining single-mode fibers and temperature control
author: Miezel Talara, Yu Tokizane, Kodai Yamaji, Yudai Matsumura, Yoshihiro Makimoto, Kenji Nishimoto, Masayuki Higaki, Naoya Kuse, Takeshi Yasui
summary: <jats:p>We propose a relatively simple and robust system architecture for soliton microcomb generation, based on two key techniques: direct fiber coupling using high numerical-aperture polarization-maintaining single-mode fibers (high-NA PMFs) and active temperature control of the microresonator. These complementary strategies address two major challenges in microcomb implementation: environmental sensitivity and resonance instability. Building on prior work using single-mode fiber (SMF)-based direct coupling, which demonstrated device miniaturization and partial suppression of thermal drift in total fiber-to-fiber insertion loss, our PMF-based approach offers enhanced thermal stability and significantly greater robustness to environmental disturbances such as temperature fluctuations and vibration. In our system, the need for precision alignment using microscopes or multi-axis stages is alleviated, enabling a less complex optical setup and stable long-term operation. The direct coupling scheme achieved a total fiber-to-fiber insertion loss of 2.39 dB and maintained stable soliton operation for over 24 hours under external perturbations. In parallel, active temperature control of the microresonator was quantitatively evaluated, reducing the wavelength variation of the pump and auxiliary lasers by 79% and 97%, respectively. This stability enables reproducible soliton generation even in thermally dynamic environments. Comparative experiments with SMF-based direct coupling and lensed-SMF-based free-space coupling systems confirmed the superior performance of the PMF-based design in terms of coupling stability, soliton lifetime, and immunity to environmental noise. The architecture developed in this study lays a strong foundation for future integration into compact modules, with ongoing efforts aimed at reducing the reliance on laboratory-scale laser systems and optical components.</jats:p>
title_cn: 直接光纤耦合孤子微梳系统通过高数值孔径保偏单模光纤和温度控制增强稳定性和再现性
abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们提出了一种相对简单且稳健的孤子微梳生成系统架构，基于两项关键技术：使用高数值孔径保偏单模光纤（高数值孔径 PMF）的直接光纤耦合和微谐振器的主动温度控制。这些互补策略解决了微梳实施中的两个主要挑战：环境敏感性和共振不稳定性。我们基于 PMF 的方法基于使用基于单模光纤 (SMF) 的直接耦合的先前工作，该工作证明了设备小型化和对总光纤到光纤插入损耗中热漂移的部分抑制，从而提供了增强的热稳定性以及对温度波动和振动等环境干扰的显着增强的鲁棒性。在我们的系统中，减少了使用显微镜或多轴平台进行精确对准的需求，从而实现了不太复杂的光学设置和稳定的长期运行。直接耦合方案实现了2.39 dB的总光纤到光纤插入损耗，并在外部扰动下保持稳定的孤子运行超过24小时。同时，对微谐振器的主动温度控制进行了定量评估，将泵浦激光器和辅助激光器的波长变化分别减少了 79% 和 97%。即使在热动态环境中，这种稳定性也能实现可重复的孤子生成。基于 SMF 的直接耦合系统和基于透镜 SMF 的自由空间耦合系统的比较实验证实了基于 PMF 的设计在耦合稳定性、孤子寿命和抗环境噪声方面的优越性能。本研究开发的架构为未来集成到紧凑型模块中奠定了坚实的基础，并不断努力减少对实验室规模激光系统和光学组件的依赖。</jats:p>

title: Simultaneous real-time multispectral fluorescence and reflectance imaging for enhanced intraoperative guidance
author: Kyriakos Pentarakis, George Kakavelakis, Constantinos Petridis, George Themelis
summary: <jats:p>Intraoperative fluorescence imaging enhances surgical precision, but current systems require switching between anatomical and fluorescence views, disrupting workflow and forcing surgeons to mentally overlay separate images. We developed a dual-sensor multispectral imaging system that uniquely enables simultaneous visualization of full-color anatomy and multiple fluorescence signals (protoporphyrin IX, fluorescein sodium, and indocyanine green) in real-time, a capability not available in existing surgical platforms. By employing custom optical filters and linear unmixing algorithms, the system captures all imaging modes concurrently, providing perfectly co-registered anatomical and fluorescence information in a single unified view. Phantom validation demonstrated accurate fluorophore separation while maintaining color fidelity for tissue visualization. This approach eliminates mode-switching delays and mental image fusion, streamlining surgical workflow with a practical platform designed for clinical integration.</jats:p>
title_cn: 同时实时多光谱荧光和反射成像，增强术中指导
abstract_cn: <jat:p>术中荧光成像提高了手术精度，但当前的系统需要在解剖视图和荧光视图之间切换，这会扰乱工作流程并迫使外科医生在心里叠加单独的图像。我们开发了一种双传感器多光谱成像系统，能够实时同步显示全彩色解剖结构和多种荧光信号（原卟啉 IX、荧光素钠和吲哚菁绿），这是现有手术平台所不具备的功能。通过采用定制光学滤波器和线性解混合算法，该系统可以同时捕获所有成像模式，从而在单个统一视图中提供完美共同配准的解剖和荧光信息。体模验证证明了准确的荧光团分离，同时保持了组织可视化的颜色保真度。这种方法消除了模式切换延迟和心理图像融合，通过专为临床集成设计的实用平台简化了手术工作流程。</jats:p>

title: Analytical study of the effect of refractive index and scattering angle on the light scattering ratio of aerosol particles
author: Haibin Wang, Xueying Bai, Jinhao Li, Yvcheng Dong, Li Deng, Quanyi Liu
summary: <jats:p>The precision of fire detection technology is essential for protecting lives and property, with the light scattering characteristics of aerosol particles being critical factors influencing the performance of fire detection systems. This study employs Mie scattering theory to analyze the light scattering ratio in fire detection, examining the effects of refractive index and scattering angle on aerosol particles to enhance fire detection technology. The findings reveal that scattering efficiencies vary with refractive index and size parameters, while extinction efficiencies are closely linked to these factors. Additionally, the study highlights the significant impact of scattering angle combinations on light scattering ratios, emphasizing the potential advantages of multi-wavelength detection technology in accurately identifying smoke particles and reducing false alarm rates.</jats:p>
title_cn: 折射率和散射角对气溶胶颗粒光散射比影响的分析研究
abstract_cn: <jats:p>火灾探测技术的精度对于保护生命和财产至关重要，而气溶胶颗粒的光散射特性是影响火灾探测系统性能的关键因素。本研究采用米氏散射理论来分析火灾探测中的光散射比，考察折射率和散射角对气溶胶颗粒的影响，以提高火灾探测技术。研究结果表明，散射效率随折射率和尺寸参数而变化，而消光效率与这些因素密切相关。此外，研究还强调了散射角度组合对光散射比的显着影响，强调了多波长探测技术在准确识别烟雾颗粒、降低误报率方面的潜在优势。</jats:p>

title:
Watt-level actively Q-switched intracavity frequency-doubled Pr:LiYF
                    <sub>4</sub>
                    laser at 261 nm
author: Zihao Tong, Lei Zhu, Changsheng Zheng, Kui Wu, Yongguang Zhao, Zhengping Wang, Haohai Yu, Huaijin Zhang
summary: <jats:p>We report on a watt-level nanosecond 261-nm laser from an acousto-optically Q-switched visible Pr:YLF laser through intracavity second-harmonic generation (SHG). By implementing direct water-cooling for thermal management and an intracavity mirror for double-passing nonlinear crystal, a maximum average power of 1.03 W has been achieved at a repetition rate of 40 kHz, which, to the best of our knowledge, is the highest power ever reported from an intracavity-frequency-doubled pulsed, short-wave ultraviolet (UV-C) laser at 261 nm. Decreasing the repetition rate to 20 kHz, a single-pulse energy of 43.4 µJ can be obtained. This approach with a robust and simple structure demonstrates a promising way toward the direct generation of high-power UVC laser pulses.</jats:p>
title_cn: 瓦特级主动调Q腔内倍频Pr:LiYF <sub>4</sub>激光器，波长261 nm
abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们报告了通过腔内二次谐波产生 (SHG) 的声光 Q 开关可见 Pr:YLF 激光器产生的瓦特级纳秒 261 nm 激光器。通过实施用于热管理的直接水冷和用于双通非线性晶体的腔内反射镜，在 40 kHz 的重复频率下实现了 1.03 W 的最大平均功率，据我们所知，这是迄今为止报道的 261 nm 腔内倍频脉冲短波紫外 (UV-C) 激光器的最高功率。将重复频率降低至 20 kHz，可以获得 43.4 µJ 的单脉冲能量。这种结构坚固且简单的方法展示了直接生成高功率 UVC 激光脉冲的一种有前途的方法。</jats:p>

title: Evaluation of the coupling efficiency of large-diameter nanofiber Bragg cavities
author: Kengo Sakamoto, Konosuke Shimazaki, Hideaki Takashima, Shigeki Takeuchi
summary: <jats:p>We analyze the coupling efficiency of a single dipole with a nanofiber Bragg cavity (NFBC) for single photon sources. Conventionally, NFBC diameters are set at approximately half of the emission wavelength to maximize coupling efficiency, but these thin structures are fragile at low temperatures. By employing three-dimensional finite difference time domain simulations, we investigate NFBCs with diameters ranging from 450 to 600 nm, which offer more mechanical robustness. Our results show that NFBCs with diameters of 450 and 500 nm achieve coupling efficiencies exceeding 80%. This study paves the way for practical single-photon sources with enhanced mechanical stability, which is crucial for applications in quantum networks and quantum computing.</jats:p>
title_cn: 大直径纳米纤维布拉格腔耦合效率评估
abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们分析了单偶极子与纳米纤维布拉格腔 (NFBC) 对于单光子源的耦合效率。传统上，NFBC 直径设置为发射波长的大约一半，以最大限度地提高耦合效率，但这些薄结构在低温下很脆弱。通过采用三维有限差分时域模拟，我们研究了直径范围为 450 至 600 nm 的 NFBC，它们具有更高的机械鲁棒性。我们的结果表明，直径为 450 和 500 nm 的 NFBC 实现了超过 80% 的耦合效率。这项研究为具有增强机械稳定性的实用单光子源铺平了道路，这对于量子网络和量子计算中的应用至关重要。</jats:p>

title: Spectral-spatial feature fusion of hyperspectral imaging for skin lesion classification
author: Eunbin Kim, Yoosang Baek, Onseok Lee
summary: <jats:p>Atopic dermatitis (AD) is a chronic inflammatory skin disease characterized by poorly defined borders and a widespread distribution. Clinical evaluations of AD commonly rely on surface imaging, limiting insight into subsurface skin changes. This study investigates the utility of hyperspectral imaging for visualizing subsurface skin changes and identifying optimal data combinations to assess AD severity. A feature-level fusion model was constructed to extract both spectral and spatial features across different skin layers. The classification performance of each configuration was analyzed to assess its effectiveness in determining the severity of AD. The combination of Range C (750–900 nm) and spatial features achieved the best severity classification performance among the fusion models, yielding an accuracy of 0.95 ± 0.07. Combinations including Range C consistently outperformed the others, suggesting that this spectral band significantly contributed to accurate severity assessment. This study advances AD evaluation by shifting from surface-focused methods to a multilayered approach that incorporates deep structural information.</jats:p>
title_cn: 高光谱成像光谱空间特征融合用于皮肤病变分类
abstract_cn: <jats:p>特应性皮炎 (AD) 是一种慢性炎症性皮肤病，其特征是边界不清且分布广泛。 AD 的临床评估通常依赖于表面成像，限制了对皮下皮肤变化的了解。本研究调查了高光谱成像在可视化皮下皮肤变化和确定评估 AD 严重程度的最佳数据组合方面的效用。构建了特征级融合模型来提取不同皮肤层的光谱和空间特征。对每种配置的分类性能进行了分析，以评估其在确定 AD 严重程度方面的有效性。范围 C (750–900 nm) 和空间特征的组合在融合模型中实现了最佳的严重性分类性能，准确度为 0.95 ± 0.07。包括范围 C 在内的组合始终优于其他组合，表明该光谱带对准确的严重性评估有显着贡献。这项研究通过从表面聚焦方法转向包含深层结构信息的多层方法，推进了 AD 评估。</jats:p>

title: Case study of a coherent FSO system with adaptive modulation: performance analysis in Isfahan
author: Masoud Deyranlou, Alireza Maleki Javan
summary: <jats:p>Free space optics (FSO) systems provide high-speed wireless communication but are vulnerable to atmospheric attenuation and weather variations. This paper presents a coherent FSO system with adaptive code modulation (ACM), evaluated under the climate conditions of Isfahan, Iran. The system dynamically switches between 16QAM, 4QAM, and PAM according to real-time SNR to maintain link reliability. Results show 40 Gbps performance over 1 km during dry and hazy periods and 10 Gbps over 6 km during fog and snow. The approach achieves 92% annual link availability with seamless modulation transitions, demonstrating suitability for reliable, high-capacity communication in arid environments.</jats:p>
title_cn: 具有自适应调制的相干 FSO 系统案例研究：伊斯法罕的性能分析
abstract_cn: <jats:p>自由空间光学 (FSO) 系统提供高速无线通信，但容易受到大气衰减和天气变化的影响。本文提出了一种采用自适应编码调制 (ACM) 的相干 FSO 系统，并在伊朗伊斯法罕的气候条件下进行了评估。系统根据实时信噪比在16QAM、4QAM、PAM之间动态切换，保持链路可靠性。结果显示，在干燥和雾霾期间，1 公里范围内的性能为 40 Gbps，在雾和雪期间，6 公里范围内的性能为 10 Gbps。该方法通过无缝调制转换实现了 92% 的年度链路可用性，证明了在干旱环境中可靠、大容量通信的适用性。</jats:p>

title: Anti-interference frequency stabilization algorithm with a large locking range based on compound differentiation
author: Yupeng Wu, Kai Ma, Wenxi Zhang
summary: <jats:p>Stabilizing the frequency of free-running lasers is crucial for high-precision optical measurements. However, this process is susceptible to environmental interference and device power noise. In this study, we present a robust anti-interference algorithm based on compound differentiation. This algorithm effectively mitigates power noise from the light source, including noise arising from modulation and circuitry. The effectiveness of the algorithm is experimentally verified. Additionally, we introduce a frequency-deviation demodulation algorithm that leverages specific power-point combinations. The feasibility of this approach is supported by simulations. Furthermore, the algorithm is designed to be compatible with other frequency stabilization systems that do not require wavelength selectivity.</jats:p>
title_cn: 基于复合微分的大锁定范围抗干扰稳频算法
abstract_cn: <jats:p>稳定自由运行激光器的频率对于高精度光学测量至关重要。然而，这个过程容易受到环境干扰和设备电源噪声的影响。在本研究中，我们提出了一种基于复合微分的鲁棒抗干扰算法。该算法有效地减轻了光源的功率噪声，包括调制和电路产生的噪声。实验验证了算法的有效性。此外，我们还引入了一种利用特定功率点组合的频偏解调算法。该方法的可行性得到了模拟的支持。此外，该算法设计为与其他不需要波长选择性的稳频系统兼容。</jats:p>

title: Misalignment problem and solution of underwater wireless optical communication
author: Ke Wen, Weidong Zhang, Lulu Wang, Yaping Li, Yanli Zhao
summary: <jats:p>In this paper, we analyze the causes and impacts of the misalignment problem in underwater wireless optical communication (UWOC) that arises from the non-common aperture between the optical communication subsystem and the optical alignment subsystem. Subsequently, we propose a new solution that utilizes a dual-spiral position-sensitive detector (PSD). By designing the diameter of the received light spot to match the width D of the spiral PSD, analysis indicates that when the deviation of the spot size remains within 10%, the measurement error for the spot position stays below 2%.</jats:p>
title_cn: 水下无线光通信失准问题及解决方案
abstract_cn: <jats:p>在本文中，我们分析了水下无线光通信（UWOC）中由于光通信子系统和光对准子系统之间的非公共孔径而引起的未对准问题的原因和影响。随后，我们提出了一种利用双螺旋位置敏感探测器（PSD）的新解决方案。通过设计接收光斑的直径以匹配螺旋PSD的宽度D，分析表明，当光斑尺寸的偏差保持在10%以内时，光斑位置的测量误差保持在2%以下。</jats:p>

title: Effect of Fabry-Perot structure on electroabsorption and quadratic electro-optic modulation in the nonconjugated conductive polymer iodine-doped polyethylene terephthalate
author: Mrinal Thakur, Kirthana Govula
summary: <jats:p>Electroabsorption in the nonconjugated conductive polymer iodine-doped polyethylene terephthalate (PET) has been measured at 633 nm wavelength. An AC field at 4 kHz was used, and the transmission change was measured using lock-in detection. The imaginary part of the Kerr coefficient was determined from the electroabsorption data and was found to be exceptionally large, comparable to other nonconjugated conductive polymers. These large magnitudes are due to the subnanometer-sized quantum dots in these systems. At higher electric fields and /or higher doping levels, we observed enhanced modulations, hysteresis, and bistability caused by Fabry-Perot structure in the PET samples. These effects were recorded in electroabsorption and quadratic electro-optic modulation. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first time electric field-induced hysteresis / bistability has been observed for a plastic film.</jats:p>
title_cn: 法布里-珀罗结构对非共轭导电聚合物碘掺杂聚对苯二甲酸乙二醇酯电吸收和二次电光调制的影响
abstract_cn: <jat:p>在 633nm 波长下测量了非共轭导电聚合物碘掺杂聚对苯二甲酸乙二醇酯 (PET) 的电吸收。使用 4 kHz 的交流场，并使用锁定检测来测量传输变化。克尔系数的虚部是根据电吸收数据确定的，与其他非共轭导电聚合物相比，克尔系数的虚部非常大。这些巨大的量级是由于这些系统中的亚纳米尺寸的量子点造成的。在更高的电场和/或更高的掺杂水平下，我们观察到 PET 样品中法布里-珀罗结构引起的调制、滞后和双稳态增强。这些效应被记录在电吸收和二次电光调制中。据我们所知，这是第一次在塑料薄膜中观察到电场引起的磁滞/双稳态。</jats:p>
