title: Learned perturbation-based digital backpropagation with low complexity for nonlinearity compensation
author: Alexey Redyuk, Evgeny Shevelev, Vitaly Danilko, Timur Bazarov, Maksim Senko, Leonid Samodelkin, Oleg Nanii, Vladimir Treshchikov, Mikhail Fedoruk
summary: <jats:p>Optical fiber communication systems play a crucial role in providing high-speed data transmission, forming the backbone of modern digital services and computational infrastructure. Further increases in data rates and transmission distances require higher signal power, which in turn amplifies the detrimental effects of fiber nonlinearity. However, developing a method that effectively compensates for nonlinear signal distortions while balancing performance and computational complexity remains an open challenge. Traditional approaches, such as digital backpropagation (DBP) and perturbation-based models (PBM), offer certain advantages but also have drawbacks that limit their practical implementation. In this work, we propose a low complexity perturbation-based digital backpropagation (PB-DBP) method to compensate for intrachannel nonlinearity. We introduce a novel approach that combines the DBP structure with an advanced PBM-based nonlinear effects model, using machine learning techniques to optimize compensation scheme parameters and improve the trade-off between accuracy and computational complexity. We present experimental results that demonstrate the performance of the proposed method, together with a comparative analysis based on data from a 20×100 km dispersion uncompensated fiber link with a dual-polarization QPSK signal. The results show that the proposed PB-DBP achieves an 1.6 dB signal-to-noise ratio improvement compared to compensation of only linear distortions, and an improvement of 0.26 dB compared to the enhanced DBP method.</jats:p>
title_cn: 用于非线性补偿的低复杂度的基于学习扰动的数字反向传播
abstract_cn: <jats:p>光纤通信系统在提供高速数据传输、形成现代数字服务和计算基础设施的骨干方面发挥着至关重要的作用。数据速率和传输距离的进一步增加需要更高的信号功率，这反过来又放大了光纤非线性的有害影响。然而，开发一种有效补偿非线性信号失真，同时平衡性能和计算复杂性的方法仍然是一个悬而未决的挑战。数字反向传播 (DBP) 和基于扰动的模型 (PBM) 等传统方法具有一定的优势，但也存在限制其实际实施的缺点。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种低复杂度的基于扰动的数字反向传播（PB-DBP）方法来补偿通道内非线性。我们引入了一种新颖的方法，将 DBP 结构与先进的基于 PBM 的非线性效应模型相结合，使用机器学习技术来优化补偿方案参数并改善精度和计算复杂性之间的权衡。我们提出的实验结果证明了所提出方法的性能，并基于来自具有双偏振 QPSK 信号的 20×100 km 色散未补偿光纤链路的数据进行了比较分析。结果表明，与仅补偿线性失真相比，所提出的PB-DBP信噪比提高了1.6 dB，与增强型DBP方法相比，信噪比提高了0.26 dB。</jats:p>

title: Enhancing limited-view photoacoustic vascular images via non-linear Lucy-Richardson deconvolution
author: Pooja A. Nair, Anuj Deshpande, Sikhakolli Sravan Kumar, Shivasubramanian Gopinath, Vineela Chandra Dodda, Lakshmi Kuruguntla, Inbarasan Muniraj
summary: <jats:p>Photoacoustic microscopy (PAM) is often implemented with a reduced number of sensors to minimize system complexity and cost. However, this results in sparse data acquisition and limited-view detection, which introduces severe artifacts and degrades image quality, consequently hindering the accurate visualization of fine vascular structures. In this study, we propose to use a hybrid image reconstruction framework that combines a nonlinear Lucy-Richardson deconvolution algorithm with an adaptive Kalman filter to enhance vascular detail under limited-view conditions. The proposed method is evaluated using an optical-resolution PAM dataset, demonstrating improved reconstruction fidelity and diagnostic accuracy for both preclinical and clinical imaging applications. Additionally, we benchmark our approach against a recently developed Swin Transformer-based image restoration model to assess its effectiveness in enhancing image clarity and vascular structure delineation. Compared to noisy PAM vessel images, the proposed method achieves a reduction of up to 95% in mean squared error (MSE) and nearly a 97% improvement in structural similarity index measure (SSIM).</jats:p>
title_cn: 通过非线性 Lucy-Richardson 反卷积增强有限视角光声血管图像
abstract_cn: <jats:p>光声显微镜 (PAM) 通常通过减少传感器数量来实现，以最大限度地降低系统复杂性和成本。然而，这会导致稀疏的数据采集和有限的视图检测，从而引入严重的伪影并降低图像质量，从而阻碍精细血管结构的准确可视化。在本研究中，我们建议使用混合图像重建框架，该框架将非线性 Lucy-Richardson 反卷积算法与自适应卡尔曼滤波器相结合，以在有限视图条件下增强血管细节。使用光学分辨率 PAM 数据集对所提出的方法进行了评估，证明了临床前和临床成像应用的重建保真度和诊断准确性得到了提高。此外，我们将我们的方法与最近开发的基于 Swin Transformer 的图像恢复模型进行基准测试，以评估其在增强图像清晰度和血管结构描绘方面的有效性。与噪声 PAM 血管图像相比，该方法的均方误差 (MSE) 降低了 95%，结构相似性指数 (SSIM) 提高了近 97%。</jats:p>

title: Optical vortex laser drawing of silver nano-ink paste
author: Muneaki Iwata, Akihiko Kaneko, Ken-Ichi Yuyama, Takashige Omatsu
summary: <jats:p>We perform the direct printing of silver (Ag) nano-ink paste lines by utilizing the optical vortex laser-induced forward transfer technique (referred to as OV-LIFT), in combination with the triple scan technique. Lines with centimeter-scale length and width in the range 62∼92 µm, and an electric volume resistivity of ∼23 µΩ·cm (without the need for sintering) is demonstrated.</jats:p>
title_cn: 银纳米墨浆的光学涡旋激光绘图
abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们利用光学涡旋激光诱导正向转移技术（简称OV-LIFT）结合三重扫描技术来直接打印银（Ag）纳米油墨浆线。展示了长度和宽度在 62∼92 μm 范围内的厘米级线，以及 ∼23 µΩ·cm 的体积电阻率（无需烧结）。</jats:p>

title: Analytical solution for the field lines of dipole radiation energy flow in a dissipating host medium
author: Henk F. Arnoldus
summary:
<jats:p>
                    We have studied the power flow out of a linear dipole embedded in an absorbing host medium. An analytical solution for the flow lines of energy has been obtained. It appears that field lines come in two types. Field lines of the first kind run from the dipole to infinity. Near the dipole, the field lines are curved, and in the far field, they approach asymptotically straight lines. These field lines are similar to the free-space field lines, with the exception that there is curving in the near field due to dissipation in the material. Field lines of the second kind curve out of the dipole and end on the dipole axis, which is a singular line of the flow field. There exists a transition field line, separating the field lines of the first and the second kind. We have shown that all field lines emanate from the dipole in a direction perpendicular to the dipole axis, and we have shown that field lines of the second kind hit the dipole axis under 90
                    <jats:sup>∘</jats:sup>
                    . A simplified expression has been derived for the practical case of small damping in the material.

title: Nano-enhancement of the machine learning assisted laser-induced breakdown spectroscopic analysis of human blood serum samples for breast cancer detection
author: Ayesha Israr, Hafeez Anwar, Sajid Bashir, Muhammad Zahid, Yasir Jamil
summary: <jats:p>Detecting cancer early is crucial for successful therapy and improved survival rates. In our study, we classified cancerous and non-cancerous blood serum samples using ML and nano-enhancement techniques. Both supervised (decision tree, discriminant analysis, regression, ensemble, SVM, KNN, and NN) and unsupervised (PCA) ML algorithms were employed for elemental detection and classification. The blood used for LIBS analysis was intravenous blood from patients. The serum was separated by centrifuging the blood at 4000 rpm for 15 minutes. Additionally, we applied nano-enhanced LIBS (NE-LIBS) to achieve higher accuracy. Au-nanoparticles were synthesized through laser ablation. SPR and band gap of Au-nanoparticles were measured from their UV absorption spectrum. Using micro-drops of these nanoparticles, we significantly enhanced the detection of trace elements in the LIBS signal of serum samples. Notably, the testing accuracy improved across various ML algorithms: decision tree (87.3% to 93.9%), discriminant analysis (85.5% to 99.1%), logistic regression (86.8% to 98%), naïve Bayes (85.1% to 93.9%), SVM (86.6% to 99.3%), KNN (90.1% to 98.5%), Ensemble Learning (85.5% to 98.7%), and neural networks (91.4% to 98.7%). Furthermore, our unsupervised approach by applying PCA revealed distinct clusters for both serum types. This innovative approach will assist physicians in making treatment recommendations for patients with various cancers in the early stages.</jats:p>
title_cn: 机器学习辅助激光诱导击穿光谱分析的纳米增强用于乳腺癌检测
abstract_cn: <jats:p>早期发现癌症对于成功治疗和提高生存率至关重要。在我们的研究中，我们使用机器学习和纳米增强技术对癌性和非癌性血清样本进行分类。元素检测和分类采用有监督（决策树、判别分析、回归、集成、SVM、KNN 和 NN）和无监督 (PCA) ML 算法。用于LIBS分析的血液是来自患者的静脉血。将血液以4000rpm离心15分钟，分离血清。此外，我们应用纳米增强型 LIBS (NE-LIBS) 来实现更高的精度。通过激光烧蚀合成金纳米粒子。 Au 纳米颗粒的 SPR 和带隙是通过其紫外吸收光谱测量的。使用这些纳米颗粒的微滴，我们显着增强了血清样品 LIBS 信号中微量元素的检测。值得注意的是，各种机器学习算法的测试准确性均有所提高：决策树（87.3% 至 93.9%）、判别分析（85.5% 至 99.1%）、逻辑回归（86.8% 至 98%）、朴素贝叶斯（85.1% 至 93.9%）、SVM（86.6% 至 99.3%）、KNN（90.1% 至 90.1%） 98.5%）、集成学习（85.5% 至 98.7%）和神经网络（91.4% 至 98.7%）。此外，我们通过应用 PCA 的无监督方法揭示了两种血清类型的不同簇。这种创新方法将帮助医生为各种早期癌症患者提出治疗建议。</jats:p>

title: High-speed narrow linewidth All-PM dispersive swept source for real-time FBG sensor interrogation
author: N. Vaish, P. Long, M. R. K. Soltanian, F. Légaré, L. R. Chen
summary: <jats:p>We present an environmentally stable, all-polarization-maintaining (PM) dispersion-based swept source system optimized for narrow linewidth and high-speed wavelength scanning, specifically tailored for fiber Bragg grating (FBG) sensor interrogation. The system integrates a chirped fiber Bragg grating (CFBG) as a highly dispersive element to balance scan speed and spectral resolution, enabling a compact cavity design and stable lasing. The laser achieves precise wavelength tuning over a 40 nm range in the telecom C-band, linewidth around 12 MHz, and an impressive scanning speed exceeding 3 MHz with stable output power of over 20 mW, outperforming mechanically tuned lasers. The all-PM design ensures robustness against environmental perturbations. We validate the performance through static and dynamic characterization, including linewidth narrowing via the spatial hole burning effect. Furthermore, we demonstrate its application in the interrogation of FBG sensor arrays in wavelength division multiplexing (WDM), time division multiplexing (TDM), and hybrid modes, as well as real-time dynamic strain sensing up to 1kHz. These results position the system as a scalable and robust solution for applications requiring rapid spectral acquisition and fine resolution, such as border security, biomedical imaging, and structural health monitoring.</jats:p>
title_cn: 用于实时 FBG 传感器询问的高速窄线宽全保偏色散扫频源
abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们提出了一种环境稳定、基于全保偏 (PM) 色散的扫频光源系统，针对窄线宽和高速波长扫描进行了优化，专为光纤布拉格光栅 (FBG) 传感器询问而定制。该系统集成了啁啾光纤布拉格光栅（CFBG）作为高色散元件，以平衡扫描速度和光谱分辨率，从而实现紧凑的腔体设计和稳定的激光发射。该激光器在电信 C 波段实现了 40 nm 范围内的精确波长调谐，线宽约为 12 MHz，扫描速度超过 3 MHz，稳定输出功率超过 20 mW，性能优于机械调谐激光器。全 PM 设计确保了对环境扰动的鲁棒性。我们通过静态和动态表征来验证性能，包括通过空间烧孔效应缩小线宽。此外，我们还展示了其在波分复用 (WDM)、时分复用 (TDM) 和混合模式中询问 FBG 传感器阵列以及高达 1kHz 的实时动态应变传感中的应用。这些结果使该系统成为一种可扩展且强大的解决方案，适用于需要快速光谱采集和精细分辨率的应用，例如边境安全、生物医学成像和结构健康监测。</jats:p>

title: Anisotropic dual-band mid infrared absorber using graphene–black phosphorene nanocrescents
author: Zeinab Zanbouri, Mohammad Sabaeian
summary: <jats:p>We propose and numerically investigate an anisotropic dual-band infrared absorber based on a hybrid graphene–black phosphorus nanocrescent architecture. The designed metastructure exhibits two spectrally distinct and polarization-dependent absorption peaks with efficiencies exceeding 85%, arising from strong plasmon–polariton hybridization and anisotropic charge carrier dynamics. Graphene contributes tunable surface plasmon resonances through electrostatic gating, while black phosphorus provides in-plane anisotropy and broadband light–matter interaction. Finite-element method (FEM) simulations reveal that the absorption response can be actively modulated by adjusting the graphene Fermi level and the geometric parameters of the nanocrescent, enabling dynamic control over the resonance wavelengths. The proposed absorber operates in the mid-infrared range, making it highly promising for applications in molecular sensing, photodetection, and tunable optoelectronic devices. Our results highlight the potential of combining two-dimensional materials with engineered plasmonic nanostructures to realize multifunctional, reconfigurable, and polarization-sensitive infrared photonic devices.</jats:p>
title_cn: 使用石墨烯-黑磷烯纳米月牙的各向异性双波段中红外吸收体
abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们提出并数值研究了一种基于混合石墨烯-黑磷纳米月牙结构的各向异性双波段红外吸收器。设计的元结构表现出两个光谱上不同且与偏振相关的吸收峰，其效率超过 85%，这是由强等离激元-极化子杂化和各向异性电荷载流子动力学产生的。石墨烯通过静电门控提供可调谐的表面等离子体共振，而黑磷则提供面内各向异性和宽带光-物质相互作用。有限元法（FEM）模拟表明，可以通过调整石墨烯费米能级和纳米月牙的几何参数来主动调制吸收响应，从而实现对共振波长的动态控制。所提出的吸收器在中红外范围内工作，使其在分子传感、光电检测和可调谐光电器件中的应用非常有前景。我们的研究结果凸显了将二维材料与工程等离子体纳米结构相结合以实现多功能、可重构和偏振敏感的红外光子器件的潜力。</jats:p>

title: Smartphone near-UV colorimeter for low-cost detection of adulteration of edible oils
author: Mohiminur Rahman Ifty, Md. Sadik Al Rayhan, Khaled Bin Easin, Arnab Talukder, Md Arafat Hossain, Protik Chandra Biswas
summary:
<jats:p>
                    A smartphone-based near ultraviolet (UV) colorimeter is demonstrated for the first time using an external UV LED source (
                    <jats:italic toggle="yes">Δλ</jats:italic>
                     ≈  365 − 415 nm) and the inbuilt CMOS camera of a smartphone. The UV LED is powered directly via a micro-USB on-the-go (OTG) cable, while a customized 3D-printed PLA enclosure ensures precise alignment of optical elements and sample positioning. The transmitted UV light through the sample is captured by different smartphone cameras, and a custom app processes the image to quantify absorbance. The ultra-low-cost (∼$4) and lightweight (∼198 g) colorimeter is compatible with both Android and iOS platforms and requires no external computing hardware. Beyond local computation, the system integrates a cloud-assisted reporting feature that transmits test results, including GPS coordinates and captured images, for geospatial visualization and remote monitoring, enabling large-scale traceability of food samples. Performance of the instrument is evaluated through determination of extra virgin olive oil (EVO) adulteration in blends with refined olive oil, soybean oil, and palm oil, showing a strong correlation with commercial UV–Vis spectroscopy and an average detection accuracy of 94.98% relative to standard measurements. Cross-adulteration in cases such as palm oil in soybean oil and soybean oil in refined olive oil was also effectively identified by the device. Furthermore, pigment degradation under sunlight exposure is effectively monitored, highlighting the system’s potential in food authentication and quality monitoring.
                  </jats:p>

title: Three-dimensional shape-aware measurement of choroidal thickness in OCT images
author: Shingo Tamachi, Takayuki Okamoto, Takehito Iwase, Tomohiro Niizawa, Yuto Kawamata, Hirotaka Yokouchi, Takayuki Baba, Hideaki Haneishi
summary: <jats:p>The choroid is a dense vascular layer located between the retina and sclera. Recent advances in optical coherence tomography (OCT), which enables non-invasive visualization of three-dimensional (3D) internal structures, have revealed associations between morphological changes and ocular diseases. Among these, choroidal thickness has been extensively investigated as a particularly important parameter. Choroidal thickness is typically measured perpendicularly from the upper to lower boundaries of the choroid, but most conventional measurement methods rely on two-dimensional cross-sectional OCT images and do not sufficiently account for 3D deformation of the choroidal morphology or the curvature of the eye, which may lead to discrepancies from the true anatomical structure. In this study, we propose a method for automatically measuring choroidal thickness from 3D OCT. The proposed method calculates thickness by estimating a normal vector from an arbitrary point on the upper choroidal boundary while considering the surrounding surface geometry using a principal component analysis-based approach. Experimental results using clinical data from patients with central serous chorioretinopathy (CSC) before and after photodynamic therapy show that the proposed method provides anatomically reasonable measurements, as qualitatively verified by ophthalmologists. Choroidal thickness maps generated by integrating the measurement results across all points demonstrated post-treatment reductions in choroidal thickness in patients with CSC before and after photodynamic therapy.</jats:p>
title_cn: OCT 图像中脉络膜厚度的三维形状感知测量
abstract_cn: <jats:p>脉络膜是位于视网膜和巩膜之间的致密血管层。光学相干断层扫描 (OCT) 的最新进展可以实现三维 (3D) 内部结构的非侵入性可视化，揭示了形态变化与眼部疾病之间的关联。其中，脉络膜厚度作为一个特别重要的参数已被广泛研究。脉络膜厚度通常从脉络膜的上边界到下边界垂直测量，但大多数传统测量方法依赖于二维横截面 OCT 图像，并不能充分考虑脉络膜形态或眼睛曲率的 3D 变形，这可能导致与真实解剖结构的差异。在本研究中，我们提出了一种通过 3D OCT 自动测量脉络膜厚度的方法。该方法通过估计脉络膜上边界上任意点的法向矢量来计算厚度，同时使用基于主成分分析的方法考虑周围表面的几何形状。使用光动力治疗前后中心性浆液性脉络膜视网膜病变（CSC）患者的临床数据进行的实验结果表明，所提出的方法提供了解剖学上合理的测量结果，并得到了眼科医生的定性验证。通过整合所有点的测量结果生成的脉络膜厚度图表明，CSC 患者在光动力治疗前后脉络膜厚度减少。</jats:p>

title: Study of the computational insights and the nonlinear optical properties of scandium (sc) and titanium (Ti) doped benzocryptand by the DFT approach
author: Muhammad Ismaeel, Muhammad Hanan, Qasim Ali, Haiqa Javed, Aurangzeb, Ali Raza Ayub, Hafiz Junaid Akbar, Javed Iqbal, M. Shabir Mahr
summary:
<jats:p>
                    Nonlinear optical (NLO) materials are at the forefront in the field of optics and laser-based devices. The search for NLO materials continues and has attracted great attention to designing and fabricating remarkable materials with improved electro-optical properties. Herein, we present the geometric, electronic, and nonlinear optical properties of a theoretically designed benzo-cryptand (BC) doped with transition metals. It was found by frontier molecular orbital (FMO) analysis that transition metals with polarized electrons are located on the HOMO. Doping strategies enhanced charge transfer by lowering the energy bandgap to a range of 0.72 to 2.09 eV, significantly below the 5.41 eV gap of pure BC. All newly designed complexes are predicted to be stable by their negative energy interaction values. Various analysis like the density of state (DOS), electron density difference map (EDDM), transition density matrix (TDM), and natural bond orbital (NBO) analysis, were done to examine properties of charge transfer. Non-covalent interactions (NCI) and quantum theory of atoms in molecules (QTAIM) analysis were performed to investigate the intermolecular interactions in all molecules. The TD-DFT computation reveals that the designed complexes have maximum absorption ranging from 2100 to 7400 nm in the IR and visible regions, while they are opaque in the UV region. Hyperpolarizability and polarizability increased in doped systems due to low excitation energy and excess electrons. Owing to the increase in isotropic linear polarizability, the complexes kept significant optoelectronic properties ranging from 526.51 to 945.69 au. Also, the first hyperpolarizability of these systems was remarkably large (

                    ), ranging from 15219.99–146401.37 au. This study revealed that transition metals doped benzo-cryptand can be used as a competitive of brilliant non-linear optical traits along with practical applications in the field of optoelectronics.

title: Design of the lightweight large-aperture night vision imaging system based on wavefront coding
author: Yiming Ying, Bo Yang, Qianjin Wang
summary: <jats:p>To meet the requirements of clear imaging in low-light environments, the system necessitates a large aperture design and multi-band imaging capability. Addressing the challenges of shallow depth of field and high weight in large-aperture imaging systems, a lightweight large-aperture imaging system based on wavefront coding is proposed. The system employs a refractive optical path to deliver high-quality imaging in both visible and near-infrared bands. Glass materials are replaced with optical plastics to achieve system lightweighting. Freeform surfaces and aspheric elements are introduced for wavefront encoding to extend the depth of field and generate encoded images. Image decoding is performed using a DeblurGANv2 network architecture integrated with the point spread function. Results demonstrate that the system achieves an 11-fold depth of field extension, weighs 496.3 g, maintains a modulation transfer function above 0.1 at 40 cycles/mm, and effectively restores captured images through the decoding process.</jats:p>
title_cn: 基于波前编码的轻型大口径夜视成像系统设计
abstract_cn: <jats:p>为了满足弱光环境下清晰成像的要求，系统需要大光圈设计和多波段成像能力。针对大孔径成像系统浅景深和高重量的挑战，提出一种基于波前编码的轻量化大孔径成像系统。该系统采用折射光路在可见光和近红外波段提供高质量成像。采用光学塑料替代玻璃材料，实现系统轻量化。引入自由曲面和非球面元件进行波前编码，以扩展景深并生成编码图像。使用与点扩散函数集成的 DeblurGANv2 网络架构执行图像解码。结果表明，该系统实现了11倍的景深扩展，重量为496.3 g，在40周期/毫米下保持了0.1以上的调制传递函数，并通过解码过程有效地恢复了捕获的图像。</jats:p>

title: Influence of temperature on stimulated Brillouin scattering slow light in few-mode fibers
author: Li-Jun Li, Shang-Lin Hou
summary:

By analyzing the three-wave coupled equations under small-signal conditions and employing a full-vectorial finite-element method, we quantify the slow light dynamics of the LP

Conversely, both the effective field area and Brillouin threshold decrease. Notably, the slow light time delay of the LP

                    <jats:sub>01</jats:sub>

title: Transverse mode beating in high-Q pulsed dye lasers
author: Sara García-Revilla, Ignacio Iparraguirre, Joaquín Fernández, Jon Azkargorta, Rolindes Balda
summary: <jats:p>This work provides a detailed analysis of transverse mode beating in high-Q pulsed dye lasers, achieved without the use of intra-cavity tuning elements, pinhole apertures, or external modulators. Various resonator configurations were tested, and the effects of the pump beam size on the laser emission were explored. Depending on the resonator configuration and pumping conditions, the emission could be single mode, with no beating, exhibit beating of a few transverse modes, or become multimodal with lost coherence. The simultaneous acquisition of the spatial, spectral, and temporal profiles of each output laser pulse reveals that mode beating is established from the onset of laser operation.</jats:p>
title_cn: 高 Q 值脉冲染料激光器中的横向模式跳动
abstract_cn: <jats:p>这项工作提供了对高 Q 脉冲染料激光器横模跳动的详细分析，无需使用腔内调谐元件、针孔孔径或外部调制器即可实现。测试了各种谐振器配置，并探讨了泵浦光束尺寸对激光发射的影响。根据谐振器配置和泵浦条件，发射可能是单模，没有拍频，表现出一些横模的拍频，或者变成失去相干性的多模态。同时采集每个输出激光脉冲的空间、光谱和时间分布表明，模式跳动是从激光操作开始就建立的。</jats:p>

title: M-TRACE: a MATLAB toolkit for animated raytracing based on scalable vector graphics illustration
author: Patrick Kilcullen, Tsuneyuki Ozaki, Jinyang Liang
summary: <jats:p>Modern optical design and simulation software, while both powerful and feature-rich, requires significant training investment for effective use, even for simple optical design tasks. By contrast, software for two-dimensional (2D) non-sequential raytracing, while sufficient for many optical design tasks and popular for educational purposes, has remained without the benefit of mature computer-aided design (CAD) technologies that are now a key feature of software dedicated to three-dimensional (3D) optical design. To overcome this limitation, we introduce M-TRACE—an open source toolkit for non-sequential 2D raytracing with scripting-based customization and animation capabilities implemented in MATLAB. This toolkit allows users to specify optical designs using tools compatible with free-form 2D illustration via scalable vector graphics (SVG), analogous to the integration of 3D CAD technologies with enterprise optical design software. The intuitive and precise drawing features of SVG illustration software (e.g., Adobe Illustrator, Inkscape) allow for a straightforward means for the creation of system designs. We intend M-TRACE to complement the spectrum of available optical design software for research, development, and education, specifically targeting design cases requiring rich visualization and/or rapid exploration.</jats:p>
title_cn: M-TRACE：基于可缩放矢量图形插图的动画光线追踪 MATLAB 工具包
abstract_cn: <jats:p>现代光学设计和仿真软件虽然功能强大且功能丰富，但即使对于简单的光学设计任务，也需要大量的培训投资才能有效使用。相比之下，二维 (2D) 非顺序光线追踪软件虽然足以完成许多光学设计任务并且在教育目的中很受欢迎，但仍然没有成熟的计算机辅助设计 (CAD) 技术的优势，而成熟的计算机辅助设计 (CAD) 技术现在是专用于三维 (3D) 光学设计的软件的关键功能。为了克服这一限制，我们引入了 M-TRACE——一种用于非顺序 2D 光线追踪的开源工具包，具有在 MATLAB 中实现的基于脚本的自定义和动画功能。该工具包允许用户使用与可扩展矢量图形 (SVG) 的自由形式 2D 插图兼容的工具来指定光学设计，类似于 3D CAD 技术与企业光学设计软件的集成。 SVG 插图软件（例如 Adob​​e Illustrator、Inkscape）直观且精确的绘图功能允许以简单的方式创建系统设计。我们希望 M-TRACE 能够补充用于研究、开发和教育的可用光学设计软件的范围，特别针对需要丰富可视化和/或快速探索的设计案例。</jats:p>

title: Effect of concentration, lumpiness, aggregation, and cluster compaction on optical properties of particulate media
author: William E. Vargas
summary: <jats:p>A four-flux radiative transfer model is used to evaluate diffuse                     reflectance and transmittance spectra of plane-parallel particulate                     materials. External parameters, including scattering and absorption                     cross sections, forward scattering ratios, and average path length                     parameters, are calculated utilizing Lorenz-Mie theory for independent                     scattering and a transition matrix approach for near-field dependent                     scattering evaluations. The formalism is applied to sub-micron-sized                     spherical titanium dioxide pigments in an aqueous-polymer matrix to                     evaluate their reflectance and transmittance spectra in the range of                     0.3 to 1.5 μm in wavelength. The particle concentration,                     the degree of lumpiness, the number of particles per cluster, and the                     cluster compaction are varied to quantify the effect of dependent                     scattering. What we believe to be a novel scheme is introduced to                     model the morphology of samples in terms of a volume fraction occupied                     by particles that do not form aggregates and another fraction                     corresponding to particles that are part of aggregates, as well as the                     lumpiness of the sample and compaction of the clusters. A more                     detailed analysis is carried out for specific wavelengths in the                     ultraviolet, visible, and near infrared to correlate the variation of                     reflectance and transmittance due to dependent scattering with the                     propagating fluxes.</jats:p>
title_cn: 浓度、块度、聚集和簇压实对颗粒介质光学特性的影响
abstract_cn: <jats:p>四通量辐射传输模型用于评估平面平行颗粒材料的漫反射率和透射率光谱。外部参数（包括散射和吸收截面、前向散射比和平均路径长度参数）是利用用于独立散射的 Lorenz-Mie 理论和用于近场相关散射评估的过渡矩阵方法来计算的。该形式应用于水性聚合物基质中的亚微米级球形二氧化钛颜料，以评估其在波长 0.3 至 1.5μm 范围内的反射率和透射率光谱。改变颗粒浓度、块度、每个簇的颗粒数量以及簇压实度来量化相关散射的影响。我们认为，引入了一种新颖的方案，根据不形成聚集体的颗粒所占的体积分数和与作为聚集体一部分的颗粒相对应的另一部分，以及样品的块度和簇的压实度来对样品的形态进行建模。对紫外线、可见光和近红外线中的特定波长进行了更详细的分析，以将由于相关散射引起的反射率和透射率的变化与传播通量相关联。</jats:p>

title: Real-time monitoring of evapotranspiration dynamics through snapshot hyperspectral imaging at near-infrared
author: Desheng Zheng, Roger McNichols, Haimu Cao, Christopher Flynn, Razvan I. Stoian, Jiawei Lu, Bruce C. Kindel, Ethan Gutmann, David Alexander, Tomasz S. Tkaczyk
summary: <jats:p>Monitoring atmospheric water vapor dynamics is important for many atmospheric and hydrologic applications, ranging from weather forecasting and agricultural practices to climate impacts and flood preparedness. To improve the spatiotemporal resolution of conventional methods for monitoring water vapor dynamics, we have developed a snapshot spectral imager operating in the near-infrared range, spanning 1100 nm to 1300 nm. This imager utilizes a custom-designed fiber bundle remapping and prism dispersion technique. By covering the vapor-sensitive band at 1140 nm and the water vapor-insensitive shoulder at 1260 nm, our system holds promise for tracking water vapor dynamics across many heterogeneous environments that challenge traditional measurement techniques. Through meticulous optomechanical design, the current ruggedized configuration remains portable while maintaining an adaptive spatial sampling of approximately 35,000 locations and over 20 adaptive spectral sampling channels. Laboratory tests have validated its sensitivity, capable of detecting changes as small as 70 micrometers of precipitable water vapor. Field experiments conducted across various vegetation types have showcased the imager's efficacy and demonstrated the imager's ability to monitor temporal and spatial fluctuations in water vapor across different landscapes. Real-time mapping of water index variations holds promise for diverse applications, including atmospheric, environmental, agricultural, and solar energy research. The real-time measurements enabled by the instrument described here provide new capabilities to monitor water vapor.</jats:p>
title_cn: 通过近红外快照高光谱成像实时监测蒸散动态
abstract_cn: <jats:p>监测大气水蒸气动态对于许多大气和水文应用都很重要，从天气预报和农业实践到气候影响和洪水防备。为了提高监测水蒸气动力学的传统方法的时空分辨率，我们开发了一种在近红外范围内工作的快照光谱成像仪，跨度为 1100nm 至 1300nm。该成像仪采用定制设计的光纤束重新映射和棱镜色散技术。通过覆盖 1140nm 处的水蒸气敏感波段和 1260nm 处的水蒸气不敏感肩带，我们的系统有望在挑战传统测量技术的许多异构环境中跟踪水蒸气动态。通过细致的光机械设计，当前的加固配置保持便携性，同时保持约 35,000 个位置的自适应空间采样和 20 多个自适应光谱采样通道。实验室测试验证了其灵敏度，能够检测小至 70 微米的可沉淀水蒸气的变化。在各种植被类型上进行的现场实验展示了成像仪的功效，并证明了成像仪监测不同景观中水蒸气的时间和空间波动的能力。水指数变化的实时绘图为大气、环境、农业和太阳能研究等多种应用带来了希望。此处描述的仪器实现的实时测量提供了监测水蒸气的新功能。</jats:p>

title: All-fiber noise-like pulse generation based on Yb-doped fiber and nonlinear fibers operating around 1040–1060 nm wavelengths
author: Yu-Fang Su, Pei-Ying Tsai, Jia-Ming Liu
summary: <jats:p>We demonstrate a compact all-fiber passively mode-locked ytterbium-doped fiber (YDF) laser that generates high-quality noise-like pulses (NLPs) via nonlinear polarization rotation. The system employs a 976 nm laser diode for pumping and features a fully fusion-spliced cavity, eliminating alignment-sensitive free-space components. To enhance nonlinear effects and ensure stable NLP generation, we explored several highly nonlinear fiber configurations, including ultra-high numerical aperture (UHNA3) fiber and photonic crystal fiber (PCF) with a zero-dispersion wavelength at 760 nm. The laser exhibits emission in the 1040–1060 nm wavelength range, with an average output power tunable from 20 mW to 35 mW depending on the cavity configuration. The best performance was achieved with a hybrid configuration consisting of a 20-cm PCF segment sandwiched between two 10-cm UHNA3 fiber segments, producing stable mode-locking at 1042.8 nm with a 31.5 mW average output power and pulses featuring a 23.05 ps envelope with 105.1 fs substructures. Compared to previously reported systems based on nonlinear polarization rotation, our design achieves significantly shorter pulse durations and more symmetric spectra, all while maintaining a robust, alignment-free architecture. These results highlight the importance of nonlinear enhancement and dispersion management in efficient pulse shaping and broadband spectral generation. Owing to its stability, compactness, and superior pulse quality, the proposed laser shows strong potential for applications in supercontinuum generation, ultrafast metrology, optical communications, and quantum photonics.</jats:p>
title_cn: 基于掺镱光纤和非线性光纤的全光纤类噪声脉冲生成，工作波长约为 1040–1060 nm
abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们展示了一种紧凑型全光纤被动锁模掺镱光纤 (YDF) 激光器，它通过非线性偏振旋转生成高质量的类噪声脉冲 (NLP)。该系统采用 976 nm 激光二极管进行泵浦，并具有完全熔接腔，消除了对对准敏感的自由空间组件。为了增强非线性效应并确保稳定的 NLP 生成，我们探索了几种高度非线性的光纤配置，包括超高数值孔径（UHNA3）光纤和零色散波长为 760nm 的光子晶体光纤（PCF）。该激光器的发射波长范围为 1040–1060nm，平均输出功率可在 20 mW 至 35 mW 范围内调节，具体取决于腔体配置。最佳性能是通过混合配置实现的，该混合配置由夹在两个 10 cm UHNA3 光纤段之间的 20 cm PCF 段组成，在 1042.8 nm 处产生稳定的锁模，平均输出功率为 31.5 mW，脉冲具有 23.05 ps 包络和 105.1 fs 子结构。与之前报道的基于非线性偏振旋转的系统相比，我们的设计实现了显着更短的脉冲持续时间和更对称的光谱，同时保持了稳健的免对准架构。这些结果凸显了非线性增强和色散管理在高效脉冲整形和宽带频谱生成中的重要性。由于其稳定性、紧凑性和优异的脉冲质量，所提出的激光器在超连续谱产生、超快计量、光通信和量子光子学方面显示出巨大的应用潜力。</jats:p>

title: High-powered 1639-1853nm tunable fiber laser with cascaded thulium- and bismuth-doped fiber
author: Ali Roohforouz, M. R. K. Soltanian, Pin Long, Nitika Vaish, Lawrence R. Chen
summary: <jats:p>We demonstrate a continuous-wave, widely tunable fiber laser using a cascade of bismuth-doped fiber (BDF) and thulium-doped fiber (TDF). We use a diffraction grating in a Littman configuration for wavelength tuning and obtain a tuning range of 214 nm from 1639-1853nm. We achieve a maximum output power of 780 mW at 1720 nm when pumped at 1570 nm, with a power conversion efficiency of 15%. We show that utilizing cascaded BDF-TDF enables significantly broader tunability and higher output power compared to using BDF or TDF alone.</jats:p>
title_cn: 具有级联掺铥和铋光纤的高功率 1639-1853nm 可调谐光纤激光器
abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们展示了一种使用级联掺铋光纤 (BDF) 和掺铥光纤 (TDF) 的连续波、宽范围可调谐光纤激光器。我们使用 Littman 配置中的衍射光栅进行波长调谐，并获得从 1639-1853nm 的 214 nm 的调谐范围。当以 1570nm 泵浦时，我们在 1720nm 处实现了 780mW 的最大输出功率，功率转换效率为 15%。我们表明，与单独使用 BDF 或 TDF 相比，使用级联 BDF-TDF 可以实现更广泛的可调性和更高的输出功率。</jats:p>

title: Method for foggy scene restoration based on polarization information enhancement and residual total variation denoising
author: Wenhong Gao, Zhiguo Fan, Haihong Jin, Ke Zhao, Chen Shen
summary: <jats:p>Polarization-based dehazing methods can effectively address the problem of image degradation in foggy environments and significantly improve the quality of haze images. However, due to the complex and dynamic characteristics of foggy scenes, the restored images often suffer from the loss of local target detail information. To solve this problem, this paper proposes a foggy scene restoration method based on polarization information enhancement and residual total variation denoising. To fully utilize polarization information and obtain polarization information images with high information content and low noise, a normalized enhancement method with boundary threshold restriction is proposed based on statistical analysis of the pixel value distribution of numerous polarization degree images. Then, the enhanced images are subjected to residual reflection total variation regularization denoising processing. The enhanced and denoised polarization information is fused with the light intensity information using an entropy-weighted mechanism to obtain the final image restoration result. Experimental results show that the proposed method can effectively improve the detail recovery ability of polarization dehazed images.</jats:p>
title_cn: 基于偏振信息增强和残差全变分去噪的雾景恢复方法
abstract_cn: <jats:p>基于偏振的去雾方法可以有效解决雾天环境下的图像退化问题，显着提高雾霾图像的质量。然而，由于雾天场景的复杂性和动态性，恢复后的图像往往会丢失局部目标细节信息。针对这一问题，提出一种基于偏振信息增强和残差全变分去噪的雾场景恢复方法。为了充分利用偏振信息，获得信息量高、噪声低的偏振信息图像，在对大量偏振度图像的像素值分布进行统计分析的基础上，提出了一种带有边界阈值限制的归一化增强方法。然后，对增强后的图像进行残差反射全变分正则化去噪处理。使用熵权机制将增强和去噪后的偏振信息与光强度信息融合，以获得最终的图像恢复结果。实验结果表明，该方法能够有效提高偏振去雾图像的细节恢复能力。</jats:p>

title: Enhanced entanglement and synchronization in a coupled optomechanical system using a coherent feedback loop
author: Habtamu Dagnaw Mekonnen, Yimenu Yeshiwas
summary: <jats:p>We propose a scheme to enhance quantum entanglement and synchronization in a coupled optomechanical system through a coherent feedback loop. The results reveal that choosing proper coherent feedback parameters can significantly improve both entanglement and synchronization between mechanical modes. Furthermore, strong Coulomb coupling between mechanical modes plays a crucial role in further enhancing both quantum entanglement and synchronization. However, increasing the phase shift leads to a degradation of both entanglement and synchronization. Moreover, we also observed that the increasing temperature rapidly diminishes entanglement and synchronization due to decoherence effects. We believe that the proposed scheme offers a highly promising pathway for enhancing entanglement and synchronization, with significant potential for applications in quantum information processing.</jats:p>
title_cn: 使用相干反馈环路增强耦合光机械系统中的纠缠和同步
abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们提出了一种通过相干反馈环路增强耦合光机械系统中的量子纠缠和同步的方案。结果表明，选择适当的相干反馈参数可以显着改善机械模式之间的纠缠和同步。此外，机械模式之间的强库仑耦合在进一步增强量子纠缠和同步方面起着至关重要的作用。然而，增加相移会导致纠缠和同步性能下降。此外，我们还观察到，由于退相干效应，温度升高会迅速减少纠缠和同步。我们相信，所提出的方案为增强纠缠和同步提供了一条非常有前途的途径，在量子信息处理中具有巨大的应用潜力。</jats:p>

title: Deep learning-based complex hologram compression enhanced by ringing reduction
author: Makoto Sekiguchi, Chung-Hsuan Huang, David Blinder, Shosei Yabuki, Fan Wang, Peter Schelkens, Han-Yen Tu, Chau-Jern Cheng, Tomoyoshi Ito, Tomoyoshi Shimobaba
summary: <jats:p>Recent advances in computer-generated holography (CGH) have significantly improved visual quality through high-resolution rendering; however, the accompanying increase in data size has become a critical obstacle to practical deployment. Conventional image compression techniques such as JPEG and high efficiency video coding (HEVC) do not adequately account for the unique statistical and spectral characteristics of holograms, thereby limiting both compression efficiency and reconstruction quality. This study proposes an efficient compression framework specialized for digital holograms by integrating a ringing reduction technique for diffraction calculations with CompressAI, a deep learning-based image compression framework. We demonstrate that ringing artifacts are a major factor hindering efficient hologram compression, and show that neural networks can achieve superior performance by learning the intrinsic statistical and spectral features of holograms. Our method achieves a superior balance between compression efficiency and reconstruction quality compared to conventional approaches, particularly at low bit rates. Furthermore, by introducing a multi-channel input representation, our method achieves higher compression ratios.</jats:p>
title_cn: 通过减少振铃增强基于深度学习的复杂全息图压缩
abstract_cn: <jats:p>计算机生成全息术 (CGH) 的最新进展通过高分辨率渲染显着提高了视觉质量；然而，随之而来的数据量的增加已成为实际部署的关键障碍。 JPEG 和高效视频编码 (HEVC) 等传统图像压缩技术无法充分考虑全息图独特的统计和光谱特性，从而限制了压缩效率和重建质量。本研究通过将用于衍射计算的振铃减少技术与基于深度学习的图像压缩框架 CompressAI 相集成，提出了一种专门用于数字全息图的高效压缩框架。我们证明了振铃伪影是阻碍有效全息图压缩的主要因素，并表明神经网络可以通过学习全息图的内在统计和光谱特征来实现卓越的性能。与传统方法相比，我们的方法在压缩效率和重建质量之间实现了卓越的平衡，特别是在低比特率下。此外，通过引入多通道输入表示，我们的方法实现了更高的压缩比。</jats:p>

title: Real-time open-field pupil tracking algorithms and their performance in optical coherence tomography for retinal imaging
author: Thanapol Tuntrakool, Ittipon Fongkaew, Sorawis Sangtawesin, Joewono Widjaja, Juthaporn Assawachananont, Panomsak Meemon
summary: <jats:p>Accurate pupil tracking is essential for minimizing motion artifacts and enhancing image quality in optical coherence tomography (OCT), particularly in dynamic or uncontrolled imaging environments. In this study, we evaluated the performance of six feature-based pupil-tracking algorithms, namely Blob, Swirski, ExCuSe, ElSe, PuRe, and PuReST, within a custom-built frequency-domain OCT (FD-OCT) system equipped with a pupil imaging module using 940 nm near-infrared illumination. Each algorithm was assessed using both artificial eye and real-eye datasets across three metrics: tracking accuracy, repeatability, and runtime. Results indicate that PuRe and PuReST achieved sub-millimeter accuracy and demonstrated robust tracking performance under varying lighting conditions. PuReST outperformed others in computational efficiency, while the Blob algorithm showed resilience against visible light interference. The integration of pupil tracking with OCT imaging significantly reduced motion-induced artifacts and improved retinal image quality. These findings support the use of PuReST as a practical solution for real-time motion correction in OCT systems deployed in clinical and open-field settings.</jats:p>
title_cn: 实时开放视野瞳孔跟踪算法及其在视网膜成像光学相干断层扫描中的性能
abstract_cn: <jats:p>准确的瞳孔跟踪对于最大限度地减少运动伪影和提高光学相干断层扫描 (OCT) 中的图像质量至关重要，特别是在动态或不受控制的成像环境中。在本研究中，我们在配备使用 940nm 近红外照明的瞳孔成像模块的定制频域 OCT (FD-OCT) 系统中评估了六种基于特征的瞳孔跟踪算法（即 Blob、Swirski、ExCuSe、ElSe、PuRe 和 PuReST）的性能。每个算法都使用人造眼和真眼数据集通过三个指标进行评估：跟踪准确性、可重复性和运行时间。结果表明，PuRe 和 PuReST 实现了亚毫米级精度，并在不同的照明条件下展示了强大的跟踪性能。 PuReST 在计算效率方面优于其他算法，而 Blob 算法则表现出抗可见光干扰的能力。瞳孔跟踪与 OCT 成像的集成显着减少了运动引起的伪影并提高了视网膜图像质量。这些发现支持使用 PuReST 作为临床和开放环境中部署的 OCT 系统实时运动校正的实用解决方案。</jats:p>

title: Digital Facebow System for Mandibular Movement Tracking Using Near-Infrared Optical Measurement
author: Xuexing Li, Wenhui Zhang
summary: <jats:p>Accurate recording of mandibular movements is essential in stomatology for the diagnosis of functional disorders and the planning of restorative treatments. Although commercially available electronic facebows, developed through diverse technical approaches, offer greater accuracy than mechanical facebows, their high costs and operational complexity have limited their widespread use in clinical practice. This paper presents a digital facebow system that modifies a conventional Girrbach mechanical facebow with reflective marker balls and integrates it with a dual-camera near-infrared (850 nm) optical measurement system. A novel two-stage calibration procedure ensures high measurement accuracy, and a spatial-constraint-based decoding algorithm enables robust identification of non-encoded marker balls in three-dimensional (3D) space. Subsequently, the system registers mandibular movement by calculating the relative pose between the upper and lower facebows in real-time. Experimental validation, including trajectory tracking on precision slides and a simulated scenario using a head model, demonstrates the system's accuracy and clinical feasibility. The proposed solution provides a cost-effective and low-complexity pathway for digital mandibular movement registration, facilitating the integration of mechanical facebows into digital dental workflows.</jats:p>
title_cn: 使用近红外光学测量进行下颌运动跟踪的数字 Facebow 系统
abstract_cn: <jats:p>准确记录下颌运动对于口腔医学中功能障碍的诊断和恢复性治疗的规划至关重要。尽管通过多种技术方法开发的市售电子面弓比机械面弓具有更高的准确性，但其高成本和操作复杂性限制了其在临床实践中的广泛使用。本文提出了一种数字面弓系统，该系统用反射标记球修改了传统的吉尔巴赫机械面弓，并将其与双摄像头近红外（850nm）光学测量系统集成。新颖的两级校准程序可确保高测量精度，而基于空间约束的解码算法可实现三维 (3D) 空间中非编码标记球的稳健识别。随后，系统通过实时计算上下面弓之间的相对姿势来记录下颌运动。实验验证，包括精密载玻片上的轨迹跟踪和使用头部模型的模拟场景，证明了系统的准确性和临床可行性。所提出的解决方案为数字化下颌运动注册提供了一种经济有效且低复杂性的途径，有助于将机械面弓集成到数字牙科工作流程中。</jats:p>

summary:
<jats:p>
                    We present investigations of a continuous-wave (CW) alexandrite thin-disk laser in both multi-mode and fundamental-mode operation. In multi-mode operation, the laser delivered a maximum average output power of 15 W with an optical efficiency of approximately 18%, at a central wavelength of 747 nm. The fundamental-mode average output power was 5.1 W, corresponding to an optical efficiency of approximately 7.5%. In this operation mode, the beam propagation factor was measured to be M

title: Microscope slide as beam splitter for Fourier transform interferometers
author: Muqian Wen
summary: <jats:p>A Fourier transform interferometer using a regular microscope glass slide as a beam splitter was built and was used to measure the spectrum of a tungsten light bulb source in the visible and near infrared spectral range successfully with satisfying outcomes. The obtained result was analyzed and compared with those obtained with a regular cube beam splitter. This experiment demonstrated that inexpensive microscope glass slides can be used as beam splitters for low-cost Fourier transform spectrometers.</jats:p>

title: Rapid and non-invasive diagnosis of gingivitis using an uncoated optical fiber-based Mach-Zehnder interferometer salivary pH sensor
author: Hamsa Radhwan Tawfeeq, Abdulhadi Al-Janabi
summary: <jats:p>In this study, an uncoated optical fiber–based Mach–Zehnder interferometer (SMF–NCF–SMF) salivary pH sensor is developed and experimentally evaluated as a rapid, non-invasive diagnostic tool for gingivitis screening. The sensor exploits multimode interference and refractive index sensitivity, enabling wavelength-shift demodulation of pH-induced spectral changes in saliva. Clinical validation was performed on 83 individuals, of whom 38 exhibited clinically healthy gingiva, and 37 were diagnosed with gingivitis. The proposed sensing structure demonstrated a sensitivity of 1.5 nm/pH and strong linearity exceeding 98%, with gingivitis patients exhibiting significantly more alkaline salivary conditions compared with healthy subjects (p < 0.001). To further support diagnostic reliability, salivary IL-1β levels were quantified using ELISA, revealing elevated concentrations in gingivitis cases and reinforcing the association between salivary biochemical changes and inflammatory periodontal status. The presented optical fiber sensor exhibits high stability, rapid response, and clinical feasibility, highlighting its potential as a practical chairside screening tool for early gingivitis detection.</jats:p>
title_cn: 使用基于无涂层光纤的马赫曾德干涉仪唾液 pH 传感器对牙龈炎进行快速、非侵入性诊断
abstract_cn: <jats:p>在这项研究中，开发了一种基于无涂层光纤的马赫-曾德干涉仪 (SMF-NCF-SMF) 唾液 pH 传感器，并进行了实验评估，作为牙龈炎筛查的快速、非侵入性诊断工具。该传感器利用多模干涉和折射率灵敏度，能够对唾液中 pH 引起的光谱变化进行波长漂移解调。对 83 人进行了临床验证，其中 38 人表现出临床健康的牙龈，37 人被诊断患有牙龈炎。所提出的传感结构表现出 1.5 nm/pH 的灵敏度和超过 98% 的强线性度，与健康受试者相比，牙龈炎患者表现出明显更高的碱性唾液条件 (p < 0.001)。为了进一步支持诊断的可靠性，使用 ELISA 对唾液 IL-1β 水平进行了定量，揭示了牙龈炎病例中浓度升高的情况，并加强了唾液生化变化与炎症性牙周状态之间的关联。所提出的光纤传感器具有高稳定性、快速响应和临床可行性，突出了其作为早期牙龈炎检测的实用椅旁筛查工具的潜力。</jats:p>

title: Hologram design framework: reconstruction area of volumetric beam shaping
author: Nami Kuroo, Yoshio Hayasaki
summary: <jats:p>We developed a design framework for computer-generated holograms (CGHs) implemented with a spatial light modulator (SLM) for volumetric beam shaping. This approach enables shaping the laser beam in both the transverse and axial directions, meeting industry requirements for quality and throughput while also facilitating further improvements in functionality. The design framework encompasses CGH optimization algorithms, analog and digital optical parameters, evaluation functions, software, and the target beam, all of which are defined according to the processing requirements. Our objective is to propose a method for determining an acceptable axial reconstruction area and to incorporate it into a design framework. We found that normalizing the beam profile evaluation curve collapses it onto a single curve. The curve depended on the power of the CGH, which is an inverse relation to the number of pixels of the SLM. As a result, the axial reconstruction area can be determined consistently and systematically. The results are expected to be applied to diverse industrial applications, including straight-through holes with high aspect ratios, micro-patterning, grooving of multilayer materials, and even dicing of micro-devices with higher-order structures.</jats:p>
title_cn: 全息图设计框架：体积光束整形重建区域
abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们开发了一个计算机生成全息图 (CGH) 的设计框架，通过空间光调制器 (SLM) 实现体积光束整形。这种方法能够在横向和轴向上对激光束进行整形，满足行业对质量和吞吐量的要求，同时也有利于功能的进一步改进。设计框架包括CGH优化算法、模拟和数字光学参数、评估函数、软件和目标光束，所有这些都是根据处理要求定义的。我们的目标是提出一种确定可接受的轴向重建区域的方法，并将其纳入设计框架中。我们发现，规范化光束轮廓评估曲线会将其折叠成一条曲线。该曲线取决于 CGH 的功率，而 CGH 的功率与 SLM 的像素数量成反比。结果，可以一致且系统地确定轴向重建区域。研究结果预计将应用于多种工业应用，包括高深宽比的直通孔、微图案化、多层材料的开槽，甚至具有高阶结构的微型器件的切割。</jats:p>

title: Remote picometric acoustic sensing via ultrastable laser homodyne interferometry
author: Yoon-Soo Jang, Dong Il Lee, Jaime Flor Flores, Wenting Wang, Chee Wei Wong
summary: Abstract. Acoustic detection has many applications across science and technology from medicine to imaging and communications. However, most acoustic sensors have a common limitation in that the detection must be near the acoustic source. Alternatively, laser interferometry with picometer-scale motional displacement detection can rapidly and precisely measure sound-induced minute vibrations on remote surfaces. Here, we demonstrate the feasibility of sound detection up to 100 kHz at remote sites with ≈60  m optical path length via laser homodyne interferometry. Based on our ultrastable hertz linewidth laser with 10−15 fractional stability, our laser interferometer achieves 0.5  pm/Hz1/2 displacement sensitivity near 10 kHz, bounded only by laser frequency noise over 10 kHz. Between 140 Hz and 15 kHz, we achieve a homodyne acoustic sensing sensitivity of subnanometer/Pascal across our conversational frequency overtones. The minimal sound pressure detectable over 60 m optical path length is ≈2  mPa, with dynamic ranges over 100 dB. With the demonstrated standoff picometric distance metrology, we successfully detected and reconstructed musical scores of normal conversational volumes with high fidelity. The acoustic detection via this precision laser interferometer could be applied to selective area sound sensing for remote acoustic metrology, optomechanical vibrational motion sensing, and ultrasensitive optical microphones at the laser frequency noise limits.
title_cn: 通过超稳定激光零差干涉测量法进行远程皮声学传感
abstract_cn: 抽象的。声学检测在从医学到成像和通信的科学技术领域有许多应用。然而，大多数声学传感器都有一个共同的限制，即检测必须靠近声源。另外，具有皮米级运动位移检测功能的激光干涉测量可以快速、精确地测量远程表面上由声引起的微小振动。在这里，我们展示了通过激光零差干涉测量在光路长度约为 60 米的远程站点进行高达 100 kHz 的声音检测的可行性。基于我们具有 10−15 分数稳定性的超稳定赫兹线宽激光器，我们的激光干涉仪在 10 kHz 附近实现了 0.5  pm/Hz1/2 位移灵敏度，仅受 10 kHz 以上激光频率噪声的限制。在 140 Hz 至 15 kHz 之间，我们在对话频率泛音上实现了亚纳米/帕斯卡的零差声学传感灵敏度。 60 m 光程长度内可检测的最小声压为 ≈2  mPa，动态范围超过 100 dB。通过所展示的相距皮测量距离计量学，我们成功地检测并重建了高保真度的正常对话音量的乐谱。通过这种精密激光干涉仪进行的声学检测可应用于远程声学计量的选择性区域声音传感、光机械振动运动传感以及激光频率噪声限制下的超灵敏光学麦克风。

title: Multitype topological transitions and multichannel directional topological photonic routings in chiral metamaterials
author: Ning Han, Mingzhu Li, Yilin Zhang, Rui Zhao, Fujia Chen, Lu Qi, Chenxia Li, Shutian Liu
summary: Abstract. The investigation of topological transitions has opened up unprecedented avenues for scientific exploration in photonic metamaterials. However, previous studies mainly focused on exploring different types of three-dimensional (3D) equifrequency surfaces and their topological transition processes in magnetic topological systems. In this work, we study the multiple photonic topological transitions and dual-frequency photonic Weyl points in the topological chiral metamaterials. Through effective medium theory and topological band theory, we systematically characterize and draw comprehensive topological phase diagrams associated with diverse 3D equifrequency surface configurations in nonmagnetic photonic systems. We further demonstrate that the resonance frequency ω0 and dual-frequency Weyl points are the critical points of these topological transitions. Notably, when the vacuum state is in contact with the phases I or III chiral metamaterials, the high-local and frequency chirality-dependent topological Fermi arc surface states arise. We reveal that the parameter ω can be used as a degree of freedom to regulate the bandwidth of such topological surface states. Moreover, different types of multichannel and directional topological photonic routings are achieved using the chirality-dependent Fermi arc surface states. We theoretically show that the physical mechanism of achieving these multichannel topological photonic routings is caused by the different interface properties. We could offer promising perspectives on 3D topological semimetal systems and provide more adaptability for multichannel devices in the nonmagnetic continuous media.
title_cn: 手性超材料中的多类型拓扑转变和多通道定向拓扑光子路由
abstract_cn: 抽象的。拓扑转变的研究为光子超材料的科学探索开辟了前所未有的途径。然而，先前的研究主要集中在探索不同类型的三维（3D）等频表面及其在磁拓扑系统中的拓扑转变过程。在这项工作中，我们研究了拓扑手性超材料中的多光子拓扑跃迁和双频光子Weyl点。通过有效介质理论和拓扑能带理论，我们系统地表征并绘制了与非磁性光子系统中各种 3D 等频表面配置相关的全面拓扑相图。我们进一步证明谐振频率 ω0 和双频 Weyl 点是这些拓扑转变的临界点。值得注意的是，当真空态与 I 相或 III 相手性超材料接触时，会出现高局域和频率依赖手性的拓扑费米弧表面态。我们发现参数 ω 可以用作调节这种拓扑表面态的带宽的自由度。此外，使用依赖手性的费米弧表面态实现了不同类型的多通道和定向拓扑光子路由。我们从理论上证明，实现这些多通道拓扑光子路由的物理机制是由不同的界面特性引起的。我们可以为 3D 拓扑半金属系统提供有前景的前景，并为非磁性连续介质中的多通道设备提供更多的适应性。

title: Fourier lightfield multiview stereoscope for large field-of-view 3D imaging in microsurgical settings
author: Clare B. Cook, Kevin C. Zhou, Martin Bohlen, Mark Harfouche, Kanghyun Kim, Paul Reamey, Julia S. Foust, Gregor Horstmeyer, Ramana Balla, Amey Chaware, Roarke Horstmeyer
summary: Abstract. We present the Fourier lightfield multiview stereoscope (FiLM-Scope). This imaging device combines concepts from Fourier lightfield microscopy and multiview stereo imaging to capture high-resolution 3D videos over large fields of view. The FiLM-Scope optical hardware consists of a multicamera array, with 48 individual microcameras, placed behind a high-throughput primary lens. This allows the FiLM-Scope to simultaneously capture 48 unique 12.8 megapixel images of a 28×37  mm field-of-view, from unique angular perspectives over a 21  deg×29  deg range, with down to 22  μm lateral resolution. We also describe a self-supervised algorithm to reconstruct 3D height maps from these images. Our approach demonstrates height accuracy down to 11  μm. To showcase the utility of our system, we perform tool tracking over the surface of an ex vivo rat skull and visualize the 3D deformation in stretching human skin, with videos captured at up to 100 frames per second. The FiLM-Scope has the potential to improve 3D visualization in a range of microsurgical settings.
title_cn: 用于显微外科环境中大视场 3D 成像的傅立叶光场多视图立体镜
abstract_cn: 抽象的。我们推出了傅立叶光场多视图立体镜（FiLM-Scope）。该成像设备结合了傅立叶光场显微镜和多视图立体成像的概念，可在大视场中捕获高分辨率 3D 视频。 FiLM-Scope 光学硬件由多摄像头阵列组成，其中包含 48 个独立的微型摄像头，放置在高通量主镜头后面。这使得 FiLM-Scope 能够在 21°×29°° 范围内从独特的角度视角同时捕获 28×37°mm 视野的 48 张独特的 12.8 兆像素图像，横向分辨率低至 22°μm。我们还描述了一种自监督算法，用于从这些图像重建 3D 高度图。我们的方法展示了低至 11μm 的高度精度。为了展示我们系统的实用性，我们对离体大鼠头骨的表面进行工具跟踪，并以每秒 100 帧的速度捕获视频，以可视化拉伸人类皮肤的 3D 变形。 FiLM-Scope 有潜力改善一系列显微外科环境中的 3D 可视化。

title: Analogous optical coherent state sourced by a partially coherent beam
author: Jinqi Song, Fengqi Liu, Mingli Sun, Bingsong Cao, Zhifang Qiu, Naichen Zhang, Xiangyu Tong, Wenzhe Wang, Yuanxing Liu, Kaikai Huang, Xian Zhang, Xuanhui Lu
summary: Abstract. Based on the first-order correlation function of light, we propose analogous optical coherent states (AOCSs) sourced by partially coherent beams, which can nondiffractively propagate with sinusoidal oscillation in the harmonic potential when the nondiffraction propagation matching condition (NPMC) is met. Unlike the traditional quantum coherent state, the minimum uncertainty of AOCS is related to the coherence of light, and only when the NPMC is met, its uncertainty is the least. Furthermore, based on the mathematical similarity between the Schrödinger and the Helmholtz equations, we find that our proposed AOCSs correspond to the partially coherent steady states of the harmonic oscillator. Our research not only increases the understanding of the coherence of light and enriches the types of nondiffraction beams but also increases the understanding of the quantum coherence regulating the evolution of probability waves.
title_cn: 由部分相干光束产生的类似光学相干态
abstract_cn: 抽象的。基于光的一阶相关函数，我们提出了部分相干光束来源的类似光学相干态（AOCS），当满足非衍射传播匹配条件（NPMC）时，它可以在谐波势中以正弦振荡进行非衍射传播。与传统的量子相干态不同，AOCS的最小不确定性与光的相干性有关，只有满足NPMC时，其不确定性才最小。此外，基于薛定谔方程和亥姆霍兹方程之间的数学相似性，我们发现我们提出的 AOCS 对应于谐振子的部分相干稳态。我们的研究不仅增加了对光相干性的理解，丰富了非衍射光束的类型，而且增加了对调节概率波演化的量子相干性的理解。

title: Achieving superior accuracy in photonic neural networks with physical multi-synapses
author: Zhuonan Jia, Haopeng Tao, Guang-Bin Huang, Ting Mei
summary: Abstract. Analog neural networks, which mimic numerical computations through energy-efficient physical transformations in hardware architectures, typically achieve lower accuracies than digital neural networks. We explore the potential of photonic neural networks to outperform digital counterparts. Unlike traditional analog computing, our extreme learning machine (ELM)-based photonic neural network operates with physical synaptic connections without relying on mathematical descriptions. Noteworthy accuracy enhancements are achieved through photonic multi-synaptic connections, going beyond conventional notions of network depth or nonlinearity. Experimental results on MNIST, Fashion-MNIST, and CIFAR-10 datasets demonstrate classification accuracies up to 99.79%, 98.26%, and 90.29%, respectively, outperforming digital counterparts and most reported hardware architectures. This underscores the transformative impact of photonic neural networks, especially with the pivotal role of photonic multi-synapses, in advancing intelligent devices and signal processing.
title_cn: 利用物理多突触在光子神经网络中实现卓越的准确性
abstract_cn: 抽象的。模拟神经网络通过硬件架构中的节能物理转换来模拟数值计算，其精度通常低于数字神经网络。我们探索光子神经网络超越数字网络的潜力。与传统的模拟计算不同，我们基于极限学习机 (ELM) 的光子神经网络通过物理突触连接进行操作，而不依赖于数学描述。通过光子多突触连接实现了显着的精度增强，超越了网络深度或非线性的传统概念。 MNIST、Fashion-MNIST 和 CIFAR-10 数据集上的实验结果表明，分类准确率分别高达 99.79%、98.26% 和 90.29%，优于数字对应数据集和大多数报道的硬件架构。这强调了光子神经网络的变革性影响，特别是光子多突触在推进智能设备和信号处理方面的关键作用。

title: Achieving 30-cm spatial resolution over 6.0 km in Raman distributed optical fiber sensing using chaotic pulse cluster demodulation
author: Jian Li, Zijia Cheng, Bowen Fan, Xin Huang, Mingjiang Zhang
summary: Abstract. The principle of optical time-domain reflection localization limits the sensing spatial resolution of Raman distributed optical fiber sensing. We provide a solution for a Raman distributed optical fiber sensing system with kilometer-level sensing distance and submeter spatial resolution. Based on this, we propose a Raman distributed optical fiber sensing scheme based on chaotic pulse cluster demodulation. Chaotic pulse clusters are used as the probe signal, in preference to conventional pulsed or chaotic single-pulse lasers. Furthermore, the accurate positioning of the temperature variety region along the sensing fiber can be realized using chaotic pulse clusters. The proposed demodulation scheme can enhance the signal-to-noise ratio by improving the correlation between the chaotic reference and the chaotic Raman anti-Stokes scattering signals. The experiment achieved a sensing spatial resolution of 30 cm at a distributed temperature-sensing distance of ∼6.0  km. Furthermore, we explored the influence of chaotic pulse width and detector bandwidth on the sensing spatial resolution. In addition, the theoretical experiments proved that the sensing spatial resolution in the proposed scheme was independent of the pulse width and sensing distance.
title_cn: 使用混沌脉冲簇解调在拉曼分布式光纤传感中实现超过 6.0 公里的 30 厘米空间分辨率
abstract_cn: 抽象的。光时域反射定位原理限制了拉曼分布式光纤传感的传感空间分辨率。我们提供千米级传感距离和亚米级空间分辨率的拉曼分布式光纤传感系统解决方案。基于此，我们提出了一种基于混沌脉冲簇解调的拉曼分布式光纤传感方案。混沌脉冲簇用作探测信号，优于传统的脉冲或混沌单脉冲激光器。此外，利用混沌脉冲簇可以实现沿传感光纤的温度变化区域的精确定位。所提出的解调方案可以通过改善混沌参考信号和混沌拉曼反斯托克斯散射信号之间的相关性来提高信噪比。该实验在~6.0km的分布式温度传感距离下实现了30cm的传感空间分辨率。此外，我们还探讨了混沌脉冲宽度和探测器带宽对传感空间分辨率的影响。此外，理论实验证明该方案的传感空间分辨率与脉冲宽度和传感距离无关。

title: Visualization of domain structure in periodically poled lithium niobate using radially polarized light
author: Yang Han, Hongfei Zhang, Fei Chen, Chen Yang, Yue Wang, Kebin Shi
summary: Abstract. Due to its broken out-of-plane symmetry, z-cut periodically poled lithium niobate (PPLN) has exhibited ultrahigh second-order optical nonlinearity. Precise quantification of the domain structure of z-cut PPLN plays a critical role during poling fabrication. To enhance the imaging detection efficiency of the domain structure in z-cut PPLN, we have developed a second-harmonic generation microscope system specifically designed to produce a longitudinal electric field in foci for the imaging domain inversion. We demonstrated that imaging using a longitudinal electric field can achieve a contrast ratio enhancement by a factor of 1.77, showing high imaging efficiency and making the proposed method suitable for in situ monitoring of the z-cut PPLN poling process.
title_cn: 使用径向偏振光观察周期性极化铌酸锂的磁畴结构
abstract_cn: 抽象的。由于其破缺的面外对称性，z 切周期性极化铌酸锂（PPLN）表现出超高的二阶光学非线性。 z 切 PPLN 域结构的精确量化在极化制造过程中起着至关重要的作用。为了提高z切PPLN中域结构的成像检测效率，我们开发了一种二次谐波发生显微镜系统，专门设计用于在焦点中产生纵向电场以进行成像域反转。我们证明，使用纵向电场成像可以实现对比度增强 1.77 倍，显示出高成像效率，并使该方法适用于 z 切 PPLN 极化过程的原位监测。

title: Single-sideband modulation for dynamically reconfigurable multiwavelength interferometry
author: Leonard Voßgrag, Annelie Schiller, Tobias Seyler, Markus Fratz, Alexander Bertz, Daniel Carl, Ingo Breunig
summary: Abstract. Single-wavelength interferometry achieves high resolution for smooth surfaces but struggles with rough industrially relevant ones due to limited unambiguous measuring range and speckle effects. Multiwavelength interferometry addresses these challenges using synthetic wavelengths, enabling a balance between extended measurement range and resolution by combining several synthetic wavelengths. This approach holds immense potential for diverse industrial applications, yet it remains largely untapped due to the lack of suitable light sources. Existing solutions are constrained by limited flexibility in synthetic-wavelength generation and slow switching speeds. We demonstrate a light source for multiwavelength interferometry based on electro-optic single-sideband modulation. It reliably generates synthetic wavelengths with arbitrary values from centimeters to meters and switching time below 30 ms. This breakthrough paves the way for dynamic reconfigurable multiwavelength interferometry capable of adapting to complex surfaces and operating efficiently even outside laboratory settings. These capabilities unlock the full potential of multiwavelength interferometry, offering unprecedented flexibility and speed for industrial and technological applications.
title_cn: 用于动态可重构多波长干​​涉测量的单边带调制
abstract_cn: 抽象的。单波长干涉测量可以实现光滑表面的高分辨率，但由于有限的明确测量范围和散斑效应，在粗糙的工业相关表面上遇到了困难。多波长干涉测量使用合成波长来解决这些挑战，通过组合多个合成波长来实现扩展测量范围和分辨率之间的平衡。这种方法在各种工业应用中具有巨大的潜力，但由于缺乏合适的光源，它在很大程度上尚未得到开发。现有解决方案受到合成波长生成灵活性有限和开关速度慢的限制。我们展示了一种基于电光单边带调制的多波长干涉测量光源。它可靠地生成具有从厘米到米的任意值的合成波长，并且切换时间低于 30 毫秒。这一突破为动态可重构多波长干​​涉仪铺平了道路，该干涉仪能够适应复杂的表面，甚至在实验室环境之外也能高效运行。这些功能充分发挥了多波长干涉测量的潜力，为工业和技术应用提供了前所未有的灵活性和速度。

title: Retained imaging quality with reduced manufacturing precision: leveraging computational optics
author: Yujie Xing, Xiong Dun, Dinghao Yang, Siyu Dong, Yifan Peng, Xuquan Wang, Jun Yu, Zhanshan Wang, Xinbin Cheng
summary: Abstract. Manufacturing-robust imaging systems leveraging computational optics hold immense potential for easing manufacturing constraints and enabling the development of cost-effective, high-quality imaging solutions. However, conventional approaches, which typically rely on data-driven neural networks to correct optical aberrations caused by manufacturing errors, are constrained by the lack of effective tolerance analysis methods for quantitatively evaluating manufacturing error boundaries. This limitation is crucial for further relaxing manufacturing constraints and providing practical guidance for fabrication. We propose a physics-informed design paradigm for manufacturing-robust imaging systems with computational optics, integrating a physics-informed tolerance analysis methodology for evaluating manufacturing error boundaries and a physics-informed neural network for image reconstruction. With this approach, we achieve a manufacturing-robust imaging system based on an off-axis three-mirror freeform all-aluminum design, delivering a modulation transfer function exceeding 0.34 at the Nyquist frequency (72  lp/mm) in simulation. Notably, this system requires a manufacturing precision of only 0.5λ in root mean square (RMS), representing a remarkable 25-fold relaxation compared with the conventional requirement of 0.02λ in RMS. Experimental validation further confirmed that the manufacturing-robust imaging system maintains excellent performance in diverse indoor and outdoor environments. Our proposed method paves the way for achieving high-quality imaging without the necessity of high manufacturing precision, enabling practical solutions that are more cost-effective and time-efficient.
title_cn: 保持成像质量并降低制造精度：利用计算光学
abstract_cn: 抽象的。利用计算光学的强大制造成像系统在缓解制造限制和开发具有成本效益的高质量成像解决方案方面具有巨大潜力。然而，传统方法通常依靠数据驱动的神经网络来校正制造误差引起的光学像差，但由于缺乏有效的公差分析方法来定量评估制造误差边界，因此受到限制。这一限制对于进一步放宽制造限制并为制造提供实用指导至关重要。我们提出了一种具有计算光学的鲁棒制造成像系统的基于物理的设计范例，集成了用于评估制造误差边界的基于物理的公差分析方法和用于图像重建的基于物理的神经网络。通过这种方法，我们实现了基于离轴三镜自由曲面全铝设计的制造稳健的成像系统，在模拟中在奈奎斯特频率 (72  lp/mm) 下提供超过 0.34 的调制传递函数。值得注意的是，该系统要求的制造精度仅为均方根 (RMS) 0.5λ，与 RMS 0.02λ 的传统要求相比，显着松弛了 25 倍。实验验证进一步证实，制造稳健的成像系统在不同的室内和室外环境中均保持优异的性能。我们提出的方法为实现高质量成像铺平了道路，而无需高制造精度，从而实现更具成本效益和时间效率的实用解决方案。

title: Snapshot multispectral imaging through defocusing and a Fourier imager network
author: Xilin Yang, Michael John Fanous, Hanlong Chen, Ryan Lee, Paloma Casteleiro Costa, Yuhang Li, Luzhe Huang, Yijie Zhang, Aydogan Ozcan
summary: Abstract. Multispectral imaging, which simultaneously captures the spatial and spectral information of a scene, is widely used across diverse fields, including remote sensing, biomedical imaging, and agricultural monitoring. We introduce a snapshot multispectral imaging approach employing a standard monochrome image sensor with no additional spectral filters or customized components. Our system leverages the inherent chromatic aberration of wavelength-dependent defocusing as a natural source of physical encoding of multispectral information; this encoded image information is rapidly decoded via a deep learning-based multispectral Fourier imager network (mFIN). We experimentally tested our method with six illumination bands and demonstrated an overall accuracy of 98.25% for predicting the illumination channels at the input and achieved a robust multispectral image reconstruction on various test objects. This deep learning-powered framework achieves high-quality multispectral image reconstruction using snapshot image acquisition with a monochrome image sensor and could be useful for applications in biomedicine, industrial quality control, and agriculture, among others.
title_cn: 通过散焦和傅里叶成像网络进行快照多光谱成像
abstract_cn: 抽象的。多光谱成像可同时捕获场景的空间和光谱信息，广泛应用于遥感、生物医学成像和农业监测等不同领域。我们引入了一种快照多光谱成像方法，该方法采用标准单色图像传感器，无需额外的光谱滤波器或定制组件。我们的系统利用波长相关散焦的固有色差作为多光谱信息物理编码的自然来源；这种编码的图像信息通过基于深度学习的多光谱傅里叶成像网络（mFIN）快速解码。我们用六个照明波段对我们的方法进行了实验测试，证明了预测输入照明通道的总体准确度为 98.25%，并在各种测试对象上实现了稳健的多光谱图像重建。这种深度学习驱动的框架使用单色图像传感器的快照图像采集实现了高质量的多光谱图像重建，可用于生物医学、工业质量控制和农业等领域的应用。

title: Wide-field mid-infrared cavity-enhanced upconversion imaging
author: Yue Song, Jia'nan Fang, Wen Zhang, Yijing Li, Ben Sun, Zhiwei Jia, Kun Huang, Heping Zeng
summary: Abstract. Mid-infrared (MIR) spectral imaging enables precise target identification and analysis by capturing rich chemical fingerprints, which calls for high-sensitivity broadband MIR imagers at room temperature. Here, we devise and implement a continuous-wave pumping MIR upconversion imaging system based on external-cavity enhancement, which favors a large field of view, a low cavity loss, and a high spectral resolution. The involved optical cavity is constructed in an integrated fashion by utilizing one crystal facet as a cavity mirror, which allows a 43-fold power enhancement for the single-longitudinal-mode pump at 1064 nm. In combination with the chirped-poling crystal design, high-fidelity and wide-field spectral imaging mapping is permitted to facilitate an acceptance angle of up to 28.5 deg over a spectral coverage of 2.5 to 5  μm. Moreover, a thermal locking approach is used to stabilize the cavity at high-power operation, eliminating active feedback and ensuring long-term stability. A proof-of-principle demonstration is presented to showcase real-time observation of CO2 gas injection dynamics. The implemented MIR upconversion imager features wide-field operation, high detection sensitivity, and compact footprint, which would benefit subsequent applications, including environment monitoring, gas leakage inspection, and medical diagnostics.
title_cn: 宽视场中红外腔增强上转换成像
abstract_cn: 抽象的。中红外 (MIR) 光谱成像通过捕获丰富的化学指纹来实现精确的目标识别和分析，这需要在室温下使用高灵敏度宽带 MIR 成像仪。在这里，我们设计并实现了一种基于外腔增强的连续波泵浦中红外上转换成像系统，该系统有利于大视场、低腔损耗和高光谱分辨率。所涉及的光学腔体采用集成方式构建，利用一个晶体面作为腔镜，使单纵模泵浦在1064 nm处的功率增强了43倍。与啁啾极化晶体设计相结合，可以实现高保真度和宽视场光谱成像映射，从而在 2.5 至 5μm 的光谱覆盖范围内实现高达 28.5 度的接收角。此外，采用热锁定方法来稳定高功率运行下的腔体，消除主动反馈并确保长期稳定性。原理验证演示展示了 CO2 气体注入动态的实时观察。所实现的中红外上转换成像仪具有宽视场操作、高检测灵敏度和紧凑的占地面积，这将有利于后续应用，包括环境监测、气体泄漏检查和医疗诊断。

title: Active learning–augmented end-to-end modeling toward fast inverse design in chirped pulse amplification
author: Helin Jiang, Guoqing Pu, Xinyi Ma, Weisheng Hu, Lilin Yi
title_cn: 主动学习——增强端到端建模，实现啁啾脉冲放大中的快速逆设计

title: High-speed video imaging via multiplexed temporal gradient snapshot
author: Yifei Zhang, Xing Liu, Lishun Wang, Ping Wang, Ganzhangqin Yuan, Mu Ku Chen, Kui Jiang, Xin Yuan, Zihan Geng
summary: Abstract. High-speed imaging is crucial for understanding the transient dynamics of the world, but conventional frame-by-frame video acquisition is limited by specialized hardware and substantial data storage requirements. We introduce “SpeedShot,” a computational imaging framework for efficient high-speed video imaging. SpeedShot features a low-speed dual-camera setup, which simultaneously captures two temporally coded snapshots. Cross-referencing these two snapshots extracts a multiplexed temporal gradient image, producing a compact and multiframe motion representation for video reconstruction. Recognizing the unique temporal-only modulation model, we propose an explicable motion-guided scale-recurrent transformer for video decoding. It exploits cross-scale error maps to bolster the cycle consistency between predicted and observed data. Evaluations on both simulated datasets and real imaging setups demonstrate SpeedShot’s effectiveness in video-rate up-conversion, with pronounced improvement over video frame interpolation and deblurring methods. The proposed framework is compatible with commercial low-speed cameras, offering a versatile low-bandwidth alternative for video-related applications, such as video surveillance and sports analysis.
title_cn: 通过多路复用时间梯度快照进行高速视频成像
abstract_cn: 抽象的。高速成像对于理解世界的瞬态动态至关重要，但传统的逐帧视频采集受到专用硬件和大量数据存储要求的限制。我们推出“SpeedShot”，一种用于高效高速视频成像的计算成像框架。 SpeedShot 采用低速双摄像头设置，可同时捕获两个临时编码的快照。交叉引用这两个快照可提取多路复用的时间梯度图像，从而为视频重建生成紧凑的多帧运动表示。认识到独特的仅时间调制模型，我们提出了一种用于视频解码的可解释的运动引导尺度循环变换器。它利用跨尺度误差图来增强预测数据和观测数据之间的循环一致性。对模拟数据集和真实成像设置的评估证明了 SpeedShot 在视频速率上转换方面的有效性，与视频帧插值和去模糊方法相比有显着改进。所提出的框架与商业低速摄像机兼容，为视频相关应用（例如视频监控和体育分析）提供了通用的低带宽替代方案。

title: Chip-scale wavelength-domain optical Ising machine
author: Xinyu Liu, Wenkai Zhang, Wenguang Xu, Hailong Zhou, Ming Li, Jianji Dong, Xinliang Zhang
summary: Abstract. Ising problems are critical for a wide range of applications. Solving these problems on a photonic platform takes advantage of the unique properties of photons, such as high speed, low power consumption, and large bandwidth. Recently, there has been growing interest in using photonic platforms to accelerate the optimization of Ising models, paving the way for the development of ultrafast hardware in machine learning. However, these proposed systems face challenges in simultaneously achieving high spin scalability, encoding flexibility, and low system complexity. We propose a wavelength-domain optical Ising machine that utilizes optical signals at different wavelengths to represent distinct Ising spins for Ising simulation. We design and experimentally validate a chip-scale Ising machine capable of solving classical non-deterministic polynomial-time problems. The proposed Ising machine supports 32 spins and features 2 distinct coupling encoding schemes. Furthermore, we demonstrate the feasibility of scaling the system to 256 spins. This approach verifies the viability of performing Ising simulations in the wavelength dimension, offering substantial advantages in scalability. These advancements lay the groundwork for future large-scale expansion and practical applications in cloud computing.
title_cn: 芯片级波长域光伊辛机
abstract_cn: 抽象的。 Ising 问题对于广泛的应用来说至关重要。在光子平台上解决这些问题利用了光子的独特特性，例如高速、低功耗和大带宽。最近，人们对使用光子平台加速伊辛模型的优化越来越感兴趣，为机器学习中超快硬件的发展铺平了道路。然而，这些提出的系统面临着同时实现高自旋可扩展性、编码灵活性和低系统复杂性的挑战。我们提出了一种波长域光学伊辛机，它利用不同波长的光信号来表示不同的伊辛自旋以进行伊辛模拟。我们设计并通过实验验证了能够解决经典的非确定性多项式时间问题的芯片级伊辛机。所提出的伊辛机支持 32 次旋转并具有 2 种不同的耦合编码方案。此外，我们还证明了将系统扩展至 256 次旋转的可行性。这种方法验证了在波长维度上执行伊辛模拟的可行性，在可扩展性方面提供了巨大的优势。这些进步为云计算未来的大规模扩展和实际应用奠定了基础。

title: Converting a conventional camera to a super-camera: directional atmospheric scattering modeling for passive imaging in intense real-world scattering scenarios
author: Yihui Fan, Xin Jin, Shun Zou, Haiyang Yu
summary: Abstract. Passive imaging through intense atmospheric scattering is a critical yet formidable challenge in optical imaging, with profound implications across various applications. Conventional cameras struggle under severe scattering conditions, fundamentally limiting their effectiveness. We propose a groundbreaking directional atmospheric scattering model that revolutionizes passive imaging capabilities, converting a conventional camera to a super-camera. The model precisely characterizes directional photon propagation through scattering media, transforming this historically ill-posed problem into a well-posed solution, based on which a 4D spatial-angular scattering reconstruction method is proposed, which leverages both ballistic photons and directionally resolved scattered light, without relying on any scene-specific priors, to achieve unprecedented passive imaging performance enabling color imaging through over 12 transport mean free paths at distances up to 1.76 km. Our system recovers targets contributing as little as 0.00016% of the total detected signal, enhancing a standard camera’s signal recovery capacity by nearly 200×. To validate our approach, we introduce the first-ever real-world multiperspective scattering dataset, providing a critical benchmark for future research. We mark a paradigm shift in passive imaging, offering transformative potential for real-world applications under extreme atmospheric scattering conditions.
title_cn: 将传统相机转换为超级相机：在强烈的现实世界散射场景中进行被动成像的定向大气散射建模
abstract_cn: 抽象的。通过强烈的大气散射进行被动成像是光学成像中一个关键而艰巨的挑战，对各种应用产生深远的影响。传统相机在严重的散射条件下表现不佳，从根本上限制了它们的有效性。我们提出了一种突破性的定向大气散射模型，彻底改变了被动成像能力，将传统相机转变为超级相机。该模型精确地表征了通过散射介质的定向光子传播，将这个历史上不适定的问题转化为适定的解决方案，在此基础上提出了4D空间角散射重建方法，该方法利用弹道光子和定向分辨散射光，而不依赖于任何特定于场景的先验，以实现前所未有的被动成像性能，从而能够在距离长达1.76公里的情况下通过超过12个传输平均自由路径进行彩色成像。我们的系统恢复的目标仅占检测到的总信号的 0.00016%，将标准相机的信号恢复能力提高了近 200 倍。为了验证我们的方法，我们引入了第一个真实世界的多视角散射数据集，为未来的研究提供了关键的基准。我们标志着被动成像的范式转变，为极端大气散射条件下的现实世界应用提供了变革潜力。

title: Purcell-enhanced picosecond emission in semiconducting 4H/6H-SiC monocrystalline nanowire forest microcavity
author: Xueli Sun, Qin Ling, Ruonan Miao, Huaxin Wu, Jiyang Fan
summary: Abstract. Silicon carbide (core third-generation wide-bandgap semiconductor) nanowires have superior characteristics and vital engineering potential in microelectric and photonic devices operating in harsh high-temperature and strong-irradiation environments. Herein, the dense monocrystalline forest-like 4H- and 6H-SiC nanowires (intrinsically bound as a single crystal) are fabricated using the top–down peeling method. They exhibit broadband light emissions spanning the red–green–blue spectral region. The naturally formed microcavity encapsulating the SiC nanowires yields discrete and multimodal emission lines; the luminescence lifetimes decrease to the order of picoseconds owing to improved photon density of states in the microcavity by the quantum electrodynamic Purcell effect. The measured Purcell factor of 8.35 agrees well with the theoretical value of 8.6. The low-temperature luminescence and work functions show significant dependence on the nanowire polytype. The luminescence exhibits peculiar staircase-function enhancement when the temperature is elevated to 200 K, owing to suppression of nonradiative transition channels.
title_cn: 半导体 4H/6H-SiC 单晶纳米线森林微腔中的 Purcell 增强皮秒发射
abstract_cn: 抽象的。碳化硅（第三代宽带隙半导体核心）纳米线在恶劣高温和强辐照环境下运行的微电子和光子器件中具有优越的特性和重要的工程潜力。在此，使用自上而下的剥离方法制造了密集的单晶森林状4H-和6H-SiC纳米线（本质上束缚为单晶）。它们表现出跨越红-绿-蓝光谱区域的宽带光发射。封装 SiC 纳米线的自然形成的微腔产生离散和多峰发射线；由于量子电动珀塞尔效应提高了微腔中的光子态密度，发光寿命缩短至皮秒量级。测得的 Purcell 因子为 8.35，与理论值 8.6 非常吻合。低温发光和功函数显示出对纳米线多型的显着依赖性。当温度升高到 200 K 时，由于非辐射跃迁通道的抑制，发光表现出特殊的阶梯函数增强。

title: Learning from better simulation: creating highly realistic synthetic data for deep learning in scattering media
author: Bozhen Zhou, Zhitao Hao, Zhenbo Ren, Edmund Y. Lam, Jianshe Ma, Ping Su
summary: Abstract. Obtaining the ground truth for imaging through the scattering objects is always a challenging task. Furthermore, the scattering process caused by complex media is too intricate to be accurately modeled by either traditional physical models or neural networks. To address this issue, we present a learning from better simulation (LBS) method. Utilizing the physical information from a single experimentally captured image through an optimization-based approach, the LBS method bypasses the multiple-scattering process and directly creates highly realistic synthetic data. The data can then be used to train downstream models. As a proof of concept, we train a simple U-Net solely on the synthetic data and demonstrate that it generalizes well to experimental data without requiring any manual labeling. 3D holographic particle field monitoring is chosen as the testing bed, and simulation and experimental results are presented to demonstrate the effectiveness and robustness of the proposed technique for imaging of complex scattering media. The proposed method lays the groundwork for reliable particle field imaging in high concentration. The concept of utilizing realistic synthetic data for training can be significantly beneficial in various deep learning-based imaging tasks, especially those involving complex scattering media.
title_cn: 从更好的模拟中学习：为散射介质中的深度学习创建高度真实的合成数据
abstract_cn: 抽象的。获得通过散射物体成像的地面实况始终是一项具有挑战性的任务。此外，复杂介质引起的散射过程过于复杂，无法通过传统物理模型或神经网络进行准确建模。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一种更好的模拟学习（LBS）方法。 LBS 方法通过基于优化的方法利用单个实验捕获图像的物理信息，绕过多重散射过程，直接创建高度真实的合成数据。然后，这些数据可用于训练下游模型。作为概念证明，我们仅根据合成数据训练一个简单的 U-Net，并证明它可以很好地推广到实验数据，而不需要任何手动标记。选择 3D 全息粒子场监测作为测试平台，并提供仿真和实验结果，以证明所提出的复杂散射介质成像技术的有效性和鲁棒性。该方法为高浓度下可靠的粒子场成像奠定了基础。利用真实的合成数据进行训练的概念对于各种基于深度学习的成像任务非常有益，特别是那些涉及复杂散射介质的任务。
