title: Recent developments of micro-scaled LED-based technologies and mechanisms in the fields of healthcare
author: He Huang, Longting He, Shirui Cai, Yuxuan Liu, Xiaokuo He, Xinxin Zheng, Shouqiang Lai, Tingzhu Wu, Zhong Chen
summary: Abstract. Micro-scaled light-emitting diode (LED) technology has emerged as a transformative tool in biomedical applications, offering innovative solutions across disease surveillance, treatment, and symptom rehabilitation. In disease surveillance, micro-scaled LEDs enable real-time, noninvasive monitoring of physiological parameters through wearable devices, such as skin-like health patches and wireless pulse oximeters; these systems leverage the miniaturization, low power consumption, and high precision of micro-scaled LEDs to track heart rate, blood oxygenation, and neural activity with exceptional accuracy. For disease treatment, micro-scaled LEDs play a pivotal role in optogenetic stimulation and phototherapy. By delivering specific light wavelengths, they enable precise cellular control for cardiac regeneration, neural modulation, and targeted cancer therapies, such as photodynamic therapy with reduced invasiveness. In addition, wireless micro-scaled LED systems facilitate localized and sustained treatments for conditions such as diabetic retinopathy. For symptom rehabilitation, micro-scaled LED-based devices enhance functional and aesthetic outcomes, exemplified by optical cochlear implants for high-resolution hearing restoration and flexible photostimulation patches for hair regrowth. The performance of micro-scale LEDs also brings new possibilities to the field of brain–computer interface. These applications highlight the versatility of micro-scaled LEDs in improving patient quality of life through minimally invasive, energy-efficient, and biocompatible solutions. Although there are still challenges in long-term stability and scalability, the integration of micro-scaled LEDs with advanced biomedical technologies promises to redefine personalized healthcare and therapeutic efficacy.
title_cn: 基于微型 LED 的技术和机制在医疗保健领域的最新进展
abstract_cn: 抽象的。微型发光二极管 (LED) 技术已成为生物医学应用中的变革性工具，为疾病监测、治疗和症状康复提供创新解决方案。在疾病监测中，微型 LED 可以通过可穿戴设备（例如类肤健康贴片和无线脉搏血氧计）对生理参数进行实时、无创监测；这些系统利用微型 LED 的小型化、低功耗和高精度来跟踪心率、血氧和神经活动，具有极高的准确性。对于疾病治疗，微型 LED 在光遗传学刺激和光疗中发挥着关键作用。通过提供特定的光波长，它们可以实现对心脏再生、神经调节和靶向癌症治疗的精确细胞控制，例如减少侵入性的光动力疗法。此外，无线微型 LED 系统有助于对糖尿病视网膜病变等疾病进行局部和持续治疗。对于症状康复，基于微型 LED 的设备可增强功能和美观效果，例如用于高分辨率听力恢复的光学耳蜗植入和用于毛发再生的灵活光刺激贴片。微型LED的性能也给脑机接口领域带来了新的可能性。这些应用凸显了微型 LED 在通过微创、节能和生物相容的解决方案改善患者生活质量方面的多功能性。尽管长期稳定性和可扩展性方面仍存在挑战，但微型 LED 与先进生物医学技术的集成有望重新定义个性化医疗保健和治疗效果。

title: Circular interleaving scan OCT enhances motion-contrast for 360 deg large-field iris angiography
author: Gongpu Lan, Delie Kong, Qun Shi, Zhipeng Wei, Jingjiang Xu, Yanping Huang, Jia Qin, Lin An, Michael D. Twa, Xunbin Wei
summary: Abstract. In vivo imaging of human iris vasculature remains a persistent challenge, limiting our understanding of its relationship with ocular disease pathogenesis. Conventional raster scan optical coherence tomography angiography (OCTA) suffers from angular-dependent contrast (including blind spots), limited field of view, and prolonged imaging time—challenges that restrict its clinical utility. We introduce a circular interleaving scan OCTA method that overcomes these barriers by enabling 360 deg high-contrast iris angiography with consistent spatiotemporal sampling and optimized motion contrast. The circular scan design enables direction-optimized sampling: we configured circumferential sampling density to approximately twice the radial density, enhancing detection of radially oriented iris vasculature. A Cartesian–polar coordinate transformation was implemented for eye-motion compensation, vessel realignment, and vasculature reconstruction. Compared with raster scan OCTA, our circular scan protocol demonstrates 1.55× higher efficiency in iris vascular imaging, featuring a superior duty cycle (99.95% versus 82.00%) and eliminating redundant data acquisition from rectangular field corners (27.3% of the circular area). This method improves vessel density measurement by 39.0% and vessel count quantification by 25.2% relative to raster scans. By eliminating angular-dependent blind spots, our method significantly enhances vascular quantification reliability, paving the way to a better understanding of ocular diseases and holding promising potential for future clinical applications.
title_cn: 圆形交错扫描 OCT 增强 360 度大视野虹膜血管造影的运动对比度
abstract_cn: 抽象的。人类虹膜脉管系统的体内成像仍然是一个持续的挑战，限制了我们对其与眼部疾病发病机制关系的理解。传统的光栅扫描光学相干断层扫描血管造影 (OCTA) 存在角度依赖性对比度（包括盲点）、有限的视野和较长的成像时间等挑战，限制了其临床应用。我们引入了一种圆形交错扫描 OCTA 方法，通过一致的时空采样和优化的运动对比度实现 360 度高对比度虹膜血管造影，从而克服了这些障碍。圆形扫描设计可实现方向优化采样：我们将圆周采样密度配置为径向密度的大约两倍，从而增强了径向虹膜脉管系统的检测。笛卡尔-极坐标变换用于眼动补偿、血管重新对准和脉管系统重建。与光栅扫描 OCTA 相比，我们的圆形扫描协议在虹膜血管成像中的效率提高了 1.55 倍，具有出色的占空比（99.95% 对比 82.00%），并消除了从矩形视场角（圆形区域的 27.3%）采集冗余数据。相对于光栅扫描，该方法将血管密度测量提高了 39.0%，将血管计数量化提高了 25.2%。通过消除角度依赖性盲点，我们的方法显着提高了血管量化的可靠性，为更好地了解眼部疾病铺平了道路，并为未来的临床应用提供了广阔的前景。

title: Generation of sub-three-cycle pulses via double-stage all-fiber nonlinear compression from a thulium-doped fiber laser
author: Yan Wu, Yu Cai, Guoqing Zhou, Jintao Fan, Youjian Song, Shiying Cao, Minglie Hu
summary: Abstract. We demonstrate few-cycle pulse generation based on double-stage all-fiber nonlinear pulse compression from a thulium-doped fiber laser at a repetition rate of ∼199.74  MHz. The homemade laser provides an average power of 130 mW, serving as the seed for subsequent amplification. After amplification, significant spectral broadening to an octave-spanning bandwidth (1.2 to 2.4  μm) is attained through self-phase modulation-dominated nonlinear effects in an ultrahigh numerical aperture fiber and a highly nonlinear fiber. Followed by a two-stage nonlinear compressor, the system directly delivers near transform-limited pulses with a pulse duration of 19.8 fs (2.9 cycles at a central wavelength of 2000 nm) and a pulse energy of 3.37 nJ. To the best of our knowledge, this result is the shortest pulse duration directly generated from a thulium-doped fiber laser. This robust and simplified all-fiber system provides a promising route toward practical mid-infrared frequency comb generation and mid-infrared spectroscopy.
title_cn: 通过掺铥光纤激光器的双级全光纤非线性压缩生成亚三周期脉冲
abstract_cn: 抽象的。我们演示了基于掺铥光纤激光器的双级全光纤非线性脉冲压缩的少周期脉冲生成，重复率为~199.74  MHz。自制激光器的平均功率为130 mW，作为后续放大的种子。放大后，通过超高数值孔径光纤和高非线性光纤中自相位调制主导的非线性效应，可以将光谱显着展宽至倍频程带宽（1.2至2.4μm）。后接两级非线性压缩器，该系统直接提供接近变换极限的脉冲，脉冲持续时间为 19.8 fs（中心波长为 2000 nm 时为 2.9 个周期），脉冲能量为 3.37 nJ。据我们所知，这个结果是掺铥光纤激光器直接产生的最短脉冲持续时间。这种强大且简化的全光纤系统为实用的中红外频率梳生成和中红外光谱提供了一条有前途的途径。

title: Homodyne coherent inter-satellite communications with IM/DD comparable DSP
author: Junda Chen, Kun Li, Tianjin Mei, Mingming Zhang, Zihe Hu, Jiajun Zhou, Chen Liu, Ming Tang, Peter A. Andrekson
summary: Abstract. The rapid development of low earth orbit (LEO) satellite communication networks imposes stringent bandwidth, cost, and power consumption requirements. Conventional intradyne detection (ID) architectures struggle with high Doppler frequency shifts (DFSs), necessitating excessive sampling rates and complex digital signal processing (DSP), resulting in elevated power consumption. This study proposes an inter-satellite polarization division multiplexing self-homodyne detection (PDM-SHD) architecture that compensates for DFSs in the optical domain by co-transmitting a polarization-orthogonal carrier light. The proposed architecture could achieve Nyquist sampling and half-quantization noise, leading to a 53.9% reduction in analog-to-digital converter power consumption under 40 Gbps 16-QAM transmission with a 16 dB signal-to-noise ratio. By demodulating I/Q axis signals independently with real-valued single-input single-output (SISO) processing, it requires only about 15% DSP complexity and achieves intensity-modulation and direct-detection comparable. SISO processing also has the potential to transmit I and Q components from separate devices or satellites, enabling a flexible satellite communication network. The results demonstrate that the proposed architecture achieves detection sensitivities of −40.8  dBm for 80 Gbps quadrature phase-shift keying transmission and −33.0  dBm for 160 Gbps 16-QAM transmission with Nyquist sampling, whereas the ID architecture can hardly work. The proposed architecture effectively balances satellite power constraints with DSP computational demands for high-speed mega-constellation communications.
title_cn: 具有 IM/DD 类似 DSP 的零差相干卫星间通信
abstract_cn: 抽象的。低地球轨道（LEO）卫星通信网络的快速发展提出了严格的带宽、成本和功耗要求。传统的内差检测 (ID) 架构难以应对高多普勒频移 (DFS)，需要过高的采样率和复杂的数字信号处理 (DSP)，从而导致功耗增加。本研究提出了一种卫星间偏振复用自零差检测（PDM-SHD）架构，该架构通过共同传输偏振正交载波光来补偿光域中的DFS。该架构可实现奈奎斯特采样和半量化噪声，在 40 Gbps 16-QAM 传输和 16 dB 信噪比下，模数转换器功耗降低 53.9%。通过采用实值单输入单输出 (SISO) 处理独立解调 I/Q 轴信号，仅需要约 15% 的 DSP 复杂度，即可实现与强度调制和直接检测相当的效果。 SISO 处理还具有从单独的设备或卫星传输 I 和 Q 分量的潜力，从而实现灵活的卫星通信网络。结果表明，所提出的架构在 80 Gbps 正交相移键控传输中实现了 -40.8  dBm 的检测灵敏度，在 160 Gbps 16-QAM 传输（采用奈奎斯特采样）下实现了 -33.0  dBm 的检测灵敏度，而 ID 架构几乎无法工作。所提出的架构有效地平衡了卫星功率限制与高速巨型星座通信的 DSP 计算需求。

title: Machine learning multitarget optimization for ultrashort pulse nonlinear dynamics in optical fibers
author: Liang Zhao, Senyu Wang, Hao Lei, Hongyu Luo, Jianfeng Li, Yong Liu
summary: Abstract. The design and optimization of nonlinear fiber laser sources, such as soliton self-frequency shift (SSFS) tunable sources and supercontinuum (SC) sources, have traditionally relied on manual tuning and simulations, posing challenges for real-time applications. Machine learning has shown promise in fiber nonlinear propagation characterization, but the optimization and design of nonlinear systems remain relatively unexplored, especially under multitarget optimization conditions. In this paper, we propose a method that combines deep reinforcement learning (DRL) and deep neural network (DNN) to achieve fast synchronization optimization of ultrafast pulse nonlinear propagation in optical fibers under multitarget optimization tasks, with applications demonstrated in complex SSFS and SC generation systems in the mid-infrared band. The results indicate that a set of optimization parameters can be obtained in a few seconds, enabling rapid, automated tuning of pulse parameters in pursuit of diverse optimization objectives. This integration of DRL and DNN models holds transformative potential for the real-time optimization of not only fiber lasers but also a wide variety of complex photonic systems, paving the way for intelligent, adaptive optical system design and operation.
title_cn: 光纤中超短脉冲非线性动力学的机器学习多目标优化
abstract_cn: 抽象的。非线性光纤激光源（例如孤子自频移（SSFS）可调谐源和超连续谱（SC）源）的设计和优化传统上依赖于手动调谐和模拟，这给实时应用带来了挑战。机器学习在光纤非线性传播表征方面显示出了前景，但非线性系统的优化和设计仍然相对未经探索，特别是在多目标优化条件下。在本文中，我们提出了一种结合深度强化学习（DRL）和深度神经网络（DNN）的方法，以实现多目标优化任务下光纤中超快脉冲非线性传播的快速同步优化，并在中红外波段的复杂SSFS和SC生成系统中得到了应用证明。结果表明，可以在几秒钟内获得一组优化参数，从而能够快速、自动地调整脉冲参数，以实现不同的优化目标。 DRL 和 DNN 模型的这种集成不仅具有光纤激光器实时优化的变革潜力，而且还具有各种复杂光子系统的实时优化潜力，为智能、自适应光学系统设计和操作铺平了道路。

title: High-speed and low-latency optical feature extraction engine based on diffraction operators
author: Run Sun, Yuemin Li, Tingzhao Fu, Yuyao Huang, Wencan Liu, Zhenmin Du, Sigang Yang, Hongwei Chen
summary: Abstract. Feature extraction in the optical domain offers a promising low-latency, high-throughput solution. Optical diffraction-based feature extraction operating under a coherent light source can further achieve parallel outputs with low energy consumption. However, it presents significant challenges for maintaining the coherent input, scaling the operation rates beyond 10 GHz, and ensuring the effective extraction of functional configuration simultaneously. We propose an optical feature extraction engine (OFE2), which is composed of a diffraction operator and a data preparation module, powering high-speed feature extraction for both image and temporal series tasks. This OFE2 can achieve a core latency of less than 250.5 ps; in addition, it can reach a throughput of 250 GOPS and an efficiency of 2.06 TOPS/W. Supported by the OFE2, a novel feature extraction paradigm is emerging, enabling high-speed, low-latency service access for applications in scene recognition, medical assistance, and digital finance.
title_cn: 基于衍射算子的高速低延迟光学特征提取引擎
abstract_cn: 抽象的。光域中的特征提取提供了一种有前景的低延迟、高吞吐量解决方案。在相干光源下运行的基于光学衍射的特征提取可以进一步实现低能耗的并行输出。然而，它对维持相干输入、将工作速率扩展到 10 GHz 以上以及确保同时有效提取功能配置提出了重大挑战。我们提出了一种光学特征提取引擎（OFE2），它由衍射算子和数据准备模块组成，为图像和时间序列任务的高速特征提取提供动力。该OFE2可以实现低于250.5 ps的核心延迟；此外，它还可以达到250 GOPS的吞吐量和2.06 TOPS/W的效率。在OFE2的支持下，一种新颖的特征提取范式正在兴起，为场景识别、医疗救助和数字金融等应用提供高速、低延迟的服务访问。

title: Direct generation of 1120-nm region mode-locked laser based on Yb-doped fiber with phase-biasing technology
author: Ruichen Zhang, Mingyue He, Jing Su, Yongjia Yao, Xinyun Yang, Luming Song, Hang Wang, Kunchi Li, Zhipeng Dong
summary: Abstract. Ytterbium (Yb)-based mode-locked fiber lasers have undergone significant development and found widespread applications owing to their high efficiency, compact size, and low cost. However, these lasers typically operate within the 1030 to 1080 nm range, and expanding their operational wavelength is crucial for applications across various fields. We present the direct generation of a mode-locked laser at 1120.06 nm using an all-polarization-maintaining structure, establishing the longest wavelength reported to date for Yb-doped fiber-based mode-locked lasers. A stable picosecond pulse laser at 1120 nm was realized by combining high-concentration Yb-doping and phase-biasing technology within a figure-9 cavity configuration. The laser delivers a pulse duration of 6.20 ps, a spectral width of 0.19 nm centered at 1120.06 nm, and a repetition rate of 21.52 MHz and reaches a maximum output power of 1.39 W via a double-cladding Yb fiber power amplifier in a master oscillator power amplifier configuration. Furthermore, we present a theoretical investigation of the laser performance, with simulation results aligning well with experimental findings. In addition, a 560.06-nm ultrafast yellow-green laser was generated through frequency doubling in a lithium triborate crystal. We present an approach for long-wavelength Yb-doped mode-locked lasers, with the potential to advance the development and application of Yb-based fiber lasers.
title_cn: 基于相位偏置技术的掺镱光纤直接产生1120 nm区域锁模激光器
abstract_cn: 抽象的。基于镱（Yb）的锁模光纤激光器由于其高效率、紧凑的尺寸和低成本而得到了显着的发展并得到了广泛的应用。然而，这些激光器通常在 1030 至 1080 nm 范围内工作，扩展其工作波长对于各个领域的应用至关重要。我们展示了使用全保偏结构直接生成 1120.06 nm 锁模激光器，建立了迄今为止报道的掺镱光纤锁模激光器的最长波长。通过在 9 字腔结构中结合高浓度 Yb 掺杂和相位偏置技术，实现了 1120 nm 的稳定皮秒脉冲激光器。该激光器提供 6.20 ps 的脉冲持续时间、以 1120.06 nm 为中心的 0.19 nm 光谱宽度和 21.52 MHz 的重复频率，并通过主振荡器功率放大器配置中的双包层 Yb 光纤功率放大器达到 1.39 W 的最大输出功率。此外，我们还对激光器性能进行了理论研究，仿真结果与实验结果非常吻合。此外，通过三硼酸锂晶体倍频产生 560.06 nm 超快黄绿激光。我们提出了一种长波长掺镱锁模激光器的方法，有可能推动镱基光纤激光器的开发和应用。

title: GLSaT: a spectral-aware transformer-based network enabling highly efficient and precise inverse design in metasurface optical filters
author: Jiahui Liao, Xucong Bian, Xiang’ai Cheng, Quanjiang Li, Yuting Jiang, Shaozhen Lou, Haoqian Wang, Zixiao Hua, Teng Li, Jiangbin Zhang, Zhongjie Xu, Yueqiang Hu, Zhongyang Xing
summary: Abstract. The traditional forward design process of metasurface optical filters is computationally costly and time-consuming; therefore, inverse design based on deep learning (DL) can help accelerate the process. We propose the global- and local-spectrum-aware transformer (GLSaT), a DL model that concerns the intrinsic correlations within the spectral sequences, compensating the drawbacks of current networks that only focus on structure-to-spectrum mappings. With both inter- and intra-fragment attention mechanisms implemented, the GLSaT achieves 32.9% higher accuracy than fully connected networks in our reflection tests. It also demonstrates an inherent balance between predictive precision and computational efficiency, outperforming alternative architectures. Furthermore, our extensive experimental validations demonstrate its generalization capability across diverse metasurface functionalities. The GLSaT architecture shows great potential for enhancing the efficiency of data-driven metasurface inverse design in the future.
title_cn: GLSaT：基于光谱感知变压器的网络，可在超表面光学滤波器中实现高效、精确的逆向设计
abstract_cn: 抽象的。传统的超表面光学滤波器正向设计过程计算成本高且耗时；因此，基于深度学习（DL）的逆向设计可以帮助加速这一过程。我们提出了全局和局部频谱感知变压器（GLSaT），这是一种关注频谱序列内内在相关性的深度学习模型，弥补了当前网络仅关注结构到频谱映射的缺点。通过实施片段间和片段内注意机制，GLSaT 在我们的反射测试中实现了比全连接网络高 32.9% 的准确度。它还展示了预测精度和计算效率之间的内在平衡，优于替代架构。此外，我们广泛的实验验证证明了其跨不同超表面功能的泛化能力。 GLSaT架构在提高未来数据驱动的超表面逆设计效率方面显示出巨大的潜力。

title: High-sensitivity Er3+/Yb3+:La2O3-TiO2-Ga2O3-ZrO2 optical temperature sensors under high magnetic field
author: Yanzhuo Wang, Jun Wu, Jiqi Lu, Enze Kang, Xichen Xu, Qiuming Fu, Shenggao Wang, Zhibin Ma, Wubin Dai, Yibo Han, Hongyang Zhao
summary: Abstract. Optical temperature sensor materials face great challenges in terms of temperature measurement sensitivity and applicability in extreme environments. To overcome these problems, Er3+/Yb3+ co-doped La2O3-TiO2-Ga2O3-ZrO2 (LTGZ) glasses were designed and synthesized using the aerodynamic levitation method. In the glass system, the strongest intensity of upconversion luminescence was measured on 3.0Yb3+/0.5Er3+ (mole fraction) co-doped LTGZ glasses. In the temperature range of 300 to 700 K, the maximum relative and absolute sensitivities were 2.71% and 0.56% K−1, respectively. The temperature reliability was proved through variable temperature cycling tests. More importantly, to our knowledge, it is the first time to investigate the optical temperature measurement capability under a high magnetic field in this as-designed sensor. By applying the magnetic field up to 42 T, the relative sensitivity changes from 1.79% to 1.58% K−1, revealing that the temperature sensitivity of the sensor remains stable even in high magnetic fields. The results of the study provide a reference for the selection of temperature measurement materials in the field of optical temperature sensing, and the designed temperature sensor can be used for temperature measurement in extreme environments, especially in strong magnetic field conditions, which provides an important value for the development of special optical temperature sensors.
title_cn: 高磁场下高灵敏度Er3+/Yb3+:La2O3-TiO2-Ga2O3-ZrO2光学温度传感器
abstract_cn: 抽象的。光学温度传感器材料在温度测量灵敏度和极端环境适用性方面面临巨大挑战。为了克服这些问题，采用气动悬浮方法设计并合成了Er3+/Yb3+共掺杂La2O3-TiO2-Ga2O3-ZrO2 (LTGZ)玻璃。在玻璃系统中，在3.0Yb3+/0.5Er3+（摩尔分数）共掺杂LTGZ玻璃上测量到最强的上转换发光强度。在300至700 K的温度范围内，最大相对和绝对灵敏度分别为2.71%和0.56% K−1。通过变温循环测试证明了温度可靠性。更重要的是，据我们所知，这是首次研究这种设计的传感器在高磁场下的光学温度测量能力。通过施加高达 42 T 的磁场，相对灵敏度从 1.79% 变化到 1.58% K−1，表明即使在高磁场下，传感器的温度灵敏度也保持稳定。研究结果为光学温度传感领域测温材料的选择提供了参考，所设计的温度传感器可用于极端环境特别是强磁场条件下的温度测量，为特种光学温度传感器的开发提供了重要价值。

title: Speckle Transformer: direct classification through scattering media with limited information
author: Qi Zhao, Zhiyuan Wang, Zhipeng Yu, Tianting Zhong, Haoran Li, Shengfu Cheng, Haofan Huang, Chi Man Woo, Huanhao Li, Puxiang Lai
summary: Abstract. Retrieving high-fidelity images from optical speckles remains challenging, especially when the information in speckles is severely insufficient. To address classification through scattering media under such constraints, we propose Speckle Transformer, a vision-transformer-based model that directly classifies objects using raw speckle patterns without intermediate image retrieval. By leveraging inherent features within speckles to extract discriminative features, our approach achieves nearly 90% accuracy for classifying speckles encoded with different images, outperforming traditional retrieval-classification pipelines by up to five times, even with extreme information sparsity (i.e., 1/1024 speckle regions of interest). In addition, we quantify speckle information capacity via information entropy analysis, demonstrating that classification accuracy correlates strongly with the information entropy of speckle autocorrelation. We not only overcome limitations of conventional methods but also establish a paradigm for real-time classification in scattering environments with constrained data.
title_cn: Speckle Transformer：通过信息有限的散射介质直接分类
abstract_cn: 抽象的。从光学散斑中检索高保真图像仍然具有挑战性，特别是当散斑中的信息严重不足时。为了解决在这种限制下通过散射介质进行分类的问题，我们提出了 Speckle Transformer，这是一种基于视觉变换器的模型，可以使用原始散斑图案直接对对象进行分类，而无需中间图像检索。通过利用散斑中的固有特征来提取判别性特征，我们的方法对用不同图像编码的散斑进行分类的准确度接近 90%，即使在信息极度稀疏（即 1/1024 感兴趣的散斑区域）的情况下，其性能也比传统的检索分类管道高出五倍之多。此外，我们通过信息熵分析量化散斑信息容量，证明分类精度与散斑自相关的信息熵密切相关。我们不仅克服了传统方法的局限性，而且还建立了在数据受限的散射环境中进行实时分类的范例。

title: X-ray microcomputed tomography of 3D chaotic microcavities
author: Ke Tian, Mohammed Zia Jalaludeen, Yeon Ui Lee, Shilong Li, Síle Nic Chormaic
summary: Chaotic microcavities play a crucial role in several research areas, including the study of unidirectional microlasers, nonlinear optics, sensing, quantum chaos, and non-Hermitian physics. To date, most theoretical and experimental explorations have focused on two-dimensional (2D) chaotic dielectric microcavities, while there have been minimal studies on three-dimensional (3D) ones since precise geometrical information of a 3D microcavity can be difficult to obtain. Here, we image 3D microcavities with submicron resolution using X-ray microcomputed tomography (micro CT), enabling nondestructive imaging that preserves the sample for subsequent use. By analyzing the ray dynamics of a typical deformed microsphere, we demonstrate that a sufficient deformation along all three dimensions can lead to chaotic ray trajectories over extended time scales. Notably, using the X-ray micro CT reconstruction results, the phase space chaotic ray dynamics of a deformed microsphere are accurately established. X-ray micro CT could become a unique platform for the characterization of such deformed 3D microcavities by providing a precise means for determining the degree of deformation necessary for potential applications in ray chaos and quantum chaos.
title_cn: 3D 混沌微腔的 X 射线微计算机断层扫描
abstract_cn: 混沌微腔在多个研究领域发挥着至关重要的作用，包括单向微激光器、非线性光学、传感、量子混沌和非厄米物理学的研究。迄今为止，大多数理论和实验探索都集中在二维（2D）混沌介电微腔上，而对三维（3D）混沌介电微腔的研究很少，因为很难获得3D微腔的精确几何信息。在这里，我们使用 X 射线微计算机断层扫描 (micro CT) 对亚微米分辨率的 3D 微腔进行成像，从而实现无损成像，保存样品以供后续使用。通过分析典型变形微球的射线动力学，我们证明沿所有三个维度的足够变形可以在较长的时间尺度上导致混沌射线轨迹。值得注意的是，利用X射线微CT重建结果，准确地建立了变形微球的相空间混沌射线动力学。 X 射线微 CT 可以提供一种精确的方法来确定射线混沌和量子混沌潜在应用所需的变形程度，从而成为表征此类变形 3D 微腔的独特平台。

author: Jiaan Gan, Yong Yang, Siwei Zhu, Shengjiang Chang, Xiaocong Yuan
title_cn: 由物理信息衍射神经网络支持的高速全光散斑解密

title: Ultrasound-induced light guiding overcomes contrast and resolution limits in optoacoustic tomography
author: Blanca Mestre-Torà, Xosé Luís Deán-Ben, Daniel Razansky, Martí Duocastella
summary: Intense light diffusion and attenuation through turbid biological tissues compromise the achievable depth, resolution, and contrast in optoacoustic tomography (OAT). We propose to mitigate this limitation by exploiting ultrasound waves to locally modulate the refractive index of scattering samples, effectively generating embedded light waveguides. Here, the ultrasound-induced waveguides enhanced light delivery into deep targets, achieving up to 110% improvement in contrast-to-noise ratio of OAT images at a depth of eight mean free scattering paths. Furthermore, ultrasound-mediated light focusing enables breaking through the acoustic diffraction limit by attaining 25 μm spatial resolution via localization OAT without the need for external circulating contrast agents. These findings demonstrate the potential of ultrasound-induced light guiding for enabling label-free super-resolution OAT with enhanced contrast and depth.
title_cn: 超声诱导光导克服了光声断层扫描中的对比度和分辨率限制
abstract_cn: 穿过浑浊生物组织的强烈光扩散和衰减会影响光声断层扫描 (OAT) 中可实现的深度、分辨率和对比度。我们建议通过利用超声波局部调制散射样品的折射率，有效地生成嵌入式光波导来减轻这一限制。在这里，超声波诱导波导增强了向深层目标的光传输，在八个平均自由散射路径的深度处，OAT 图像的对比度噪声比提高了 110%。此外，超声介导的光聚焦通过定位 OAT 实现 25 μm 空间分辨率，从而突破声学衍射极限，无需外部循环造影剂。这些发现证明了超声诱导光导具有增强对比度和深度的无标记超分辨率 OAT 的潜力。

title: Versatile and reconfigurable integrated silicon nitride photonic microresonator
author: Tong Lin, Haoran Wang, Xiaoyu Hao, Liu Li, Ziyang Xiong, Hao Deng, Yan Fan, Shihua Chen, Junpeng Lu, Zhenhua Ni
summary: Unlocking the full potential of integrated photonics requires versatile, multi-functional devices that can adapt to diverse application demands. However, confronting this challenge with conventional single-function resonators often results in cumbersome system designs. We present an elegant solution: a versatile and reconfigurable dual-polarization Si3N4 microresonator that represents a new perspective in on-chip photonic designs. Our device can be dynamically reconfigured into three distinct topologies: a Möbius-like microcavity, a Fabry–Pérot resonator, and a microring resonator. This unprecedented functionality is enabled by a tunable balanced Mach-Zehnder interferometer that facilitates controllable mutual mode coupling of counterpropagating light using a single control knob. We experimentally demonstrate that the device not only supports polarization-diverse operation on a compact footprint but also gives rise to a wide variety of physical phenomena, including a standing wave cavity, a traveling wave cavity, free spectral range multiplication, and the photonic pinning effect. These behaviors are accurately modeled using the transfer matrix method and intuitively explained by the temporal coupled-mode theory. Our results underscore the potential for a chip-scale platform to realize reconfigurable reconstructive spectrometers and on-chip synthetic dimensions for topological physics.
title_cn: 多功能且可重构的集成氮化硅光子微谐振器
abstract_cn: 释放集成光子学的全部潜力需要能够适应不同应用需求的多功能设备。然而，用传统的单功能谐振器应对这一挑战通常会导致繁琐的系统设计。我们提出了一种优雅的解决方案：一种多功能且可重新配置的双偏振 Si3N4 微谐振器，它代表了片上光子设计的新视角。我们的设备可以动态地重新配置为三种不同的拓扑：类莫比乌斯微腔、法布里-珀罗谐振器和微环谐振器。这一前所未有的功能是通过可调谐平衡马赫曾德干涉仪实现的，该干涉仪有助于使用单个控制旋钮实现反向传播光的可控互模耦合。我们通过实验证明，该器件不仅支持在紧凑的占地面积上进行偏振分集操作，而且还产生了多种物理现象，包括驻波腔、行波腔、自由光谱范围倍增和光子钉扎效应。这些行为使用传递矩阵方法进行精确建模，并通过时间耦合模式理论进行直观解释。我们的结果强调了芯片级平台实现可重构重构光谱仪和拓扑物理的片上合成维度的潜力。

title: Impact of sidewall passivation on reliability in InGaN-based micro-LEDs
author: Tae Kyoung Kim, Abu Bashar Mohammad Hamidul Islam, Jongil Kim, Hyeondong Lee, Minji Kim, Joohan Bae, June-O Song, Dong-Soo Shin, Jong-In Shim, Sang Ho Oh, Joon Seop Kwak
summary: The performance degradation of micro light-emitting diodes (micro-LEDs) is closely associated with the deterioration of sidewall passivation layers under prolonged electrical bias. We investigate reliability improvements in 20 μm×20 μm InGaN/GaN blue micro-LEDs by suppressing the formation of an unstable interfacial layer during sidewall passivation. SiO2 is deposited on the etched mesa sidewalls using either Sputtering or plasma-enhanced chemical vapor deposition (PECVD). Comparative analysis reveals that PECVD-passivated devices experience more severe performance degradation, primarily due to the increased leakage current. After 100 h of accelerated aging, external quantum efficiency decreases by 44% in PECVD-passivated samples, whereas Sputter-passivated devices exhibit only an 11% reduction. This discrepancy is attributed to the formation of a thicker and chemically unstable gallium oxynitride (Ga-OX-N1−X) interfacial layer at the SiO2/GaN-based interface, which facilitates the generation of sidewall defects. Suppressing the formation of this interlayer enhances the crystallinity and structural stability of the passivation layer, thereby mitigating the activation of point defects. Notably, Sputter deposition is more effective in minimizing the formation of Ga–O–N interlayer. These findings emphasize the critical role of achieving low-defect-density sidewall passivation to improve the reliability of micro-LEDs for next-generation high-resolution display applications.
title_cn: 侧壁钝化对 InGaN 基 micro-LED 可靠性的影响
abstract_cn: 微型发光二极管（micro-LED）的性能下降与长时间电偏压下侧壁钝化层的恶化密切相关。我们研究了通过抑制侧壁钝化过程中不稳定界面层的形成来提高 20 μm×20 μm InGaN/GaN 蓝色 micro-LED 的可靠性。使用溅射或等离子体增强化学气相沉积 (PECVD) 将 SiO2 沉积在蚀刻的台面侧壁上。比较分析表明，PECVD 钝化器件的性能下降更为严重，这主要是由于漏电流增加所致。经过 100 小时的加速老化后，PECVD 钝化样品的外部量子效率降低了 44%，而溅射钝化器件仅降低了 11%。这种差异归因于在 SiO2/GaN 基界面处形成了更厚且化学不稳定的氮氧化镓 (Ga-OX-N1−X) 界面层，这有利于侧壁缺陷的产生。抑制该中间层的形成增强了钝化层的结晶度和结构稳定性，从而减轻了点缺陷的激活。值得注意的是，溅射沉积在最小化 Ga-O-N 中间层的形成方面更有效。这些发现强调了实现低缺陷密度侧壁钝化对于提高下一代高分辨率显示应用的 micro-LED 可靠性的关键作用。

title: High-precision detection of birefringence change using geometric phase transition
author: Xiliang Zhang, Qian Lin, Yanwen Hu, Haolin Lin, Zhen Li, Zhenqiang Chen, Shenhe Fu
summary: We present both theoretical and experimental demonstrations of geometric phase (GP) transitions in a synthetic two-level photonic system. We demonstrate the use of this nontrivial phenomenon to achieve an unprecedented birefringence change detection, with a precision up to Δn∼10−11. This result represents a significant improvement of 3 orders of magnitude over conventional techniques (typically limited to the level of Δn∼10−8). In this system, two orthogonal polarizations of light constitute the effective two-level system, which is driven by a birefringence-sensitive synthetic magnetic field. A given photonic spin is able to precess around the “magnetic” field and exhibits a topological transition in its evolution trajectory in parameter space. We establish a direct relationship between the GP transition and birefringence change, which is the basis of our detection technique. This approach significantly improves detection sensitivity and stability as compared with previous detection techniques. Moreover, the presented results benefit many fundamental and applied research fields such as structured light shaping and photonic switching.
title_cn: 利用几何相变高精度检测双折射变化
abstract_cn: 我们提出了合成两级光子系统中几何相变（GP）的理论和实验演示。我们演示了利用这种重要现象来实现前所未有的双折射变化检测，精度高达 Δn∼10−11。这一结果表明比传统技术（通常限制在 Δn∼10−8 的水平）显着提高了 3 个数量级。在该系统中，两个正交的光偏振构成了有效的两能级系统，该系统由双折射敏感的合成磁场驱动。给定的光子自旋能够围绕“磁场”进动，并在参数空间的演化轨迹中表现出拓扑转变。我们在 GP 转变和双折射变化之间建立了直接关系，这是我们检测技术的基础。与之前的检测技术相比，该方法显着提高了检测灵敏度和稳定性。此外，所提出的结果有利于许多基础和应用研究领域，例如结构光整形和光子开关。

title: Metaphotonic terahertz biosensing: principles, progress, and prospects
author: Zhiqiang Wu, Shaodong Zhou, Yuntao Wu, Xiaohang Sheng, Xuru Jin, Guifang Wang, Liqing Ren, Songlin Zhuang, Qingqing Cheng
summary: Terahertz (THz) technology has emerged as a powerful and transformative tool in the field of biomedical detection, owing to its unique properties such as non-ionizing radiation, high spectral resolution, and strong sensitivity to weak intermolecular interactions. We systematically summarize the recent advances in THz biomedical detection, focusing on its underlying mechanisms, core technical platforms, and application frontiers. Technologically, THz time-domain spectroscopy (THz-TDS) and THz near-field microscopy (THz-SNOM) have enabled multi-scale, label-free detection ranging from macromolecules to living tissues. Metasurface-based sensors—particularly those leveraging electromagnetically induced transparency (EIT), bound states in the continuum (BICs), and exceptional points (EPs)—have significantly enhanced the sensitivity and selectivity of THz biosensing through tailored light–matter interactions and resonance engineering. In application, THz techniques have demonstrated unprecedented capabilities in detecting nucleic acids, proteins, and tumor cells, enabling differentiation of genetic mutations, monitoring of protein conformational dynamics, and real-time evaluation of cancer cell responses. In addition, the integration of THz devices with microfluidic platforms and artificial intelligence has paved the way for portable, high-throughput, and noninvasive diagnostics. Despite these promising developments, challenges such as signal attenuation in aqueous environments and limitations in system miniaturization remain to be addressed. We conclude by discussing prospective strategies for overcoming these barriers, thereby promoting the translation of THz technologies into clinical and translational medicine. Overall, our work aims to provide a comprehensive reference and forward-looking perspective for researchers and practitioners in the domain of THz biomedical detection.
title_cn: 超光子太赫兹生物传感：原理、进展与前景
abstract_cn: 太赫兹（THz）技术凭借其非电离辐射、高光谱分辨率以及对弱分子间相互作用的强敏感性等独特特性，已成为生物医学检测领域强大的变革性工具。我们系统总结了太赫兹生物医学检测的最新进展，重点关注其底层机制、核心技术平台和应用前沿。从技术上讲，太赫兹时域光谱（THz-TDS）和太赫兹近场显微镜（THz-SNOM）已经实现了从大分子到活体组织的多尺度、无标记检测。基于超表面的传感器，特别是那些利用电磁感应透明 (EIT)、连续体束缚态 (BIC) 和异常点 (EP) 的传感器，通过定制的光-物质相互作用和共振工程，显着提高了太赫兹生物传感的灵敏度和选择性。在应用中，太赫兹技术在检测核酸、蛋白质和肿瘤细胞、区分基因突变、监测蛋白质构象动力学以及实时评估癌细胞反应方面表现出了前所未有的能力。此外，太赫兹设备与微流体平台和人工智能的集成为便携式、高通量和无创诊断铺平了道路。尽管取得了这些有希望的发展，但水环境中的信号衰减和系统小型化的限制等挑战仍有待解决。最后，我们讨论了克服这些障碍的前瞻性策略，从而促进太赫兹技术向临床和转化医学的转化。总的来说，我们的工作旨在为太赫兹生物医学检测领域的研究人员和从业者提供全面的参考和前瞻性视角。

title: Dual-comb spectroscopic polarimetry for full Jones matrix retrieval enabled by polarization-controlled pulse sequences
author: Hidenori Koresawa, Hiroki Kitahama, Shogo Tanimura, Eiji Hase, Yu Tokizane, Akifumi Asahara, Takeo Minamikawa, Kaoru Minoshima, Takeshi Yasui
summary: Spectroscopic polarimetry (SP) is a valuable technique for evaluating thin films, optical materials, and biological samples by revealing both polarimetric and spectroscopic properties. However, its performance is limited by mechanical instability and slow data acquisition due to polarization modulation. To address this, we combine dual-comb spectroscopic polarimetry (DCSP) with polarization-controlled pulse sequences having distinct polarizations and time delays. This approach enables detailed characterization of a sample’s polarization response using the Jones matrix, providing both real and imaginary components as a function of wavelength by simultaneously measuring the optical amplitude and phase spectra in two orthogonal polarizations. This method, termed Jones matrix DCSP (JM-DCSP), allows for accurate analysis of optical elements, with experimental results in good agreement with theoretical predictions. By eliminating the need for mechanical modulation and enabling multiplexed polarization probing, JM-DCSP enhances the precision and utility of SP across a broad spectral range and may be applied to various optical characterization scenarios.
title_cn: 通过偏振控制脉冲序列实现全琼斯矩阵检索的双梳光谱偏振测量
abstract_cn: 光谱偏振测量 (SP) 是一种通过揭示偏振和光谱特性来评估薄膜、光学材料和生物样品的有价值的技术。然而，其性能受到机械不稳定和偏振调制导致的数据采集缓慢的限制。为了解决这个问题，我们将双梳光谱偏振测量 (DCSP) 与具有不同偏振和时间延迟的偏振控制脉冲序列相结合。这种方法可以使用琼斯矩阵详细表征样品的偏振响应，通过同时测量两个正交偏振中的光学幅度和相位光谱，提供作为波长函数的实部和虚部。这种方法称为琼斯矩阵 DCSP (JM-DCSP)，可以对光学元件进行精确分析，实验结果与理论预测非常吻合。通过消除机械调制的需要并实现多路偏振探测，JM-DCSP 提高了 SP 在宽光谱范围内的精度和实用性，并且可应用于各种光学表征场景。

title: Ptychography-enhanced correlography for non-line-of-sight imaging
author: Lingfeng Liu, Shuo Zhu, Taotao Qin, Lianfa Bai, Yingjie Shi, Enlai Guo, Jing Han
summary: Non-line-of-sight (NLOS) imaging offers promising solutions for extending the observable field of view in applications such as autonomous driving, remote sensing, and medical diagnostics. However, existing steady-state NLOS imaging methods struggle to reconstruct complex hidden objects due to incomplete sampling of the object’s Fourier amplitude. To address this challenge, we propose a ptychography-enhanced correlography for NLOS imaging (PEC-NLOS). This method leverages indirect speckle illumination on the relay wall and uses an industrial polarization-sensitive camera to acquire partial Fourier amplitude measurements of the hidden object. By scanning multiple indirect illumination points, a series of overlapping speckle patterns is collected. Through iterative phase retrieval using a ptychographic reconstruction algorithm, PEC-NLOS enables high-resolution and high-fidelity reconstruction of complex hidden scenes. Moreover, we introduce a 3D data correction strategy based on optical modeling of the NLOS geometry, incorporating non-invasive positional priors to refine all acquisition data. We not only address the limitations of complex object reconstruction and ambiguity in steady-state NLOS imaging but also establish a foundation for robust and efficient NLOS imaging in complex real-world environments.
title_cn: 用于非视距成像的叠层增强相关成像
abstract_cn: 非视距 (NLOS) 成像为扩展自动驾驶、遥感和医疗诊断等应用中的可观察视野提供了有前途的解决方案。然而，由于物体傅里叶振幅的采样不完整，现有的稳态非视距成像方法很难重建复杂的隐藏物体。为了应对这一挑战，我们提出了一种用于非视距成像的叠层描记术增强相关图（PEC-NLOS）。该方法利用中继墙上的间接散斑照明，并使用工业偏振敏感相机来获取隐藏物体的部分傅立叶振幅测量。通过扫描多个间接照明点，收集一系列重叠的散斑图案。通过使用叠层重建算法的迭代相位检索，PEC-NLOS 能够实现复杂隐藏场景的高分辨率和高保真度重建。此外，我们引入了基于 NLOS 几何光学建模的 3D 数据校正策略，结合非侵入性位置先验来细化所有采集数据。我们不仅解决了稳态非视距成像中复杂物体重建和模糊性的局限性，而且还为复杂的现实环境中稳健、高效的非视距成像奠定了基础。

title: Ultra-high-precision fused silica micro-hole machining via spherical aberration-assisted filamentation and laser-induced deep etching
author: Seunghyun Bang, Seonghyeon Kang, Hyunjong Lee, Hyungsik Kim, Seok Ho Song, Kwang-Geol Lee
summary: Glass materials play an increasingly important role in advanced technologies due to their superior physical properties. However, precise machining of glass remains a major challenge because of its brittleness and sensitivity to thermal and mechanical stresses. We present an approach that combines spherical-aberration–assisted filamentation with laser-induced deep etching to achieve ultra-high-precision micro-hole machining in fused silica substrates. By deliberately introducing spherical aberration into an intense femtosecond laser beam, thin, uniformly elongated, and stable filaments are generated, which effectively suppress unwanted plasma formation and thermal deformation typical of standard filamentation. Using this method, we fabricated micro-holes with diameters as small as 10 μm across various sizes, maintaining an almost zero taper even in 1-mm-thick samples. The sidewalls exhibited nanoscale smoothness (Ra=38.1 nm, root mean square (RMS) = 53.9 nm), and the hole area demonstrated excellent repeatability with only ∼1.0% variation across multiple trials. This simple optical configuration drastically reduces cost compared with existing approaches that rely on specialized components while moderately satisfying critical requirements for geometrical versatility, minimal damage, precision, and repeatability. We represent a significant step forward in precision glass machining and lay a foundation for future microstructured electronic, optical, and microfluidic devices.
title_cn: 通过球差辅助成丝和激光诱导深蚀刻进行超高精度熔融石英微孔加工
abstract_cn: 玻璃材料由于其优越的物理性能，在先进技术中发挥着越来越重要的作用。然而，由于玻璃易碎且对热应力和机械应力敏感，因此玻璃的精确加工仍然是一个重大挑战。我们提出了一种将球差辅助成丝与激光诱导深蚀刻相结合的方法，以在熔融石英基板上实现超高精度微孔加工。通过故意将球面像差引入强飞秒激光束中，可以生成细长、均匀伸长且稳定的细丝，从而有效抑制不需要的等离子体形成和标准细丝化典型的热变形。使用这种方法，我们制造了各种尺寸的直径小至 10 μm 的微孔，即使在 1 毫米厚的样品中也能保持几乎为零的锥度。侧壁表现出纳米级光滑度（Ra = 38.1 nm，均方根（RMS）= 53.9 nm），并且孔面积表现出出色的可重复性，在多次试验中仅变化约 1.0%。与依赖专用组件的现有方法相比，这种简单的光学配置大大降低了成本，同时适度满足几何多功能性、最小损伤、精度和可重复性的关键要求。我们代表了精密玻璃加工领域向前迈出了重要一步，并为未来的微结构电子、光学和微流体设备奠定了基础。

title: Harnessing speckle images: efficient extraction of hidden information
author: Weiru Fan, Xiaobin Tang, Xingqi Xu, Huizhu Hu, Vladislav V. Yakovlev, Shi-Yao Zhu, Da-Wei Wang, Delong Zhang
summary: Scattering obscures information carried by waves by producing speckle patterns, posing a fundamental challenge across diverse fields, from microscopy to astronomy. Although machine learning has recently shown promise in speckle analysis, existing approaches are hindered by their dependence on large, labeled datasets—a significant bottleneck in many real-world applications. Here, we introduce speckle unsupervised recognition and evaluation (SURE), a groundbreaking unsupervised learning strategy for speckle recognition that eliminates the need for labeled training data. SURE’s distinctive feature lies in its ability to extract invariant features through advanced clustering algorithms to enable direct classification of high-level information from speckle patterns without prior knowledge. We demonstrate the transformative potential of this approach in two key applications: (1) a noninvasive glucose monitoring system that accurately tracks glucose concentrations over time without extensive calibration and (2) a high-throughput communication system using multimode fibers, achieving improved performance in dynamic environments. In addition, we showcase SURE’s unprecedented capability to classify objects hidden behind obstacles using scattered light, further broadening its scope. This versatile approach opens new frontiers in biomedical diagnostics, quantum network decoupling, and remote sensing, unlocking a transformative new paradigm for extracting information from seemingly random optical patterns.
title_cn: 利用散斑图像：有效提取隐藏信息
abstract_cn: 散射通过产生散斑图案来掩盖波携带的信息，这对从显微镜到天文学的各个领域提出了根本性挑战。尽管机器学习最近在散斑分析方面显示出了希望，但现有方法因其对大型标记数据集的依赖而受到阻碍，这是许多实际应用中的一个重大瓶颈。在这里，我们介绍散斑无监督识别和评估（SURE），这是一种突破性的散斑识别无监督学习策略，无需标记训练数据。 SURE的显着特点在于它能够通过先进的聚类算法提取不变特征，从而无需先验知识即可直接对散斑图案中的高级信息进行分类。我们在两个关键应用中展示了这种方法的变革潜力：(1) 无创血糖监测系统，无需大量校准即可准确跟踪一段时间内的血糖浓度；(2) 使用多模光纤的高通量通信系统，可在动态环境中实现更高的性能。此外，我们还展示了 SURE 前所未有的能力，可以利用散射光对隐藏在障碍物后面的物体进行分类，进一步扩大了其范围。这种多功能方法开辟了生物医学诊断、量子网络解耦和遥感领域的新领域，开启了从看似随机的光学模式中提取信息的变革性新范式。

title: Hybrid optoelectronic-integrated module design for quantum communication
author: Zhao-Yuan Chen, Yan-Fei Liu, Xiao-Sheng Si, Hao Zheng, Tian-Mei Li, Lei Feng, Hǎo Zheng
summary: Quantum key distribution (QKD) technology is progressively transitioning from experimental research to industrial development. The development of highly integrated and stable QKD modules has thus emerged as a new research direction. Current integrated QKD research primarily focuses on the integration of optical systems, with relatively few studies addressing optoelectronic co-integration. Due to the more stringent demands of QKD systems on driving signal amplitude, noise, and bandwidth, the driving electronics become more complex and power-intensive, making it difficult to achieve the level of optoelectronic integration seen in classical optical communication systems. We propose a hybrid optoelectronic integrating scheme for QKD modules based on chip-on-board technology, which co-packages the QKD-encoding photonic chip and its required electronic driver chips within a compact, centimeter-scale module. By optimizing the layout structure, incorporating thermal management, and implementing active temperature control, the module temperature can be stabilized within a set range. Simulation and experimental results demonstrate that the module has a total power consumption of 7.69 W and can maintain a stable temperature of 45°C for extended periods when the thermoelectric cooler is active. This effectively ensures the stable operation of the photonic chip and supports long-term QKD functionality, thereby providing technical support for advancing hybrid optoelectronic integrated QKD systems.
title_cn: 量子通信混合光电集成模块设计
abstract_cn: 量子密钥分发（QKD）技术正逐步从实验研究过渡到产业开发。开发高度集成且稳定的QKD模块已成为新的研究方向。目前集成QKD研究主要集中在光学系统集成方面，涉及光电共集成的研究相对较少。由于QKD系统对驱动信号幅度、噪声和带宽的要求更加严格，驱动电子器件变得更加复杂和功耗密集，使得其难以达到经典光通信系统中的光电集成水平。我们提出了一种基于板载芯片技术的 QKD 模块混合光电集成方案，该方案将 QKD 编码光子芯片及其所需的电子驱动芯片共同封装在一个紧凑的厘米级模块内。通过优化布局结构、结合热管理、实施主动温度控制，可以将模块温度稳定在设定范围内。仿真和实验结果表明，该模块的总功耗为 7.69 W，在热电冷却器工作时可以长时间保持 45°C 的稳定温度。这有效保证了光子芯片的稳定运行并支持长期的QKD功能，从而为先进的混合光电集成QKD系统提供技术支持。

title: Neural network inspired backpropagation algorithm for nanophotonic optimization
author: Lingjie Fan, Ang Jiang, Jiajun Wang, Wenzhe Liu, Minjia Zheng, Lei Shi, Jian Zi
summary: In recent years, optimizing the design of photonic structures has become a key area of nanophotonic research. Traditional methods like shape optimization and topology optimization each have their advantages, but also limitations. Shape optimization is fast and easy to manufacture but struggles with achieving the best possible performance, especially for complex designs. Topology optimization, on the other hand, can create more innovative designs but often results in structures that are hard to fabricate. In this work, we propose, to our knowledge, a new method that combines the best features of both shape and topology optimization. We apply this method to design photonic devices like gratings, which are used in many optical applications. To make the process more efficient, we construct backpropagation in nanophotonic structures inspired by neural networks. This allows us to quickly calculate the gradients of the parameters, speeding up the optimization process. We design a highly efficient blazed grating and a polarization beam splitter (PBS) using our method. Better results are achieved than the previous, including finding the structure with high first-order performance over a broader spectrum and improving the performance of the PBS from 96% to 98.8%. By reducing optimization time from over 11,000 h to just 38 h, our method opens up new possibilities for faster and more efficient optical designs.
title_cn: 用于纳米光子优化的神经网络启发反向传播算法
abstract_cn: 近年来，光子结构的优化设计已成为纳米光子研究的重点领域。形状优化和拓扑优化等传统方法各有其优点，但也有局限性。形状优化快速且易于制造，但很难实现最佳性能，尤其是对于复杂的设计。另一方面，拓扑优化可以创造更多创新设计，但通常会导致难以制造的结构。在这项工作中，据我们所知，我们提出了一种结合了形状和拓扑优化的最佳特征的新方法。我们应用这种方法来设计光栅等光子器件，这些器件用于许多光学应用。为了使这个过程更加高效，我们受神经网络的启发，在纳米光子结构中构建了反向传播。这使我们能够快速计算参数的梯度，加快优化过程。我们使用我们的方法设计了高效的闪耀光栅和偏振分束器（PBS）。取得了比之前更好的结果，包括在更广泛的范围内找到具有高一阶性能的结构，并将 PBS 的性能从 96% 提高到 98.8%。通过将优化时间从超过 11,000 小时缩短至仅 38 小时，我们的方法为更快、更高效的光学设计开辟了新的可能性。

title: 10−20-level long-term relative frequency instability in a multi-branch optical frequency comb enabled by fiber noise cancellation
author: Bingjie Rao, Xiguang Yang, Mingkun Li, Xin Chen, Ning Yu, Zhenyuan Hu, Ruifang Dong, Shougang Zhang, Pan Zhang
summary: We demonstrated an all-polarization-maintaining (PM), multi-branch optical frequency comb based on an all-fiber configuration. To achieve fiber noise cancellation, we aligned the beat note of the out-of-loop branch with that of the in-loop branch by phase-locking both branches to a common 1550 nm ultra-stable laser. To further assess the out-of-loop frequency instability of the constructed fiber comb, we heterodyned it with another quasi-identical fiber comb. Thanks to effective fiber noise cancellation and a small difference in out-of-loop fiber lengths, the frequency instability of a single comb reached an exceptional level of 2.26 × 10 − 17 at 1 s and 8.4 × 10 − 20 at 4000 s.
title_cn: 通过光纤噪声消除实现多分支光学频率梳中的 10−20 级长期相对频率不稳定性
abstract_cn: 我们展示了一种基于全光纤配置的全保偏（PM）、多分支光学频率梳。为了实现光纤噪声消除，我们通过将两个分支锁相到常见的 1550 nm 超稳定激光器，将环外分支的拍音与环内分支的拍音对齐。为了进一步评估所构建的光纤梳的环外频率不稳定性，我们用另一个准相同的光纤梳对其进行外差处理。由于有效的光纤噪声消除和环外光纤长度的微小差异，单梳的频率不稳定性在 1 s 时达到 2.26 × 10 − 17 ，在 4000 s 时达到 8.4 × 10 − 20 。

title: Strong transverse Anderson localization in a PMMA-PS-air disordered optical fiber for ultra-broadband imaging
author: Jiajia Zhao, Yan Wu, Wenjiao Zou, Zhenghang Cheng, Bowen Bao, Lei Yue, Haimei Luo, Ming Tang
summary: We demonstrate, to our knowledge, a novel ternary elements disordered optical fiber (DOF) composed of polymethyl methacrylate (PMMA), polystyrene (PS), and air, which exhibits an enhanced transverse Anderson localization (TAL) effect over an ultra-wide bandwidth from visible to mid-infrared (MIR) wavelengths (633 – 2500 nm). Through systematic optimization of the element composition ratio and structural parameters, we achieved improved light confinement characteristics. At the optimal element ratio of 0.35:0.35:0.3 (PMMA:PS:air), the fiber maintains an average localized beam radius below 24 μ m across the 633 – 2500 nm wavelength range, representing a 17.5% radius reduction compared to conventional binary PMMA-PS DOFs. Imaging simulations validate the outstanding performance of the fiber, demonstrating stable image transmission with mean square error (MSE) fluctuations below 9.5% throughout the operational spectrum. This work not only enriches the theoretical foundation of DOF but also provides an innovative solution for broadband, high-resolution imaging applications.
title_cn: 用于超宽带成像的 PMMA-PS-空气无序光纤中的强横向安德森定位
abstract_cn: 据我们所知，我们展示了一种由聚甲基丙烯酸甲酯（PMMA）、聚苯乙烯（PS）和空气组成的新型三元元素无序光纤（DOF），它在从可见光到中红外（MIR）波长（633 - 2500 nm）的超宽带宽上表现出增强的横向安德森定位（TAL）效应。通过对元素组成比和结构参数的系统优化，我们实现了光限制特性的改善。在最佳元件比率为 0.35:0.35:0.3（PMMA:PS:空气）时，光纤在 633 – 2500 nm 波长范围内保持平均局部光束半径低于 24 μm，与传统二元 PMMA-PS DOF 相比，半径减少了 17.5%。成像模拟验证了光纤的出色性能，展示了稳定的图像传输，在整个工作频谱中均方误差 (MSE) 波动低于 9.5%。这项工作不仅丰富了DOF的理论基础，而且为宽带、高分辨率成像应用提供了创新的解决方案。

title: Spaceborne high-spectral-resolution lidar ACDL/DQ-1 measurement and validation of aerosol optical properties in 2023 Canadian wildfire smoke
author: Jianbo Hu, Xiong Wang, Yuan Xie, Juxin Yang, Pengfei Ma, Sihan Liu, Guangyao Dai, Xiaopeng Zhu, Xia Hou, Lingbing Bu, Jiqiao Liu, Weibiao Chen
summary: During June and July 2023, exceptionally widespread wildfires in Canada generated substantial quantities of smoke aerosols. The spaceborne high-spectral-resolution lidar (HSRL) can accurately retrieve aerosol optical properties without assuming lidar ratios. We utilized HSRL data from the Aerosol and Carbon Detection Lidar (ACDL) onboard the DQ-1 satellite to retrieve optical properties and investigate the spatiotemporal distributions of wildfire smoke aerosols. The results show that the smoke aerosol profiles obtained from the ACDL and the Cloud-Aerosol Lidar and Infrared Pathfinder Satellite Observation (CALIPSO) exhibit good consistency. The ACDL-derived aerosol optical depth (AOD) shows strong correlations with Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS) and Aerosol Robotic Network (AERONET) data, with coefficients of determination ( R 2 ) of 0.704 and 0.924, respectively. The validation results highlight the optical properties of Canadian wildfire smoke aerosols and demonstrate the observational advantages of ACDL.
title_cn: 星载高光谱分辨率激光雷达 ACDL/DQ-1 测量和验证 2023 年加拿大野火烟雾中的气溶胶光学特性
abstract_cn: 2023 年 6 月和 7 月期间，加拿大异常广泛的野火产生了大量烟雾气溶胶。星载高光谱分辨率激光雷达（HSRL）可以在不假设激光雷达比率的情况下准确地检索气溶胶光学特性。我们利用 DQ-1 卫星上的气溶胶和碳探测激光雷达 (ACDL) 的 HSRL 数据来检索光学特性并研究野火烟雾气溶胶的时空分布。结果表明，ACDL与云气溶胶激光雷达和红外探路者卫星观测（CALIPSO）获得的烟雾气溶胶剖面表现出良好的一致性。 ACDL 得出的气溶胶光学深度 (AOD) 与中分辨率成像光谱仪 (MODIS) 和气溶胶机器人网络 (AERONET) 数据具有很强的相关性，决定系数 (R 2 ) 分别为 0.704 和 0.924。验证结果突出了加拿大野火烟雾气溶胶的光学特性，并证明了 ACDL 的观测优势。

title: Hybrid-integrated multi-port multi-wavelength DFB laser array for optical I/O technology
author: Tongtong Yang, Zhenxing Sun, Zijiang Yang, Jie Zhao, Yuxin Ma, Jiaqiang Nie, Ling Wang, Shenghong Xie, Yan Wang, Pengfei Xu, Yipeng Mei, Xiangfei Chen, Laiwen Yu, Yuechun Shi
summary: The parallel multi-wavelength light source plays a critical role in optical input/output (I/O) systems by providing multiple wavelengths to enhance data transmission capacity and flexibility. This study proposes and experimentally demonstrates, to our knowledge, a novel on-chip parallel multi-wavelength light source based on an eight-wavelength distributed feedback (DFB) laser array, an arrayed waveguide grating (AWG)
title_cn: 用于光学 I/O 技术的混合集成多端口多波长 DFB 激光器阵列
abstract_cn: 并行多波长光源通过提供多个波长来增强数据传输容量和灵活性，在光输入/输出（I/O）系统中发挥着关键作用。据我们所知，本研究提出并通过实验证明了一种基于八波长分布式反馈（DFB）激光阵列的新型片上并行多波长光源，即阵列波导光栅（AWG）

title: Single-shot broadband scattering imaging based on speckle frequency refinement
author: Juncheng Liu, Xiyuan Luo, Jingbo Duan, Yi Feng, Meng Xiang, Xue Dong, Jinpeng Liu, Fei Liu, Xiaopeng Shao
summary: The speckle correlation technique (SCT), a noninvasive scattering imaging technique, has attracted widespread attention but is limited by the requirement of narrowband illumination. To address this drawback, we propose a broadband scattering imaging method based on speckle frequency refinement, which can effectively extract the useful components of speckle under broadband illumination. We verified its effectiveness through experiments with 10 – 400 nm bandwidth illumination. Notably, even under 400 nm bandwidth illumination, comparable to white light, the structural similarity index measure (SSIM) of the reconstruction by our method can stay above 0.6. This method can reconstruct the object using single-shot broadband speckles, demonstrating its potential advantages in practical applications.
title_cn: 基于散斑频率细化的单次宽带散射成像
abstract_cn: 散斑相关技术（SCT）作为一种非侵入性散射成像技术，受到了广泛的关注，但受到窄带照明要求的限制。针对这一缺点，我们提出了一种基于散斑频率细化的宽带散射成像方法，可以有效地提取宽带照明下散斑的有用成分。我们通过 10 – 400 nm 带宽照明的实验验证了其有效性。值得注意的是，即使在 400 nm 带宽照明下，与白光相比，我们的方法重建的结构相似性指数测量 (SSIM) 也可以保持在 0.6 以上。该方法可以利用单发宽带散斑重建物体，展示了其在实际应用中的潜在优势。

title: Luminescence characteristics and structure synthesis of Sn-doped phosphate glass
author: Rui Chen, Zhiyu Jiang, Feifei Huang, Ying Tian, Bingpeng Li, Shiqing Xu
summary: In the realm of luminescent glass, Sn 2+ ions have garnered considerable attention for their unique electronic transition properties and highly tunable luminescent performance, offering significant promise for novel optoelectronic devices and high-efficiency phosphor materials. However, challenges such as the regulation of Sn ion valence states, structural instability of the glass, and its susceptibility to hydrolysis present significant barriers to progress in this field. This study explores an innovatively designed phosphate glass system, modified with chloride, which provides an optimized substrate environment for luminescence. By incorporating a reducing agent, the prepared samples exhibit consistent and tunable valence state transformations of Sn ions, resulting in enhanced luminescence intensity and high transparency that effectively minimizes optical losses. Furthermore, co-doping with Dy 3 (cid:1) and Sm 3 (cid:1) ions yielded chromaticity coordinates of (0.21, 0.21) and (0.23, 0.19), respectively, demonstrating a tunable emission spectrum ranging from blue to pale yellow and orange-red. The findings indicate that this material holds substantial potential for applications in optoelectronic devices, advanced lighting systems, and other optical materials.
title_cn: Sn掺杂磷酸盐玻璃的发光特性及结构合成
abstract_cn: 在发光玻璃领域，Sn 2+ 离子因其独特的电子跃迁特性和高度可调的发光性能而受到广泛关注，为新型光电器件和高效荧光粉材料提供了重要前景。然而，Sn离子价态的调节、玻璃的结构不稳定性及其对水解的敏感性等挑战对该领域的进展构成了重大障碍。本研究探索了一种创新设计的磷酸盐玻璃系统，并用氯化物进行了改性，为发光提供了优化的基质环境。通过加入还原剂，制备的样品表现出一致且可调的 Sn 离子价态转变，从而增强发光强度和高透明度，从而有效地最大限度地减少光学损失。此外，与Dy 3 (cid:1)和Sm 3 (cid:1)离子共掺杂分别产生了(0.21,0.21)和(0.23,0.19)的色度坐标，展示了从蓝色到浅黄色和橙红色的可调发射光谱。研究结果表明，这种材料在光电器件、先进照明系统和其他光学材料方面具有巨大的应用潜力。

title: Square spectrum pulses observed in a mode-locked laser with anomalous dispersion
author: Xun Xie, Ruhai Bai, Shaoxiang Chen, Yundong Zhang, Seongwoo Yoo, Wonkeun Chang
summary: Optical spectral analysis plays a crucial role in ultrafast lasers for distinguishing pulse types within a specific dispersion regime. A square spectrum, commonly found in normal dispersion regimes, can also be detected in a net anomalous dispersion cavity centered around a wavelength of 1.78 μ m. The performance of these pulses has been characterized through experiments. Our simulations are able to replicate the spectra using experimental parameters that closely match those used in the experiments. It indicates that this phenomenon occurs due to changes in the gain center of the effective gain, which are influenced by saturation effects. We believe this research could offer valuable techniques for pulse control and aid in the characterization of similar pulse behaviors
title_cn: 在具有反常色散的锁模激光器中观察到的方波谱脉冲
abstract_cn: 光谱分析在超快激光器中起着至关重要的作用，可用于区分特定色散范围内的脉冲类型。在正常色散区域中常见的方形光谱也可以在以 1.78 μm 波长为中心的净反常色散腔中检测到。这些脉冲的性能已通过实验进行了表征。我们的模拟能够使用与实验中使用的参数非常匹配的实验参数来复制光谱。这表明这种现象的发生是由于有效增益的增益中心受到饱和效应的影响而发生的变化。我们相信这项研究可以为脉冲控制提供有价值的技术，并有助于表征类似的脉冲行为

title: In-situ aberration correction for far-detuned laser systems via a trapped ion probe
author: Yan Chen, Quan Long, Yifan Zhou, Enteng An, Ran He, Jinming Cui, Yunfeng Huang, Chuanfeng Li
summary: High-fidelity focused spots, achieving the diffraction limit and ultra-low crosstalk, are critical for manipulating trapped atoms and ions. Despite the existence of various aberration compensation techniques, obtaining such high-quality focused spots remains challenging for far-detuned laser systems. Here, we demonstrate a universal in-situ aberration correction technique for far-detuned-laser-based individual addressing systems. Our approach utilizes a trapped ion as a probe and a spatial light modulator for optical aberration compensation, demonstrating 17-fold suppression of crosstalk and achieving a low Rabi crosstalk of 0.031(4)%, nearly a four-fold improvement over previous state-of-the-art results. This method establishes an effective tool for high-fidelity quantum operations in trapped ion and atom systems, pivotal for quantum computing.
title_cn: 通过俘获离子探针对远失谐激光系统进行原位像差校正
abstract_cn: 实现衍射极限和超低串扰的高保真聚焦点对于操纵捕获的原子和离子至关重要。尽管存在各种像差补偿技术，但对于远失谐激光系统来说，获得如此高质量的聚焦光斑仍然具有挑战性。在这里，我们展示了一种适用于基于远失谐激光的单独寻址系统的通用原位像差校正技术。我们的方法利用捕获离子作为探针和空间光调制器进行光学像差补偿，展示了 17 倍的串扰抑制，并实现了 0.031(4)% 的低拉比串扰，比之前的最先进结果提高了近四倍。该方法为捕获离子和原子系统中的高保真量子操作建立了有效的工具，这对量子计算至关重要。

title: A three-wavelength narrow-linewidth mid-infrared optical parametric oscillator based on secondary-pumping tandem MgO:PPLN double crystals
author: Erxian Xing, Xiaodai Yao, Chengcheng Chang, Yue Zhao, Zijian Wang, Yongji Yu, Guangyong Jin
summary: This study demonstrates a mid-infrared narrow-linewidth tandem optical parametric oscillator (TOPO) based on dual MgO: PPLN crystals. A secondary-pumping technique with a periodically poled MgO:PPLN crystal is employed to achieve three-wavelength mid-infrared laser outputs at 2.70, 3.45, and 4.25 μ m. A 1064 nm ytterbium-doped fiber laser is employed as the pump source, with a single laser output sequentially pumping two MgO:PPLN crystals which have period lengths of 30.44 and 31.89 μ m, respectively. The synchronous three-wavelength mid-infrared laser output is achieved through two optical parametric oscillation (OPO) processes and one TOPO process. The processes are as follows: 1.06 μ m → 1.53 μ m + 3.45 μ m; 1.06 μ m → 1.75 μ m + 2.70 μ m; 1.53 μ m → 2.40 μ m + 4.25 μ m. The linewidth of the signal light is compressed using a 1 mm thick Fabry – Perot (F – P) etalon, reducing the linewidths of 2.70, 3.45, and 4.25 μ m from 3.03, 7.83, and 1.20 nm to 0.32, 0.60, and 0.55 nm, respectively. The associated output powers are 0.681, 1.342, and 0.098 W.
title_cn: 基于二次泵浦串联MgO:PPLN双晶的三波长窄线宽中红外光参量振荡器
abstract_cn: 本研究展示了一种基于双 MgO:PPLN 晶体的中红外窄线宽串联光学参量振荡器 (TOPO)。采用周期性极化 MgO:PPLN 晶体的二次泵浦技术可实现 2.70、3.45 和 4.25 μm 的三波长中红外激光输出。采用1064 nm掺镱光纤激光器作为泵浦源，单个激光输出依次泵浦两个周期长度分别为30.44和31.89 μm的MgO:PPLN晶体。通过两次光参量振荡（OPO）工艺和一次TOPO工艺实现同步三波长中红外激光输出。工艺流程如下：1.06μm→1.53μm+3.45μm； 1.06μm→1.75μm+2.70μm； 1.53μm→2.40μm+4.25μm。使用1毫米厚的法布里-珀罗（F-P）标准具压缩信号光的线宽，将2.70、3.45和4.25μm的线宽分别从3.03、7.83和1.20 nm减小到0.32、0.60和0.55 nm。相关输出功率为 0.681、1.342 和 0.098 W。

title: Integrated computational spectrometer with 40 pm resolution using tunable micro-ring resonators
author: Kai Wang, Zeruihong She, Hongren Tan, Tianyue Zhang, Lei Zhang
summary: The increasing demand for miniaturized and portable spectrometers across diverse applications drives the development of computational spectrometers based on algorithmic reconstruction. This work presents an integrated computational spectrometer fabricated on a silicon-on-insulator (SOI) substrate. The device utilizes six cascaded tunable add-drop micro-rings, each with two tuning states, providing 128 distinct filtering channels within a compact footprint of 0.62 mm 2 . Experimental results demonstrate successful spectral reconstruction within the 1525 – 1565 nm band, achieving a resolution of 40 pm. The average power consumption of the device is 140 mW.
title_cn: 使用可调谐微环谐振器的集成计算光谱仪，分辨率为 40 pm
abstract_cn: 各种应用对小型化和便携式光谱仪不断增长的需求推动了基于算法重建的计算光谱仪的发展。这项工作提出了一种在绝缘体上硅 (SOI) 基板上制造的集成计算光谱仪。该器件采用六个级联可调谐分插微环，每个环具有两种调谐状态，在 0.62 mm 2 的紧凑占地面积内提供 128 个不同的滤波通道。实验结果表明，在 1525 – 1565 nm 波段内成功进行了光谱重建，分辨率达到 40 pm。该设备的平均功耗为140 mW。

title: Experimental demonstration of dual-wavelength single-photon polarimetric imaging LiDAR
author: Lichao Peng, Youshuo Cui, Yuzhuo Li, Guangxiao Hu, Yanzhou Chen, Yunkun Zhao, Yun Wang, Zhonghuai Wu, Kemi Xu, Weiqian Zhao
summary: Photon-counting polarimetric imaging provides more dimensional information compared to conventional imaging systems. We present a compact dual-wavelength infrared polarimetric light detection and ranging system operating at 1550 and 2004 nm, utilizing direct detection with superconducting nanowire single-photon detectors. This system achieves millimeter-scale resolution in both lateral and axial dimensions at a target distance of ∼ 1.3 m. Experimental results demonstrate an improved material discrimination advantage at low photon flux by integrating dual-band photon counting detection with polarimetric imaging, outperforming traditional intensity-based measurement methods. This work demonstrates broad application prospects in scenarios involving mid-infrared remote sensing and complex environmental exploration.
title_cn: 双波长单光子偏振成像激光雷达实验演示
abstract_cn: 与传统成像系统相比，光子计数偏振成像可提供更多维度信息。我们提出了一种紧凑型双波长红外偏振光探测和测距系统，工作波长为 1550 nm 和 2004 nm，利用超导纳米线单光子探测器进行直接探测。该系统在目标距离约 1.3 m 的情况下在横向和轴向尺寸上实现了毫米级分辨率。实验结果表明，通过将双波段光子计数检测与偏振成像相结合，在低光子通量下提高了材料辨别优势，优于传统的基于强度的测量方法。该工作在中红外遥感和复杂环境探索等场景中展示了广阔的应用前景。

title: Low-loss, low-crosstalk polarization-independent lithium niobate crossing waveguide based on the multimode interference coupling principle
author: Chunyu Deng, Yibo Lu, Wanghua Zhu, Pengcheng Liu, Yu Zhang, Yuanbo Li, Yulong Jian, Guohua Hu, Kun Yu
summary: Lithium niobate (LN) integrated crossing waveguides are essential components in photonic integrated circuits. However, the refractive index tensor of lithium niobate and the asymmetry of waveguides lead to polarization-dependent performance of LN crossing waveguides. In this Letter, a polarization-independent lithium niobate crossing waveguide on the lithium-niobate-on-insulator platform is proposed and demonstrated using the multimode interference coupling principle. Experimental results show that the proposed device exhibits low insertion losses ( < − 0.96 dB), with crosstalk below − 37 dB over the wavelength range of 1480 – 1640 nm. The proposed device significantly enhances the on-chip density of lithium-niobate-based photonic interconnection networks.
title_cn: 基于多模干涉耦合原理的低损耗、低串扰、偏振无关的铌酸锂交叉波导
abstract_cn: 铌酸锂（LN）集成交叉波导是光子集成电路中的重要元件。然而，铌酸锂的折射率张量和波导的不对称性导致LN交叉波导的偏振相关性能。在这封信中，利用多模干涉耦合原理，提出并演示了绝缘体上铌酸锂平台上的偏振无关铌酸锂交叉波导。实验结果表明，所提出的器件具有低插入损耗（< − 0.96 dB），在 1480 – 1640 nm 波长范围内串扰低于 − 37 dB。该器件显着提高了基于铌酸锂的光子互连网络的片上密度。

title: Trans-reflective RGB achromatic metalens for wide field-of-view and high readability augmented reality imaging
author: Zhengyang Wang, Jiahui Wang, Haowen Liang, Juntao Li
summary: Augmented reality (AR) has garnered significant attention in recent years for its advanced display capabilities. High-performing AR demands lightweight and integrated optical components. Metalenses offer a solution, as they can meet these requirements through their multifunctional and integrative potential. In this work, we propose a trans-reflective red – green – blue (RGB) achromatic AR metalens composed of titanium dioxide (TiO 2 ) nanopillars and a multiwavelength notch filter. The AR metalens achieves balanced focusing efficiencies for obliquely incident light, with a field of view exceeding 90°, which ensures excellent readability in various scenarios for AR devices. Additionally, ambient light can pass efficiently through the metalens. This design functions both as an eyepiece and an optical combiner, demonstrating strong potential for AR applications.
title_cn: 透反射 RGB 消色差超透镜可实现宽视场和高可读性增强现实成像
abstract_cn: 近年来，增强现实（AR）因其先进的显示功能而受到广泛关注。高性能 AR 需要轻量级集成光学元件。超透镜提供了一种解决方案，因为它们可以通过其多功能和集成潜力来满足这些要求。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种由二氧化钛（TiO 2 ）纳米柱和多波长陷波滤波器组成的透反射红-绿-蓝（RGB）消色差AR超透镜。 AR超透镜实现了斜入射光的均衡聚焦效率，视场角超过90°，保证了AR设备在各种场景下的良好可读性。此外，环境光可以有效地穿过超透镜。该设计既可用作目镜，又可用作光学组合器，展示了 AR 应用的强大潜力。

title: Sub-kHz single-frequency pulsed semiconductor laser based on NPRO injection locking
author: Chunzhao Ma, Wenxun Li, Weitong Fan, Danqing Liu, Xuezhen Gong, Zelong Huang, Jie Xu, Hsien-Chi Yeh, Changlei Guo
summary: We report a single-frequency, narrow-linewidth semiconductor pulsed laser based on pump current modulation and optical injection locking technique. A monolithic non-planar ring oscillator laser is employed as the seed source to guarantee the single-frequency narrow-linewidth performance. Simultaneously, pulse operation is achieved by directly modulating the pump current of the semiconductor laser. The single-frequency pulsed laser (SFPL) has achieved a pulse repetition rate of 50 kHz-1 MHz, a pulse duration ranging from 120 ns to a quasi-continuous state, and a peak power of 160 mW. Moreover, the SFPL has reached a pulsed laser linewidth as narrow as 905 Hz, optical spectrum signal-to-noise ratio of better than 65 dB at a center wavelength of 1064.45 nm. Such extremely narrow-linewidth, repetition-rate and pulse-width tunable SFPL has great potential for applications in coherent LIDAR, metrology, remote sensing, and nonlinear frequency conversion.
title_cn: 基于NPRO注入锁定的亚kHz单频脉冲半导体激光器
abstract_cn: 我们报告了一种基于泵浦电流调制和光注入锁定技术的单频、窄线宽半导体脉冲激光器。采用单片非平面环形振荡器激光器作为种子源，保证单频窄线宽性能。同时，通过直接调制半导体激光器的泵浦电流来实现脉冲操作。单频脉冲激光器（SFPL）实现了50 kHz-1 MHz的脉冲重复率、120 ns到准连续状态的脉冲持续时间和160 mW的峰值功率。此外，SFPL的脉冲激光线宽窄至905 Hz，中心波长1064.45 nm处光谱信噪比优于65 dB。这种极窄线宽、重复率和脉宽可调的SFPL在相干激光雷达、计量、遥感和非线性频率转换方面具有巨大的应用潜力。
