title: Design and simulation of resonant-periodic-gain cavity high-speed VCSELs and carrier transport influence on their modulation characteristics
author: Jian Feng, Hui Li, Wei Miao, Shaochi Pan, Bin Wang, Zhao Chen, Xing Zhang, Chuyu Zhong, Shupeng Deng, Shihao Ding, Jinlong Lu, Nannan Li, Yanjing Wang, Cunzhu Tong, Cunzheng Ning
summary: We demonstrate a high-speed vertical-cavity surface-emitting laser (VCSEL) design that has a resonant-periodic-gain (RPG) active region and 1 λ optical length cavity. We have developed a simulation model for the high-frequency modulation of a VCSEL based on the rate equation theory. Both λ /2 cavity and 1 λ RPG cavity VCSELs are in good agreement with the calculation results of our optimization model. The optical confinement factor, oxide aperture, escape and capture lifetime of carriers, p-doped distributed Bragg reflector (p-DBR) reflectivity and photon lifetime, and gain suppression coefficient are all taken into consideration. Their effects on the modulation frequency response characteristics of devices are analyzed. The 3 dB resonant frequency response bandwidth of this VCSEL can reach ∼ 60 GHz at an 11 mA bias current. Our advanced cavity design, in conjunction with the simulation model, offers valuable insights into enhancing the high-speed modulation performance of VCSELs.
title_cn: 谐振周期增益腔高速 VCSEL 的设计和仿真以及载流子传输对其调制特性的影响
abstract_cn: 我们展示了一种高速垂直腔表面发射激光器 (VCSEL) 设计，该设计具有谐振周期增益 (RPG) 有源区域和 1 λ 光学长度腔。我们开发了基于速率方程理论的 VCSEL 高频调制仿真模型。 λ /2 腔和 1 λ RPG 腔 VCSEL 与我们优化模型的计算结果非常吻合。光学限制因子、氧化物孔径、载流子的逸出和捕获寿命、p掺杂分布式布拉格反射器（p-DBR）反射率和光子寿命以及增益抑制系数都被考虑在内。分析了它们对器件调制频率响应特性的影响。该 VCSEL 的 3 dB 谐振频率响应带宽在 11 mA 偏置电流下可达到 ∼ 60 GHz。我们先进的腔体设计与仿真模型相结合，为增强 VCSEL 的高速调制性能提供了宝贵的见解。

title: On-chip optical image memory based on inverse-designed multi-channel power splitters
author: Haoji Yang, Huiqin Wang, Nanrun Zhou, Zijing Zhang, Hua Zhang
summary: In optical computing systems for image tasks, optical signals of image data are usually generated by signal modulators, whose speed limits computational performance. To address this, a framework of image memory that can permanently store the image and instantaneously generate its corresponding optical signals has been proposed. In this framework, an original image is sliced into non-overlapping sub-images, each of which contains 3 pixel × 3 pixel or 5 pixel × 5 pixel, and these sub-images are respectively stored in storage units, which are nine-channel or 25-channel power splitters (PSs). The gray values of pixels in each sub-image are sequentially mapped to the light intensity of channels in each PS. These PSs are inversely designed by combining the adjoint method (AM) and the finite-difference frequency-domain method. Using this method, high-performance memory has been realized based on PSs, with a maximum 33.37 dB signal-to-noise ratio. Using multi-objective AM, the storage capacity has been doubled according to the working wavelengths. For example, two sub-images with pixels arranged as ‘ T ’ and ‘ L ’ shapes can be retrieved at 1310 and 1550 nm, respectively. This framework provides highly stable, non-volatile image storage, and instantaneous generation of optical signals for future all-optical computing systems.
title_cn: 基于反设计多通道功率分配器的片上光学图像存储器
abstract_cn: 在用于图像任务的光学计算系统中，图像数据的光信号通常由信号调制器生成，其速度限制了计算性能。为了解决这个问题，人们提出了一种可以永久存储图像并立即生成其相应光信号的图像存储器框架。在该框架中，原始图像被分割成不重叠的子图像，每个子图像包含3像素×3像素或5像素×5像素，这些子图像分别存储在存储单元中，存储单元是9通道或25通道功率分配器（PS）。每个子图像中像素的灰度值依次映射到每个PS中通道的光强度。这些PS是通过结合伴随法（AM）和有限差分频域法来逆设计的。利用该方法，实现了基于PS的高性能存储器，最大信噪比为33.37 dB。使用多目标AM，存储容量根据工作波长增加了一倍。例如，可以分别在 1310 nm 和 1550 nm 处检索像素排列为“T”和“L”形状的两个子图像。该框架为未来的全光计算系统提供高度稳定、非易失性的图像存储和光信号的瞬时生成。

title: Resolution enhancement via an unfolding network with a deblocking module and DCN for infrared small block-based compressive imaging
author: Junyao Zhao, Xiaowen Hao, Xu Ma, Jun Ke
summary: High-resolution infrared array detectors are prohibitively expensive and technologically challenging to manufacture. Block-based compressive imaging (BCI) provides an alternative solution for high-resolution infrared imaging. However, the quality of object reconstructions in BCI is often degraded by block artifacts, which are inherent in the method. This is particularly important for a small block size, which is common in BCI, associated with a limited demagnification factor from a spatial light modulator (SLM) to a detector array. To address the issue, in this work, we propose a small block-based compressive imaging deep unfolding network (SBCI-DUN), which introduces a proximal mapping module that incorporates a deblocking module (DM) and deformable convolution (DCN). The DM is crucial to mitigating block artifacts. DCN enhances the ability of the model to capture fine details and establish long-range dependencies through flexible local modeling and adaptive feature extraction while maintaining relatively low computational cost. Extensive evaluations on simulated datasets and real-world near-infrared target data demonstrate that the SBCI-DUN outperforms existing networks in reconstruction quality.
title_cn: 通过具有解块模块和 DCN 的展开网络来增强分辨率，用于基于红外小块的压缩成像
abstract_cn: 高分辨率红外阵列探测器价格昂贵且制造技术具有挑战性。基于块的压缩成像（BCI）为高分辨率红外成像提供了替代解决方案。然而，BCI 中对象重建的质量通常会因该方法固有的块伪影而降低。这对于 BCI 中常见的小块尺寸尤其重要，它与从空间光调制器 (SLM) 到探测器阵列的有限缩小因子相关。为了解决这个问题，在这项工作中，我们提出了一种基于小型块的压缩成像深度展开网络（SBCI-DUN），它引入了一个结合了去块模块（DM）和可变形卷积（DCN）的近端映射模块。 DM 对于减少块伪影至关重要。 DCN 通过灵活的局部建模和自适应特征提取，增强了模型捕获精细细节并建立远程依赖关系的能力，同时保持相对较低的计算成本。对模拟数据集和现实世界近红外目标数据的广泛评估表明，SBCI-DUN 在重建质量方面优于现有网络。

title: Tunable picometer-linewidth 972.26 nm laser generation from a volume-Bragg-grating-based BBO optical parametric oscillator
author: Yaqi Wang, Fei Du, Tingting Lu, Junxuan Zhang, Jian Ma, Haoda Ma, Xiaolei Zhu, Weibiao Chen
summary: A narrow-linewidth 972.26 nm laser with a 4.5 pm spectral linewidth was generated from a BBO optical parametric oscillator using a volume Bragg grating as the cavity end mirror, pumped by a 532.23 nm single-longitudinal-mode laser at a 1 kHz repetition rate. The system achieved 0.94 W maximum output power with < 2.4 ns pulse duration, yielding 23.5% signal conversion efficiency. Extracavity second-harmonic generation produced 0.41 W of 486.13 nm blue light with a 2.0 pm line-width and 43.6% conversion efficiency. The wavelength could be tuned over 0.4 nm by varying the grating temperature between 12.6°C and 52.6°C.
title_cn: 基于体布拉格光栅的 BBO 光学参量振荡器产生可调谐皮米线宽 972.26 nm 激光
abstract_cn: 使用体布拉格光栅作为腔端镜的 BBO 光学参量振荡器产生光谱线宽为 4.5 pm 的窄线宽 972.26 nm 激光，由 532.23 nm 单纵模激光器以 1 kHz 重复率泵浦。该系统的最大输出功率为 0.94 W，脉冲持续时间 < 2.4 ns，信号转换效率为 23.5%。外腔二次谐波产生产生 0.41 W 的 486.13 nm 蓝光，线宽为 2.0 pm，转换效率为 43.6%。通过在 12.6°C 和 52.6°C 之间改变光栅温度，可以将波长调谐到 0.4 nm 以上。

title: DLA2C: deep-learning-based advanced adaptive control for Mach-Zehnder modulators
author: Xiang Hu, Yongjun Dai, Yin Li, Siyao Chen, Taolin Liu, Zhe Guo, Qiaosong Cai, Jie Yang, Tong Zhou, Yuanxi Peng, Tian Jiang
summary: To address the issue of the Mach-Zehnder modulator transmission characteristic curve drifting due to environmental influences, a novel, to our knowledge, deep-learning-based bias control method utilizing the synergy between a neural network and an improved particle swarm algorithm is proposed. The proposed method enables the locking control of any working point by constructing multi-dimensional features as inputs to the neural network and establishing a specific mapping relationship with the bias voltage. Compared to other dither-based methods using a proportional integral derivative controller, our method does not use second and higher harmonics that are hardly measurable, which is less costly. The experiments show that the proposed method is robust and invariant to changes in temperature and has good long-time stability at different operating points. In the temperature perturbation test, the maximum fluctuation of the output optical power is 8.7 μ W, which is only 6.3% of the maximum fluctuation for the conventional control algorithm.
title_cn: DLA2C：基于深度学习的马赫-曾德调制器高级自适应控制
abstract_cn: 为了解决马赫-曾德调制器传输特性曲线因环境影响而漂移的问题，据我们所知，提出了一种利用神经网络和改进粒子群算法之间协同作用的基于深度学习的新颖偏置控制方法。该方法通过构造多维特征作为神经网络的输入并与偏置电压建立特定的映射关系，实现对任意工作点的锁定控制。与其他使用比例积分微分控制器的基于抖动的方法相比，我们的方法不使用难以测量的二次谐波和更高次谐波，成本较低。实验表明，该方法对温度变化具有鲁棒性和不变性，并且在不同工作点具有良好的长期稳定性。在温度扰动测试中，输出光功率的最大波动为8.7μW，仅为传统控制算法最大波动的6.3%。

title: Optimizing mask duty cycle for enhanced reconstruction in snapshot compressive imaging
author: Yibing Ren, Mu Qiao
summary: We investigate the influence of mask duty cycle (DC) — the proportion of active ( “ on ” ) pixels in binary-coded masks — on reconstruction quality in snapshot compressive imaging (SCI) systems through comprehensive numerical simulations. Masks with DCs ranging from 5% to 80% are evaluated across two widely used SCI modalities: coded aperture snapshot spectral imaging (CASSI) and coded aperture compressive temporal imaging (CACTI). To bridge simulation and practice, we propose a realistic forward model for SCI that accounts for non-ideal system conditions, including image degradation, mask blur, sensor noise, and spectral discretization. Contrary to the common assumption that a 50% DC yields optimal performance, our results reveal that sparser masks (with 10% – 30% DCs) consistently improve reconstruction performance, particularly under high compression and high noise conditions. We further show that this range represents the practical optimum: higher DCs introduce degraded temporal sharpness or spectral fidelity, while lower DCs lead to reduced spatial resolution due to insufficient captured information. These findings offer practical guidelines for optimizing mask design in real-world SCI deployments.
title_cn: 优化掩模占空比以增强快照压缩成像中的重建
abstract_cn: 我们通过综合数值模拟研究掩模占空比（DC）——二进制编码掩模中活动（“on”）像素的比例——对快照压缩成像（SCI）系统中重建质量的影响。 DC 范围为 5% 至 80% 的掩模通过两种广泛使用的 SCI 模式进行评估：编码孔径快照光谱成像 (CASSI) 和编码孔径压缩时间成像 (CACTI)。为了连接仿真和实践，我们提出了一个 SCI 的现实正向模型，该模型考虑了非理想系统条件，包括图像退化、掩模模糊、传感器噪声和光谱离散化。与 50% DC 产生最佳性能的常见假设相反，我们的结果表明，稀疏掩模（具有 10% – 30% DC）持续提高重建性能，特别是在高压缩和高噪声条件下。我们进一步表明，这个范围代表了实际的最佳值：较高的 DC 会导致时间锐度或光谱保真度下降，而较低的 DC 由于捕获的信息不足而导致空间分辨率降低。这些发现为优化现实 SCI 部署中的掩模设计提供了实用指南。

title: Single-mode photonic spiking neuron based on a laterally coupled DFB laser with a saturable absorber
author: Guangliang Sun, Ningning Chen, Peng Cao, Zeyu Wang, Haodong Xuan, Yang Chen, Hailing Wang, Wanhua Zheng
summary: We demonstrate a distributed feedback laser based on a laterally coupled grating with a saturable absorber (LCDFB-SA) as a photonic spiking neuron. So far, the conventional time domain traveling wave (TDTW) method is unable to simulate the nonlinear dynamics of the laser when the SA is under reverse bias. This problem is solved by a modified TDTW method introducing a relationship between the SA carrier lifetime and the reverse bias, by which the neuronal characteristics and tonic spiking repetition frequency tunable (TSRFT) characteristics of the device are simulated. Moreover, the side-mode suppression ratio (SMSR) of LCDFB-SA surpasses 40 dB in a tonic spiking state and is over 50 dB in a continuous laser state. Threshold, refractory period, and TSRFT characterization of the device are verified through experimental settings. Finally, frequency encoding and reconstruction of red, green, and blue (RGB) images based on TSRFT characteristics are performed. After multiple rounds of verification, the maximum normalized mean square error was 2.8808 × 10 − 4 and the average was 1.0101 × 10 − 4 , demonstrating good frequency coding capability. LCDFB-SA is fabricated by the standard I-line lithography process, which provides a low-cost and mass-producible photonic spiking neuronal solution.
title_cn: 基于具有可饱和吸收器的横向耦合 DFB 激光器的单模光子尖峰神经元
abstract_cn: 我们展示了一种基于横向耦合光栅的分布式反馈激光器，该光栅具有可饱和吸收器（LCDFB-SA）作为光子尖峰神经元。目前，传统的时域行波（TDTW）方法无法模拟SA在反向偏压下的激光器非线性动力学。通过改进的 TDTW 方法解决了这个问题，该方法引入了 SA 载流子寿命和反向偏压之间的关系，通过该方法模拟了器件的神经元特性和强直尖峰重复频率可调 (TSRFT) 特性。此外，LCDFB-SA的边模抑制比（SMSR）在强脉冲状态下超过40dB，在连续激光状态下超过50dB。通过实验设置验证了器件的阈值、不应期和 TSRFT 特性。最后，基于TSRFT特性对红、绿、蓝（RGB）图像进行频率编码和重建。经过多轮验证，归一化均方误差最大为2.8808×10−4，平均值为1.0101×10−4，具有良好的频率编码能力。 LCDFB-SA采用标准I线光刻工艺制造，提供了一种低成本、可大规模生产的光子尖峰神经元解决方案。

title: Paraxial propagation behavior in radially polarized vector coherent array laser beams
author: Haoran Du, Tong Zhang, Zhiyong Wang
summary: This study reveals the propagation dynamics behavior of radially polarized vector coherent array laser beams. The results show that due to the asymmetric polarization coupling of the beam, the far-field intensity distribution is an ordered linearly polarized Gaussian-like sidelobe array. Furthermore, the programmable control of the polarization direction and intensity distribution of the far field by adjusting the beamlets polarization and array arrangement provides a feasible path for the structured output of the vector light field. This study fills the gap in the propagation dynamics of vector coherent array laser beams, and also provides theoretical support for space optical communication and structured light applications.
title_cn: 径向偏振矢量相干阵列激光束的近轴传播行为
abstract_cn: 这项研究揭示了径向偏振矢量相干阵列激光束的传播动力学行为。结果表明，由于光束的非对称偏振耦合，远场强度分布呈有序线偏振类高斯旁瓣阵列。此外，通过调整子束偏振和阵列排列来可编程控制远场的偏振方向和强度分布，为矢量光场的结构化输出提供了可行的路径。该研究填补了矢量相干阵列激光束传播动力学的空白，也为空间光通信和结构光应用提供了理论支持。

title: Spectral network-based graph convolutional features to enhance hyperspectral detection of intestinal adenocarcinoma
author: Rongwei Dai, Danfei Huang, Yi Xie, Dong Song, Jinghui Hong, Xiang Li, Sihui Chen, Chuanke Zhao, Ziyang Liu, Suilian You
summary: The molecular heterogeneity of intestinal adenocarcinoma poses challenges for precision medicine. While surgical resection remains the optimal treatment for non-metastatic cases, the irregularity of tumor infiltration and variability in tumor composition can compromise the accuracy of preoperative imaging and invivo sampling, thereby increasing the risk of residual tumor and recurrence. In this study, hyperspectral imaging (HSI) was used to characterize the spectral properties of intestinal adenocarcinomas based on samples of grade 1 – 3 intestinal adenocarcinomas from the Chinese population and liver-transformed intestinal adenocarcinoma samples from Croatian population sources, utilizing band relationships derived from graph convolutional networks (GCNs) to supplement traditional time-series spectral profiles. This method aims to establish a band connectivity graph convolutional network (B-GCN) between spectral bands, overcoming the limitations of unidirectional spectral transmission. For invitro cancer detection for non-metastatic grade 1 – 3 adenocarcinoma, compared with convolutional neural networks (CNNs), B-GCNs improved overall accuracy (OA) by 18.75%, 1.80%, and 14.37%, respectively, while also improving recall and reducing missed diagnoses. Additionally, metastatic pathological analysis confirmed that the B-GCN can detect complex lesions, reduce misdiagnoses, and minimize sampling errors. These findings demonstrate that the method enhances tumor margin delineation and lesion detection capabilities, supporting more precise resection strategies and reducing the risk of postoperative recurrence.
title_cn: 基于光谱网络的图卷积特征增强肠腺癌的高光谱检测
abstract_cn: 肠腺癌的分子异质性给精准医疗带来了挑战。虽然手术切除仍然是非转移病例的最佳治疗方法，但肿瘤浸润的不规则性和肿瘤成分的变异性可能会影响术前成像和体内采样的准确性，从而增加残留肿瘤和复发的风险。在这项研究中，基于中国人群的1-3级肠腺癌样本和克罗地亚人群的肝转化肠腺癌样本，使用高光谱成像（HSI）来表征肠腺癌的光谱特性，利用图卷积网络（GCN）衍生的谱带关系来补充传统的时间序列光谱轮廓。该方法旨在建立光谱波段之间的波段连通图卷积网络（B-GCN），克服单向光谱传输的局限性。对于非转移性 1 – 3 级腺癌的体外癌症检测，与卷积神经网络 (CNN) 相比，B-GCN 的总体准确率 (OA) 分别提高了 18.75%、1.80% 和 14.37%，同时还提高了召回率并减少了漏诊。此外，转移病理分析证实B-GCN可以检测复杂病变，减少误诊，并最大限度地减少采样误差。这些发现表明，该方法增强了肿瘤边缘勾画和病变检测能力，支持更精确的切除策略并降低术后复发的风险。

title: Sb-doped Cs3LuCl6 nanocrystals for efficient X-ray imaging
author: Ruibo Gao, Jinmeng Xiang, Xiaoya Ding, Changheng Chen, Jiwen Chang, Renze Chen, Zhou Yang, Chongfeng Guo
summary: Flexible scintillator screens have significant advantages in X-ray imaging of non-planar objects, but the strong scattering originating from the uncontrolled size distribution of the scintillator particles severely deteriorates imaging quality. Here, Sb 3+ activated zero-dimensional halide perovskite Cs 3 LuCl 6 nanocrystals with uniform particle sizes were synthesized using the hot-inject method, which exhibited yellow-green emission centered at 531 nm and the photoluminescence quantum yield of Cs 3 LuCl 6 : 7% Sb 3+ with optimal composition reached 92%. A flexible scintillation screen was prepared through compositing the Cs 3 LuCl 6 : 7% Sb 3+ with polydimethylsiloxane (PDMS), and its 11.5 lp/mm spatial resolution far exceeds the requirement for medical X-ray imaging (3.5 lp/mm). These results highlight the great application potential of this material in the field of X-ray imaging.
title_cn: 用于高效 X 射线成像的 Sb 掺杂 Cs3LuCl6 纳米晶体
abstract_cn: 柔性闪烁体屏幕在非平面物体的 X 射线成像中具有显着的优势，但由于闪烁体颗粒不受控制的尺寸分布而产生的强散射严重恶化了成像质量。采用热注入法合成了Sb 3+ 活化的零维卤化物钙钛矿Cs 3 LuCl 6 纳米晶，其粒径均匀，其黄绿光发射中心位于531 nm，最佳组成的Cs 3 LuCl 6 : 7% Sb 3+ 的光致发光量子产率达到92%。将Cs 3 LuCl 6 : 7% Sb 3+ 与聚二甲基硅氧烷（PDMS）复合制备了柔性闪烁屏，其11.5 lp/mm的空间分辨率远超过医学X射线成像的要求（3.5 lp/mm）。这些结果凸显了该材料在X射线成像领域的巨大应用潜力。

title: Real-time 448 Tb/s 7×70.76-km field trial using commercial 140-Gbaud PCS-16QAM 800 Gb/s OTN transponders over deployed 7-core fiber cables with multiple fusion splicing points
author: Cheng Chang, Jian Cui, Zhuo Liu, Yu Deng, Yuxiao Wang, Shiyu Qin, Bin Hao, Chao Wu, Leimin Zhang, Yong Chen, Bin Wu, Shang Cao, Yaoxu Zhai, Lei Shen, Lei Zhang, Jie Luo, Yan Sun, Qi Wan, Bing Yan, Ninglun Gu
summary: An ultra-high-speed transmission technique based on the multi-core fiber (MCF) has attracted great attention and is considered a promising candidate for next-generation backbone optical transport networks (OTNs). In this Letter, we demonstrate, to our knowledge, the first real-time 448 Tb/s metro-regional field trial over deployed uncoupled 7-core MCF cables using commercial 800 Gb/s OTN transponders. The 800 Gb/s transponders have a modulation rate up to 140 Gbaud, which enables the adoption of a noise-tolerant probabilistic constellation shaping 16-ary quadrature amplitude modulation (PCS-16QAM) format to achieve the target bit rate. Advanced channel matching shaping (CMS) algorithms, as well as forward error correction (FEC) encoding algorithms, are further adopted to enhance the overall performance of the OTN transponders. Moreover, advanced multi-core fusion splicing approaches are utilized to reduce the span loss of MCF links. Thanks to the high-performance OTN transponders and advanced splicing technique, the field trial achieves a transmission distance of over 495 km.
title_cn: 使用商用 140 Gbaud PCS-16QAM 800 Gb/s OTN 转发器，通过部署的具有多个熔接点的 7 芯光缆进行实时 448 Tb/s 7×70.76 公里现场试验
abstract_cn: 基于多芯光纤（MCF）的超高速传输技术引起了人们的广泛关注，并被认为是下一代骨干光传输网络（OTN）的有希望的候选者。在这封信中，据我们所知，我们展示了使用商用 800 Gb/s OTN 转发器在部署的非耦合 7 芯 MCF 电缆上进行的首次实时 448 Tb/s 城域区域现场试验。 800 Gb/s 转发器的调制速率高达 140 Gbaud，可采用耐噪声概率星座整形 16 进制正交幅度调制 (PCS-16QAM) 格式来实现目标比特率。进一步采用先进的信道匹配整形（CMS）算法以及前向纠错（FEC）编码算法来增强OTN转发器的整体性能。此外，采用先进的多核熔接方法来减少MCF链路的跨距损耗。得益于高性能OTN转发器和先进的熔接技术，现场试验实现了超过495公里的传输距离。

title: Deep learning-driven design of q-BIC metasurfaces for ultra-high saturation and ultra-wide color gamut structural colors
author: Hongyu Chen, Yu Xue, Jixing Zeng, Xuan Huang, Yu Chen, Xinxing Zhou
summary: Structural color has been developed based on different nanostructures. However, it still faces strong limitations in color saturation and gamut. Herein, a TiO 2 quasi-bound state in the continuum (q-BIC) metasurface enables full-hue (0 – 360°), ultra-saturated (80% – 100%) structural colors by tuning nanoblock geometry and spacing, covering 229% standard RGB (sRGB) and 170% Adobe RGB gamut. We further develop an LSTM-VAE-Net model by integrating the long short-term memory (LSTM) and variational autoencoders (VAEs) to facilitate forward prediction and inverse design with high accuracy (99.83% and 99.34%, respectively). Finally, painting reproduction verifies the model ’ s capability for photorealistic multicolor design, demonstrating its potential in high-resolution color printing.
title_cn: 深度学习驱动的q-BIC超表面设计，实现超高饱和度和超宽色域结构色
abstract_cn: 结构颜色是根据不同的纳米结构开发的。然而，它在色彩饱和度和色域方面仍然面临着很大的限制。在此，连续体（q-BIC）超表面中的TiO 2 准束缚态通过调整纳米块几何形状和间距实现全色调（0 – 360°）、超饱和（80% – 100%）结构颜色，覆盖229%标准RGB（sRGB）和170% Adob​​e RGB色域。我们通过集成长短期记忆（LSTM）和变分自动编码器（VAE）进一步开发了 LSTM-VAE-Net 模型，以促进高精度的正向预测和逆向设计（分别为 99.83% 和 99.34%）。最后，绘画复制验证了模型的逼真多色设计能力，展示了其在高分辨率彩色打印方面的潜力。

title: Silicon 3.2/6.4 Tb/s micro-ring modulator array chip with wavelength multiplexing and port multiplexing for high-capacity optical transmission
author: Gangqiang Zhou, Chi Lu, Penghui Xia, Liangjun Lu, Qiang Zhang, Wanshu Xiong, Na Zhang, Bin Zhang, Kun Yin, Hui Yu
summary: In this paper, we demonstrate a silicon micro-ring modulator array chip with eight-wavelength multiplexing and four-port multiplexing. The input light is divided into four equal parts. The modulated light with eight different wavelengths is combined into one output port through a wavelength multiplexer, which consists of a three-stage cascaded asymmetric Mach-Zehnder interferometer. The number of modulation channels is 32. All micro-ring modulators can support 200 Gb/s PAM4 modulation with offline digital signal processing. The total transmit data rate is up to 6.4 Tb/s. These results indicate that this study provides a potential solution for the future 3.2/6.4 Tb/s optical interconnects.
title_cn: 具有波长复用和端口复用功能的硅 3.2/6.4 Tb/s 微环调制器阵列芯片，用于高容量光传输
abstract_cn: 在本文中，我们展示了一种具有八波长复用和四端口复用的硅微环调制器阵列芯片。输入光被分成四个相等的部分。八种不同波长的调制光通过波长复用器组合到一个输出端口，该复用器由三级级联的非对称马赫-曾德干涉仪组成。调制通道数为 32 个。所有微环调制器均可支持 200 Gb/s PAM4 调制，并具有离线数字信号处理功能。总传输数据速率高达 6.4 Tb/s。这些结果表明，本研究为未来 3.2/6.4 Tb/s 光互连提供了潜在的解决方案。

title: Propagation of modified anomalous vortex beams in maritime turbulence: an integrated analytical, numerical, and experimental study
author: Quan Liu, Xu Yan, Juan Chang, Hassan Al-Ahsab, Qing Zhang, Jie Gao, Mingjian Cheng
summary: This study presents an investigation into the propagation of modified anomalous vortex beams (MAVBs) through maritime atmospheric turbulence. We introduce and validate analytical formulations using the extended Huygens – Fresnel integral to accurately model MAVB propagation under unique conditions of maritime turbulence, representing a critical advancement for optical communication in this challenging environment. These theoretical predictions are rigorously assessed against both multi-phase screen numerical simulations and 1000 m scaled experimental measurements, employing a five-spatial-light-modulator (SLM) setup for beam generation, turbulence simulation, and measuring the orbital angular momentum (OAM) spectrum. Under weak turbulence, excellent agreement is observed across all thre e approaches, unequivocally confirming the validity of our analytical model. However, a divergence from the analytical solution emerges under stronger turbulence, underscoring the limitations of conventional integral approximation models in highly dynamic marine environments. We also systematically quantify maritime turbulence ’ s impact on the OAM spectrum via modal decomposition. This provides empirical evidence of OAM mode resilience and degradation, informing the design of OAM-multiplexed free-space optical communication systems for challenging maritime conditions.
title_cn: 改进的反常涡旋光束在海上湍流中的传播：综合分析、数值和实验研究
abstract_cn: 本研究对改进的异常涡旋光束（MAVB）通过海洋大气湍流的传播进行了研究。我们使用扩展的惠更斯 - 菲涅尔积分引入并验证了分析公式，以在独特的海上湍流条件下准确模拟 MAVB 传播，代表了在这一充满挑战的环境中光通信的关键进步。这些理论预测根据多相屏幕数值模拟和 1000 m 尺度的实验测量进行了严格评估，采用五空间光调制器 (SLM) 设置进行光束生成、湍流模拟和测量轨道角动量 (OAM) 谱。在弱湍流下，所有三种方法都观察到了极好的一致性，明确证实了我们分析模型的有效性。然而，在更强的湍流下，解析解会出现偏差，这凸显了传统积分近似模型在高度动态海洋环境中的局限性。我们还通过模态分解系统地量化海上湍流对 OAM 频谱的影响。这提供了 OAM 模式恢复和退化的经验证据，为针对具有挑战性的海上条件的 OAM 复用自由空间光通信系统的设计提供了信息。

title: Radial quasi-bound states in the continuum in permittivity-asymmetric nanophotonics
author: Zhuojun Liu, Guixin Qiu, Wei Wu, Jin Liu
summary: Subwavelength confinement enabled by bound states in the continuum (BICs) provides an effective pathway to enhance light – matter interactions in compact photonic systems. In particular, radial quasi-BICs offer polarization-invariant, high-Q resonances within an ultrasmall footprint, holding great potential for on-chip applications. However, conventional realizations relying on geometric asymmetry face fabrication challenges due to the difficulty of precisely controlling nanoscale structural perturbations. Here, we propose a compact and scalable nanophotonic platform that supports radial quasi-BICs via intrinsic and environmental permittivity asymmetry without geometric modifications. By systematically comparing geometric and permittivity asymmetries, we demonstrate their equivalent optical responses, both exhibiting inverse-square scaling of the radiative Q factor. Based on intrinsic material modulation using silicon-rich nitride, we engineer quasi-BICs near 1565 nm with Q factors exceeding 9000. Building upon this insight, we realize environmental permittivity asymmetry by embedding rod-pair resonators in different environments, enabling dynamically reconfigurable high-Q resonances. The devices achieve average Q factors over 3000 and sensing figures of merit exceeding 366 RIU − 1 in an ultracompact footprint, with vertical emission compatible with all-fiber integration. This work highlights the potential of permittivity asymmetry as a robust and lithography-tolerant design strategy for next-generation high-performance photonic devices.
title_cn: 介电常数不对称纳米光子学中连续谱中的径向准束缚态
abstract_cn: 连续体中的束缚态 (BIC) 实现的亚波长限制为增强紧凑光子系统中的光-物质相互作用提供了有效途径。特别是，径向准 BIC 在超小的占地面积内提供偏振不变的高 Q 谐振，为片上应用提供了巨大的潜力。然而，由于难以精确控制纳米级结构扰动，依赖几何不对称的传统实现面临着制造挑战。在这里，我们提出了一种紧凑且可扩展的纳米光子平台，该平台通过固有和环境介电常数不对称性支持径向准 BIC，而无需进行几何修改。通过系统地比较几何和介电常数不对称性，我们证明了它们的等效光学响应，两者都表现出辐射 Q 因子的平方反比缩放。基于使用富硅氮化物的本征材料调制，我们设计了 Q 因子超过 9000 的 1565 nm 附近的准 BIC。基于这一见解，我们通过在不同环境中嵌入棒对谐振器来实现环境介电常数不对称性，从而实现动态可重构的高 Q 谐振。该器件在超紧凑的封装中实现了超过 3000 的平均 Q 因子和超过 366 RIU − 1 的传感品质因数，并且垂直发射与全光纤集成兼容。这项工作强调了介电常数不对称作为下一代高性能光子器件的稳健且耐光刻设计策略的潜力。

title: Forward-model-based non-imaging optimization for lenticular lenses in light field displays
author: Zhanghan Liu, Zijun Zhang, Xiaoyu Fang, Haifeng Li, Rengmao Wu
summary: Lenticular lenses are fundamental components in light field displays, which are usually optimized based on aberration correction. We propose a forward-model-based non-imaging optimization method for designing lenticular lenses, addressing the inherent limitations of the conventional imaging-based optimization method by accounting for the emission characteristics and physical size of the subpixels. We develop a forward modeling framework enabling direct control of viewpoint width and propose a subpixel-level evaluation algorithm for binocular crosstalk. Results demonstrate that our method achieves a 78.75% crosstalk reduction at the maximum viewing angle, establishing an effective technical sol-ution for target viewpoint distributions with the directional backlight unit.
title_cn: 光场显示器中双凸透镜基于正向模型的非成像优化
abstract_cn: 柱状透镜是光场显示器的基本组件，通常基于像差校正进行优化。我们提出了一种基于正向模型的非成像优化方法来设计双凸透镜，通过考虑子像素的发射特性和物理尺寸来解决传统基于成像的优化方法的固有局限性。我们开发了一个能够直接控制视点宽度的正向建模框架，并提出了一种用于双目串扰的子像素级评估算法。结果表明，我们的方法在最大视角下实现了 78.75% 的串扰降低，为定向背光单元的目标视点分布建立了有效的技术解决方案。

title: Polarization-preserving quantum frequency conversion to VIS via cross-band achromatic UV-NIR waveguide coupling
author: Qingquan Yao, Chenxu Wang, Yuancong Li, Jinming Cui, Yunfeng Huang, Chuanfeng Li, Guangcan Guo
summary: Photons are essential for interconnecting quantum systems in quantum networks, where polarization is a widely used degree of freedom for encoding quantum information. However, frequency bands suitable for different quantum systems often do not align. While polarization-preserving quantum frequency conversion (PPQFC) is essential for interconnecting heterogeneous quantum systems, existing solutions lack cross-band capability between ultraviolet (UV) and near-infrared (NIR) regimes. Here, we experimentally demonstrated a PPQFC method that exploits the low-loss, self-phase stabilization of polarization and facilitates cross-band achromatic waveguide coupling. Specifically, we demonstrated the polarization-preserving quantum frequency conversion from UV 369.5 nm to visible 580 nm with infrared pumping at 1018 nm, achieving long-term fidelity of 97.6% ± 1.0% at wavelengths relevant to trapped ions 171 Yb + and solid-state 153 Eu 3+ :Y 2 SiO 5 quantum systems. This work demonstrates a versatile PPQFC solution for future heterogeneous quantum networks.
title_cn: 通过跨带消色差 UV-NIR 波导耦合将保偏量子频率转换为 VIS
abstract_cn: 光子对于量子网络中量子系统的互连至关重要，其中偏振是编码量子信息的广泛使用的自由度。然而，适合不同量子系统的频带通常不一致。虽然保偏量子频率转换 (PPQFC) 对于互连异构量子系统至关重要，但现有解决方案缺乏紫外 (UV) 和近红外 (NIR) 区域之间的跨带能力。在这里，我们通过实验演示了一种 PPQFC 方法，该方法利用偏振的低损耗、自相位稳定并促进跨带消色差波导耦合。具体来说，我们演示了从 UV 369.5 nm 到可见光 580 nm 的保偏量子频率转换，并在 1018 nm 处进行红外泵浦，在与捕获离子 171 Yb + 和固态 153 Eu 3+ :Y 2 SiO 5 量子系统相关的波长下实现了 97.6% ± 1.0% 的长期保真度。这项工作展示了一种适用于未来异构量子网络的多功能 PPQFC 解决方案。

title: High-repetition-rate burst-mode Nd:YAG laser with an optimized side-pumping scheme and a variable reflectivity mirror unstable resonator
author: Haobo Xu, Renpeng Yan, Zhaodong Chen, Rongwei Fan, Yufei Ma, Xudong Li
summary: We report a high-repetition-rate, side-pumped, and burst-mode Nd:YAG laser utilizing an unstable resonator with a variable reflectivity mirror. A small-signal gain model is developed to improve gain non-uniformity in a side-pumped module. At 40 kHz Q-switching, with a 1 ms pump duration, the laser achieves 0.36 J burst energy, 451 kW peak power, and 19 ns pulse width. The output beam exhibits a flat-top profile characterized by a 10th-order super-Gaussian distribution and a coefficient of variation of 0.206. This is the first demonstration, to our knowledge, of flat-top beam generation in a high-repetition-rate side-pumped Nd:YAG burst-mode laser.
title_cn: 具有优化侧面泵浦方案和可变反射率镜不稳定谐振器的高重复率突发模式 Nd:YAG 激光器
abstract_cn: 我们报告了一种高重复率、侧面泵浦和突发模式 Nd:YAG 激光器，利用带有可变反射率镜的不稳定谐振器。开发了小信号增益模型来改善侧面泵浦模块中的增益不均匀性。在 40 kHz 调Q、1 ms 泵浦持续时间下，激光器可实现 0.36 J 突发能量、451 kW 峰值功率和 19 ns 脉冲宽度。输出光束呈现平顶轮廓，其特征为 10 阶超高斯分布，变异系数为 0.206。据我们所知，这是在高重复频率侧泵浦 Nd:YAG 突发模式激光器中产生平顶光束的首次演示。

title: Terahertz differential metasurface enabled arbitrary direction edge detection
author: Hang Yin, Fei Fan, Chengwei Song, Hao Wang, Huijun Zhao, Cheng Gong, Jierong Cheng, Shengjiang Chang
summary: Image edge detection through differential operation plays a pivotal role in computer vision and pattern recognition. Metasurface-based all-optical analog differentiation not only effectively reduces power consumption and enhances processing speed but also significantly decreases device size. However, existing differential devices remain challenged by complex optical systems and restricted detection flexibility. Based on the principle of image convolution, we propose a differential metasurface in the terahertz band, which enables direct two-dimensional edge detection without requiring a 4 f system setup. By detecting a single pair of arbitrary orthogonally polarized components, the metasurface further achieves omnidirectional one-dimensional edge detection, thereby obtaining richer image features. The normalized cross-correlation between the detected edge and theoretical edge profiles reaches a maximum value of 0.7. This work provides a compact and flexible solution for terahertz edge detection, demonstrating promising application prospects in terahertz imaging, security inspection, and non-destructive testing.
title_cn: 太赫兹差分超表面实现任意方向边缘检测
abstract_cn: 通过差分运算进行图像边缘检测在计算机视觉和模式识别中起着至关重要的作用。基于超表面的全光模拟微分不仅可以有效降低功耗、提高处理速度，还可以显着减小器件尺寸。然而，现有的差分设备仍然面临复杂的光学系统和有限的检测灵活性的挑战。基于图像卷积原理，我们提出了太赫兹频段的差分超表面，无需4 f系统设置即可实现直接二维边缘检测。通过检测单对任意正交偏振分量，超表面进一步实现全向一维边缘检测，从而获得更丰富的图像特征。检测到的边缘和理论边缘轮廓之间的归一化互相关达到最大值 0.7。这项工作为太赫兹边缘检测提供了一种紧凑而灵活的解决方案，在太赫兹成像、安全检查和无损检测方面展示了良好的应用前景。

title: Ultrahigh-sensitivity bias-free Sb2S3/Si van der Waals heterojunction photodetector enabling indoor illuminance monitoring
author: Fazheng Zhang, Mengdan Chen, Tao He, Zhipeng Sun, Caixia Kan, Mingming Jiang, Peng Wan
summary: The rapid proliferation of Internet of Things (IoT)-enabled smart home systems necessitates next-generation indoor optical sensors with ultralow power consumption, ambient-light adaptability, and system-level integrability. Addressing this technological imperative, this study proposed a self-powered broadband photodetector (PD) through vertical integration of a hydrothermally synthesized Sb 2 S 3 single crystal with a commercial Si substrate. The Sb 2 S 3 /Si heterojunction PD showcases a maximum responsivity of 172 mA/W, a detectivity of 10 10 Jones, and sub-millisecond response dynamics (172/160 μ s rising/ falling) upon 720 nm illumination at 0 V bias, outperforming other Sb 2 S 3 competitors. Such exceptional zero-bias operation enables direct compatibility with energy-autonomous IoT nodes. Particularly, the device ’ s spectral alignment with indoor lighting harmonics and long-term drift-free operation establishes its viability for intelligent lighting control, occupancy detection, and low power consumption in residential IoT ecosystems. The synthesis innovation of Sb 2 S 3 monocrystalline structures provides a scalable pathway toward batteryless smart sensors for sustainable home automation.
title_cn: 超高灵敏度无偏压 Sb2S3/Si 范德华异质结光电探测器可实现室内照度监测
abstract_cn: 支持物联网 (IoT) 的智能家居系统的快速普及需要具有超低功耗、环境光适应性和系统级可集成性的下一代室内光学传感器。为了解决这一技术难题，本研究提出了一种通过水热合成的 Sb 2 S 3 单晶与商业 Si 衬底的垂直集成的自供电宽带光电探测器 (PD)。 Sb 2 S 3 /Si 异质结 PD 在 0 V 偏置下的 720 nm 照明下表现出 172 mA/W 的最大响应度、10 10 Jones 的探测度和亚毫秒响应动态（172/160 μ s 上升/下降），优于其他 Sb 2 S 3 竞争对手。这种出色的零偏置操作可以与能源自主的物联网节点直接兼容。特别是，该设备的光谱与室内照明谐波一致以及长期无漂移运行，确立了其在住宅物联网生态系统中智能照明控制、占用检测和低功耗的可行性。 Sb 2 S 3 单晶结构的合成创新为可持续家庭自动化的无电池智能传感器提供了一条可扩展的途径。

title: Synthesized complex-frequency excitation for enhanced terahertz time-domain spectroscopy sensitivity
author: Zhiqiang Wu, Siqi Peng, Yuntao Wu, Xiaofei Liu, Min Li, Xuru Jin, Guifang Wang, Songlin Zhuang, Qingqing Cheng
summary: Spectroscopy has become an effective detection tool in fields such as environmental monitoring, food safety, and public health. Terahertz time-domain spectroscopy (THz-TDS) is notable for its label-free and nondestructive evaluation capabilities, as well as its ability to extract material properties such as dielectric constants and absorption coefficients. However, the intrinsic damping of molecular materials significantly limits the sensitivity of THz-TDS in detecting trace molecules. In our study, we utilized a THz-TDS system to measure the terahertz spectra of water vapor molecules at varying interaction distances ( d ). By employing synthetic complex-frequency wave (CFW) excitation, virtual gain was introduced to counter-balance the intrinsic damping of water vapor molecules, thereby enhancing the sensitivity of terahertz detection. Experimental results show that applying synthetic CFW excitation to spectral responses containing phase information notably improves the detection sensitivity of water vapor molecules ’ absorption features in the terahertz range at two distinct interaction distances ( d ). Synthetic CFW excitation amplifies molecular vibrational fingerprint signals within the terahertz range, expanding the potential applications of THz-TDS in fields such as molecular identification, pharmaceutical analysis, and carrier dynamics in semiconductors.
title_cn: 用于增强太赫兹时域光谱灵敏度的合成复频激励
abstract_cn: 光谱技术已成为环境监测、食品安全、公共卫生等领域的有效检测工具。太赫兹时域光谱（THz-TDS）以其无标记和无损评估能力以及提取介电常数和吸收系数等材料特性的能力而闻名。然而，分子材料的固有阻尼极大地限制了太赫兹时域光谱仪检测痕量分子的灵敏度。在我们的研究中，我们利用 THz-TDS 系统来测量不同相互作用距离 (d) 下水蒸气分子的太赫兹光谱。通过采用合成复频波（CFW）激励，引入虚拟增益来平衡水蒸气分子的固有阻尼，从而提高太赫兹检测的灵敏度。实验结果表明，将合成CFW激发应用于包含相位信息的光谱响应，显着提高了两个不同相互作用距离（d）下太赫兹范围内水蒸气分子吸收特征的检测灵敏度。合成CFW激发可放大太赫兹范围内的分子振动指纹信号，扩大了THz-TDS在分子识别、药物分析和半导体载流子动力学等领域的潜在应用。

title: Extended depth of field in subwavelength THz imaging by a Bézier curve structure
author: Guangda Yang, Wenxuan Shi, Jiajie Wang, Haojie Wang, Xikang Zhou, Ping Li, Zishuo Wei
summary: Terahertz (THz) imaging based on the terajet (TJ) effect has demonstrated significant potential in various fields. However, achieving high-resolution imaging with an extended depth of field (DOF) remains a challenge. In this study, we report a mesoscale Bézier curve structure (BCS), whose curved surface is defined by a second-order Bézier curve, to manipulate the characteristics of TJs and realize an extended DOF in subwavelength resolution imaging. The tuning of the TJs ’ focal distance, effective length, and full width at half-maximum by adjusting the control points of the Bézier curve was confirmed both numerically and experimentally. Imaging experiments showed that a DOF of approximately 7 λ was achieved while maintaining subwavelength resolution, and the BCS-coupled imaging system effectively resolves samples at different depths. This flexible, practical, and cost-effective method for achieving an extended DOF holds great potential for THz high-resolution imaging and detection, especially in scenarios involving samples of finite thickness.
title_cn: 通过贝塞尔曲线结构扩展亚波长太赫兹成像的景深
abstract_cn: 基于太赫兹（TJ）效应的太赫兹（THz）成像在各个领域都表现出了巨大的潜力。然而，实现具有扩展景深 (DOF) 的高分辨率成像仍然是一个挑战。在这项研究中，我们报告了一种中尺度贝塞尔曲线结构（BCS），其曲面由二阶贝塞尔曲线定义，可以操纵TJ的特性并实现亚波长分辨率成像中的扩展自由度。通过调整贝塞尔曲线的控制点来调整 TJ 的焦距、有效长度和半高全宽，这在数值和实验上都得到了证实。成像实验表明，在保持亚波长分辨率的同时，实现了约7 λ的自由度，BCS耦合成像系统有效地解析了不同深度的样品。这种灵活、实用且经济高效的实现扩展自由度的方法在太赫兹高分辨率成像和检测方面具有巨大潜力，特别是在涉及有限厚度样本的场景中。

title: Cascaded short-cavity Brillouin fiber laser with hundred-Hertz linewidth and high slope efficiency
author: Hui Zou, Yunzhe Liu, Yang Shi, Yunshang Zhang, Qi Li, Ting Feng, Fei Xu
summary: This study presents a dual-ring-cavity Brillouin fiber laser achieving cascaded linewidth narrowing in ultra-compact cavities. The first-and second-order cavities employ just 4 and 3 m single-mode fibers as Brillouin gain media, respectively. Pumped by a 3 kHz laser, the system achieves progressive linewidth compression. The first-order lasing shows a threshold of 780 mW, delivering a 320 mW output with a 975 Hz linewidth at 1.585 W pump power (35.3% slope efficiency). The second-order lasing exhibits a 0.891 W threshold, producing a 270 mW output with a 586 Hz linewidth (46.5% slope efficiency). The laser maintains excellent stability (power fluctuations within ±1.5% over 1 h), demonstrating significant potential for applications in coherent communications and distributed sensing systems.
title_cn: 具有百赫兹线宽和高斜率效率的级联短腔布里渊光纤激光器
abstract_cn: 这项研究提出了一种双环腔布里渊光纤激光器，可在超紧凑腔中实现级联线宽窄化。一阶和二阶腔分别仅采用 4 和 3 m 单模光纤作为布里渊增益介质。该系统由 3 kHz 激光器泵浦，实现渐进线宽压缩。一阶激光的阈值为 780 mW，在 1.585 W 泵浦功率（35.3% 斜率效率）下提供 320 mW 输出、975 Hz 线宽。二阶激光的阈值为 0.891 W，产生 270 mW 输出，线宽为 586 Hz（斜率效率为 46.5%）。该激光器保持优异的稳定性（1小时内功率波动在±1.5%以内），在相干通信和分布式传感系统中展现出巨大的应用潜力。

title: Pound–Drever–Hall locking of a 780 nm laser using an on-chip Mach-Zehnder interferometer
author: Ning Wei, Yihui Zhang, Haiyang Song, Yifan Yang, Ningning Dong, Zhen Xu, Rong Wei, Bin Wang, Jiajing He, Jun Wang
summary: Low-noise, narrow-linewidth lasers are of great importance for applications demanding exceptional spectral purity, for example, laser cooling. While the cold atom systems usually use large, expensive, and sophisticated lasers to achieve certain wavelengths, photonic integrated circuits can enable portable laser frequency locking systems. This work presents a more compact 780 nm laser stabilization scheme using an on-chip silicon nitride Mach-Zehnder interferometer as a frequency reference. Through the Pound – Drever – Hall locking technique, the system reduces frequency noise by 48.5 dB and narrows the integral linewidth to 15.4 kHz. This demonstrates a compact, high-performance solution for laser stabilization, showing the potential for rubidium atom cooling and quantum manipulation.
title_cn: 使用片上马赫-曾德尔干涉仪对 780 nm 激光器进行庞德-德雷弗-霍尔锁定
abstract_cn: 低噪声、窄线宽激光器对于需要卓越光谱纯度的应用（例如激光冷却）非常重要。虽然冷原子系统通常使用大型、昂贵且复杂的激光器来实现某些波长，但光子集成电路可以实现便携式激光频率锁定系统。这项工作提出了一种更紧凑的 780 nm 激光稳定方案，使用片上氮化硅马赫-曾德干涉仪作为频率参考。通过Pound – Drever – Hall锁定技术，系统将频率噪声降低了48.5 dB，并将积分线宽缩小至15.4 kHz。这展示了一种紧凑、高性能的激光稳定解决方案，展示了铷原子冷却和量子操纵的潜力。

title: Immunization strategy for beam pointing jitter in passive ring gyroscopes
author: Yuxuan Chen, Yuhong Zhong, Kui Liu, Yangsheng Cai, Zhanhao Liu, Lei Zheng, Yunhe Wang, Zhiyuan Wang, Zehuang Lu, Jie Zhang
summary: Beam pointing jitter is a critical technical noise source that limits the performance of passive ring gyroscopes, particularly in the quest for shot-noise-limited sensitivity. In this work, we develop a theoretical model to describe the effect of beam pointing jitter on coupling efficiency fluctuations. These fluctuations introduce frequency noise into the Pound – Drever – Hall (PDH) locking loop error signal. We find that the dominant contribution arises from amplitude modulation, which perturbs the PDH error signal and leads to a locking bias. Based on this insight, we propose an immunization strategy: by minimizing the offset voltage in the PDH servo loop, the locking point can be effectively decoupled from pointing fluctuations, achieving immunity to beam pointing jitter. Experimental validation is performed using the 8 m × 8 m large-scale passive ring gyroscope, HUST-2. The results show that reducing the offset voltage significantly lowers the Sagnac frequency ’ s sensitivity to angular perturbations. This approach allows passive ring gyroscopes to achieve effective immunity to beam pointing jitter. It does not require complex beam pointing stabilization. Furthermore, it provides a straightforward and robust method for suppressing beam-pointing-induced noise. The strategy can also be extended to other optical cavity systems employing PDH frequency stabilization.
title_cn: 无源环形陀螺仪光束指向抖动的免疫策略
abstract_cn: 光束指向抖动是一个关键的技术噪声源，它限制了无源环形陀螺仪的性能，特别是在寻求散粒噪声限制灵敏度时。在这项工作中，我们开发了一个理论模型来描述光束指向抖动对耦合效率波动的影响。这些波动将频率噪声引入 Pound – Drever – Hall (PDH) 锁定环路误差信号中。我们发现主要贡献来自幅度调制，它会扰乱 PDH 误差信号并导致锁定偏差。基于这一见解，我们提出了一种免疫策略：通过最小化PDH伺服环路中的失调电压，锁定点可以有效地从指向波动中解耦，从而实现对光束指向抖动的免疫。使用8 m × 8 m大型无源环形陀螺仪HUST-2进行实验验证。结果表明，降低失调电压可显着降低 Sagnac 频率对角度​​扰动的敏感度。这种方法使无源环形陀螺仪能够有效抵抗波束指向抖动。它不需要复杂的光束指向稳定性。此外，它还提供了一种简单而稳健的方法来抑制光束指向引起的噪声。该策略还可以扩展到其他采用 PDH 频率稳定的光学腔系统。

title: Continuous control of Hong–Ou–Mandel interference for bosonic and fermionic states via unitary metasurfaces
author: Juanzi He, Xingyu Liu, Jun Liu, Xiaojing Feng, Shuming Wang, Zhenlin Wang
summary: ) interference, which arises from the interaction of indistinguishable photons at a beam splitter, plays a pivotal role in quantum information processing. Its outcomes have been constrained by the bosonic nature of photons and the unitarity of conventional beam splitters, leading to photon bunching. Recent studies have explored HOM interference modulation using non-unitary systems, yet no work has achieved control via unitary systems. In this work, we propose a method to achieve continuous control of HOM interference for both bosonic and fermionic polarization-entangled states using polarization-decoupled unitary metasurfaces. This approach enables arbitrary modulation — even complete reversal — of HOM interference without introducing losses, thereby significantly enhancing photon utilization efficiency. Furthermore, by incorporating the rotational degree of freedom of the metasurface, a single structure suffices for continuous tuning of the interference. Our work offers a novel paradigm for manipulating HOM interference, promising to enrich the design of quantum computing systems and quantum logic circuits, while unlocking new applications for meta-surfaces in quantum optics.
title_cn: 通过单一超表面连续控制玻色子和费米子态的红欧曼德尔干涉
abstract_cn: ）干涉是由分束器上不可区分的光子相互作用产生的，在量子信息处理中起着关键作用。其结果受到光子的玻色子性质和传统分束器的单一性的限制，导致光子聚集。最近的研究探索了使用非酉系统的 HOM 干扰调制，但还没有工作通过酉系统实现控制。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种使用偏振解耦酉超表面实现对玻色子和费米子偏振纠缠态 HOM 干涉的连续控制的方法。这种方法可以实现 HOM 干扰的任意调制（甚至完全反转），而不会引入损耗，从而显着提高光子利用效率。此外，通过结合超表面的旋转自由度，单一结构足以连续调整干涉。我们的工作为操纵 HOM 干涉提供了一种新颖的范例，有望丰富量子计算系统和量子逻辑电路的设计，同时解锁超表面在量子光学中的新应用。

title: Reliable soliton generation via detuning-phase parameter space control in self-injection-locked Kerr microcombs
author: Linlong Tian, Zhibiao Hao, Lai Wang, Bing Xiong, Changzheng Sun, Jian Wang, Lin Gan, Hongtao Li, Yanjun Han, Yi Luo
summary: Self-injection-locked Kerr frequency combs have attracted attention as a promising platform for integrated comb sources. Precise phase matching remains an issue for reliable soliton generation. Conventional approaches usually rely on manual manipulation of the coupling between different components, imposing challenges for photonic integration. In this work, we analyze the principle of the phase dependence of soliton generation and propose an architecture incorporating an on-chip phase shifter and a feedback control system. By characterizing the parameter space that tracks the soliton evolution dynamics, this system autonomously generates soliton states within several seconds. This architecture demonstrates potential for enabling self-starting of integrated Kerr combs in applications.
title_cn: 通过自注入锁定克尔微梳中的失谐相位参数空间控制实现可靠的孤子生成
abstract_cn: 自注入锁定克尔频率梳作为集成梳源的有前途的平台而引起了人们的关注。精确的相位匹配仍然是可靠的孤子生成的一个问题。传统方法通常依赖于手动操纵不同组件之间的耦合，这给光子集成带来了挑战。在这项工作中，我们分析了孤子产生的相位依赖性原理，并提出了一种结合片上移相器和反馈控制系统的架构。通过表征跟踪孤子演化动力学的参数空间，该系统在几秒钟内自主生成孤子状态。该架构展示了在应用中实现集成 Kerr 梳自启动的潜力。

title: Temporal contrast enhancement by self-phase modulation in a multi-pass cell with excellent beam quality and pointing stability
author: Yinfei Liu, Jiajun Song, Xiaoming Lu, Yujie Peng, Yanyan Li, Guanguang Gao, Liya Shen, Junze Zhu, Tianze Xu, Yuxin Leng
summary: We demonstrate temporal contrast enhancement via self-phase modulation followed by spectral filtering in a gas-filled multi-pass cell (MPC). The performance of this temporal cleaning device has been thoroughly investigated, covering spectral broadening, efficiency, temporal contrast enhancement, power stability, beam quality, and beam pointing stability. Our device achieves a total efficiency exceeding 30%, corresponding to a pulse energy of 555 μ J. The temporal contrast of the filtered pulse is enhanced by more than two orders of magnitude, surpassing 10 9 . The filtered beam exhibits excellent beam quality and pointing stability, with M 2 values of 1.12 × 1.14 and an angular pointing stability of 1.90 μ rad × 2.05 μ rad. This approach, especially when combined with a second-stage spectral broadening device, provides an excellent front end for an ultra-wideband, high-peak-power laser system, offering high beam quality, excellent power stability, and outstanding pointing stability.
title_cn: 通过多通道池中的自相位调制增强时间对比度，具有出色的光束质量和指向稳定性
abstract_cn: 我们演示了通过自相位调制以及随后在充气多通道池 (MPC) 中进行光谱滤波来增强时间对比度。该时间清洁装置的性能已得到彻底研究，包括光谱展宽、效率、时间对比度增强、功率稳定性、光束质量和光束指向稳定性。我们的器件实现了超过 30% 的总效率，对应于 555 μJ 的脉冲能量。过滤后的脉冲的时间对比度增强了两个以上数量级，超过 10 9 。滤波后的光束具有优异的光束质量和指向稳定性，M 2 值为1.12 × 1.14，角度指向稳定性为1.90 μ rad × 2.05 μ rad。这种方法，特别是与第二级光谱展宽装置结合使用时，为超宽带、高峰值功率激光系统提供了出色的前端，提供高光束质量、出色的功率稳定性和出色的指向稳定性。

title: Low-loss terahertz topological transmission in a silicon-based ridge waveguide platform
author: Jiayang Qi, Entao Wang, Jingya Xie, Liang Qiu, Alexander P. Shkurinov, Yiming Zhu, Songlin Zhuang, Lin Chen
summary: Extending the terahertz (THz) silicon-based ridge waveguide platform to THz asymmetric topological pumping remains unexplored due to theoretical deficiency and severe coupling inefficiency, which hinder practical deployment for potential THz on-chip 6G applications. Here, we experimentally demonstrate asymmetric topological pumping in a silicon-based terahertz ridge waveguide array operating over 159 – 171 GHz. A four-channel Rice – Mele (RM) configuration with modulated waveguide widths and spacings enables robust unidirectional transport with over 15 dB contrast across 12 GHz. The device established a CMOS-compatible, broadband, and robust platform for integrated THz photonic circuits.
title_cn: 硅基脊形波导平台中的低损耗太赫兹拓扑传输
abstract_cn: 由于理论缺陷和严重的耦合效率低下，将太赫兹 (THz) 硅基脊波导平台扩展到太赫兹非对称拓扑泵浦仍未得到探索，这阻碍了潜在太赫兹片上 6G 应用的实际部署。在这里，我们通过实验演示了工作频率超过 159 – 171 GHz 的硅基太赫兹脊形波导阵列中的非对称拓扑泵浦。具有调制波导宽度和间距的四通道 Rice – Mele (RM) 配置可实现稳健的单向传输，在 12 GHz 范围内对比度超过 15 dB。该器件为集成太赫兹光子电路建立了一个 CMOS 兼容、宽带且稳健的平台。

title: Stable frequency transfer with a 400 km unrepeatered fiber link
author: Baodong Zhao, Hao Gao, En Zhu, Jiahui Cheng, Yapeng Liu, Jie Zhang, Jianming Shang, Ziyang Chen, Tianwei Jiang, Bin Luo, Song Yu, Hong Guo
summary: In this paper, we propose a method of stable frequency transfer over a 400 km link without an external power supply by combining distributed Raman amplifiers (DRAs) and remote optical pump amplifiers (ROPAs). We elaborate on the advantages of these technologies and their physical limitations in unrepeatered frequency transfer. In this study, by integrating a Bi-ROPA and a first-order DRA in a single-fiber bidirectional configuration over a 400 km ultralong-haul unrepeatered frequency link (with an average loss of 0.2 dB/km), a frequency instability of 8 × 10 − 14 at 1 s integration time and 2 × 10 − 16 at 10,000 s integration time has been achieved.
title_cn: 通过 400 公里无中继光纤链路实现稳定的频率传输
abstract_cn: 在本文中，我们提出了一种通过结合分布式拉曼放大器（DRA）和远程光泵放大器（ROPA）在 400 km 链路上稳定频率传输而无需外部电源的方法。我们详细阐述了这些技术的优点及其在无中继频率传输中的物理限制。在本研究中，通过将 Bi-ROPA 和一阶 DRA 集成在 400 km 超长距离无中继频率链路（平均损耗为 0.2 dB/km）的单纤双向配置中，实现了 1 s 积分时间下 8 × 10 − 14 的频率不稳定性和 10,000 s 积分时间下 2 × 10 − 16 的频率不稳定性。

title: High-sensitivity micro-ring resonator biosensors with a loop mirror structure for detecting alpha-fetoprotein
author: Yubo Xia, Jiamei Gu, Huiyuan Zhang, Yuxia Song, Songliang Zhang, Xiujing Yan, Mingyu Li, Qiushun Li
summary: Chip-scale micro-photonic biosensors have made significant advancements over the past two decades, with various platforms developed for detecting biomarkers, such as proteins in biological fluids. The influenza virus pandemic has notably accelerated research in bio-detection, driving the development of many high-performance sensors. Despite these advancements, there remains a pressing need for technical solutions that offer point-of-care features, including low cost, rapid response, and low limit of detection (LOD). This study investigates the reflective micro-ring resonator (RMRR) cascaded with a loop mirror. By incorporating a loop mirror into the through port of the micro-ring resonator (MRR), the resonant light is reflected back into the micro-ring and interacts with the analyte again, thereby reducing the LOD of the ring resonator sensor. Experimental results show that the LOD of the MRR sensor is 1.2 × 10 − 5 RIU, while the LOD of the RMRR sensor is 3.8 × 10 − 6 RIU. After functionalizing the waveguide surface of the ring resonator, the RMRR can detect the alpha-fetoprotein (AFP) molecules with a sensitivity of 0.24 pm/(ng/mL) and an LOD of 3.1 ng/mL. This silicon-based optoelectronic on-chip RMRR shows great potential in the field of biomedical molecular detection
title_cn: 用于检测甲胎蛋白的具有环镜结构的高灵敏度微环谐振器生物传感器
abstract_cn: 芯片级微光子生物传感器在过去二十年中取得了重大进步，开发了各种用于检测生物标志物（例如生物液体中的蛋白质）的平台。流感病毒大流行显着加速了生物检测领域的研究，推动了许多高性能传感器的发展。尽管取得了这些进步，但仍然迫切需要提供即时护理功能的技术解决方案，包括低成本、快速响应和低检测限 (LOD)。本研究研究了与环形镜级联的反射微环谐振器（RMRR）。通过将环形镜合并到微环谐振器 (MRR) 的直通端口中，谐振光被反射回微环并再次与分析物相互作用，从而降低环形谐振器传感器的 LOD。实验结果表明，MRR传感器的LOD为1.2×10−5 RIU，而RMRR传感器的LOD为3.8×10−6 RIU。对环形谐振器的波导表面进行功能化后，RMRR 可以检测甲胎蛋白 (AFP) 分子，灵敏度为 0.24 pm/(ng/mL)，LOD 为 3.1 ng/mL。这种硅基光电片上RMRR在生物医学分子检测领域显示出巨大潜力

title: High-precision nonlinear calibration of FMCW LiDAR systems: a deep learning approach leveraging digital twin and reinforcement learning
author: Zhuoran Wang, Hongwei Zhang, Dachao Xu, Haohao Zhao, Shichang Xu, Guohui Yuan
summary: Frequency-modulated continuous wave (FMCW) laser ranging, which is critical to the laser industry, faces challenges in achieving high range accuracy due to the non-linearity of the laser frequency modulation. Traditional calibration methods based on iterative algorithms and photoelectric phase-locked loops are limited by their dependence on prior knowledge and often fail to exploit the full potential of the data generated by the ranging system. In this paper, we introduce a novel deep learning approach using digital twin (DT) technology, demonstrating the potential in fields such as aerospace and optics. We propose a neural network (NN) model integrated with the soft actor-critic (SAC) control algorithm operating within a DT framework to effectively calibrate the nonlinear errors during the frequency-swept process. This innovative framework has significantly improved the performance of FMCW laser ranging, with the side mode suppression ratio (SMSR) of the beat signal increasing from 3.2 to 17.3 dB and the full width at half-maximum (FWHM) decreasing from 15.82 to 2.64 kHz. These improvements not only enhance the accuracy and quality of the FMCW ranging system but also pave the way for new research directions and insights in the broader fields of optical society.
title_cn: FMCW LiDAR 系统的高精度非线性校准：利用数字孪生和强化学习的深度学习方法
abstract_cn: 调频连续波（FMCW）激光测距对激光行业至关重要，但由于激光调频的非线性，在实现高精度测距方面面临着挑战。基于迭代算法和光电锁相环的传统校准方法因其对先验知识的依赖而受到限制，并且往往无法充分利用测距系统生成的数据的潜力。在本文中，我们介绍了一种使用数字孪生（DT）技术的新型深度学习方法，展示了在航空航天和光学等领域的潜力。我们提出了一种与软执行者批评（SAC）控制算法集成的神经网络（NN）模型，该算法在DT框架内运行，以有效校准扫频过程中的非线性误差。这一创新框架显着提高了FMCW激光测距的性能，拍频信号的边模抑制比（SMSR）从3.2 dB增加到17.3 dB，半高全宽（FWHM）从15.82 kHz降低到2.64 kHz。这些改进不仅提高了 FMCW 测距系统的精度和质量，而且为光学学会更广泛领域的新研究方向和见解铺平了道路。

title: High-dimensional computational imaging using spectral-polarization encoding and deep learning
author: Yongkang Yan, Zeqian Gan, Yihang Zheng, Luying Hu, Xinrui Xu, Ran Kang, Jianqiang Mei, Paul Beckett, William Shieh, Rui Yin, Xin He, Xu Liu
summary: We present a high-dimensional computational imaging system integrating spatial, spectral, and polarization detection. It employs four high-dimensional encoders and a neural network to reconstruct 80 high-dimensional target images. The sys-tem simultaneously reconstructed spectral and polarization data across 400 – 800 nm (20 nm intervals, 20 bands) with four polarization angles per band (0°, 45°, 90°, − 45°) at 1280 × 960 resolution, achieving a 1:20 reconstruction ratio. Experimental validation shows the spectral root mean squared error (RMSE) can reach 0.0088. This integrated approach overcomes limitations of single-function devices (e.g., hyperspectral/polarization cameras), offering an efficient solution for advanced optical sensing.
title_cn: 使用光谱偏振编码和深度学习的高维计算成像
abstract_cn: 我们提出了一种集成空间、光谱和偏振检测的高维计算成像系统。它采用四个高维编码器和一个神经网络来重建 80 个高维目标图像。该系统以 1280 × 960 分辨率同时重建 400 – 800 nm（20 nm 间隔，20 个波段）的光谱和偏振数据，每个波段有四个偏振角（0°、45°、90°、− 45°），分辨率达到 1:20。实验验证表明光谱均方根误差(RMSE)可达0.0088。这种集成方法克服了单功能设备（例如高光谱/偏振相机）的局限性，为先进光学传感提供了有效的解决方案。

title: Miniaturized receiver optical sub-assembly based on a low-temperature co-fired ceramic substrate
author: Chaoquan Wang, Zeping Zhao, Jianguo Liu, Shiyou Xu
summary: In this Letter, a miniaturized receiver optical sub-assembly (ROSA) based on a low-temperature co-fired ceramic (LTCC) substrate is proposed and demonstrated. By embedding the bias circuits of the chips into the multilayer substrate, the space utilization of the ROSA is effectively enhanced. To eliminate parasitic parameter effects caused by the LTCC fabrication processes, an equivalent circuit model of the photodetector (PD) package network is established. The effect of the compensation capacitor at the PD chip ’ s N-electrode on optoelectronic response characteristics is systematically analyzed. For further high-frequency performance improvement, cavity optimization is implemented through substrate excavation at the compensation capacitor location. After the cavity optimization, the S 21 response of the ROSA demonstrates a 3dB band-width covering L – X bands with the average gain exceeding 1.5 dB. The designed LTCC solution can provide an excellent extension idea for the integration of multiple array elements in the airborne electronic information equipment.
title_cn: 基于低温共烧陶瓷基板的小型化接收器光学组件
abstract_cn: 在这封信中，提出并演示了一种基于低温共烧陶瓷（LTCC）基板的小型化接收器光学子组件（ROSA）。通过将芯片的偏置电路嵌入多层基板中，有效提高了ROSA的空间利用率。为了消除LTCC制造工艺引起的寄生参数影响，建立了光电探测器（PD）封装网络的等效电路模型。系统分析了PD芯片N电极补偿电容对光电响应特性的影响。为了进一步提高高频性能，通过在补偿电容器位置处进行基板挖掘来实现腔体优化。腔体优化后，ROSA 的 S 21 响应表现出覆盖 L – X 频段的 3dB 带宽，平均增益超过 1.5 dB。所设计的LTCC方案可以为机载电子信息设备中多个阵元的集成提供良好的扩展思路。

title: Critical control of OPO resonator length dominated by gain-loss competition and suppression of peak power density
author: Pengfei Li, Yulei Wang, Fei Zhang, Ming Zhu, Linru He, Hengzhe Yu, Hao Zheng, Bingzheng Yan, Zhenxu Bai, Yu Yu, Zhiwei Lü
summary: This study investigates the design of resonator length in a single-resonator optical parametric oscillator (OPO) and its influence on gain-loss dynamics. Based on a walk-off angle-free KTA crystal, a theoretical model is proposed to quantify the relationship among resonator length, mode-field overlap efficiency, and nonlinear gain. There exists an optimal value of the resonator length. When the length of the resonator is this optimal value, the net gain of the resonator is the highest, and the nonlinear conversion efficiency of the OPO is also the highest. Under the experimental conditions of this study, when the length of the resonator is 100 mm, the system achieves the highest signal conversion efficiency. Compared with a 27 mm resonator, the signal beam mode area expands by 42.4%, while the peak power density decreases by 25.1%. As a result, the optimal resonator length value is conducive to enhancing the conversion efficiency of the OPO and reducing the risk of optical component damage.
title_cn: 以增益-损耗竞争和峰值功率密度抑制为主的 OPO 谐振器长度的关键控制
abstract_cn: 本研究研究了单谐振器光参量振荡器 (OPO) 中谐振器长度的设计及其对增益损失动态的影响。基于无走离角 KTA 晶体，提出了一个理论模型来量化谐振器长度、模场重叠效率和非线性增益之间的关系。谐振器长度存在一个最佳值。当谐振器的长度为该最佳值时，谐振器的净增益最高，OPO的非线性转换效率也最高。在本研究的实验条件下，当谐振器长度为100 mm时，系统实现了最高的信号转换效率。与27 mm谐振器相比，信号光束模式面积扩大了42.4%，而峰值功率密度下降了25.1%。因此，最佳谐振器长度值有利于提高OPO的转换效率并降低光学元件损坏的风险。

title: Size-dependent ultrafast carrier dynamics and optical nonlinearity in a gold nanoparticle confined in a solid matrix
author: Qing Lin, Yuelan He, Jiahe Yan, Zixuan Wan, Pengyun Wang, Yujia Zhai, Lin Wang, Xiaofeng Liu, Jianrong Qiu
summary: The ultrafast nonlinear optical response of plasmonic nanostructures has found diverse applications from all-optical switching to nonlinear photonics. Here, we explore the nonlinear optical response and the ultrafast carrier dynamics of gold nanoparticles doped in the silicon lithium niobate (SLN) glass. Au nanoparticles (NPs) with different sizes were incorporated into the glass by the conventional melt-quenching method. The measurement of the nonlinear optical (NLO) response by an open-aperture Z-scan method reveals a strong saturable absorption for the samples, with a clear size dependence of the NLO absorption coefficient exhibited due to the difference in linear absorption by plasmon resonance. The size effect also manifests in the carrier relaxation dynamics of the gold NPs due to the difference in the surface-to-volume ratio of the gold NPs that could determine the dominant decay channels. The results of this work underscore the subtle role of the size effect in the ultrafast relaxation of plasmonic nanostructures.
title_cn: 限制在固体基质中的金纳米颗粒中尺寸依赖性超快载流子动力学和光学非线性
abstract_cn: 等离子体纳米结构的超快非线性光学响应已找到从全光开关到非线性光子学的多种应用。在这里，我们探索了掺杂在硅铌酸锂（SLN）玻璃中的金纳米颗粒的非线性光学响应和超快载流子动力学。通过传统的熔融淬火方法将不同尺寸的金纳米颗粒（NP）掺入玻璃中。通过开孔径 Z 扫描方法测量非线性光学 (NLO) 响应，揭示了样品的强可饱和吸收，由于等离子体共振线性吸收的差异，非线性光学 (NLO) 吸收系数表现出明显的尺寸依赖性。由于金纳米颗粒的表面积与体积比的差异可以决定主要的衰变通道，尺寸效应也体现在金纳米颗粒的载流子弛豫动力学中。这项工作的结果强调了尺寸效应在等离子体纳米结构超快弛豫中的微妙作用。

title: Large sensitivity-range product of liquid level enabled by constrained multimode interference
author: Zhihao Chang, Qi Sheng, Ying Xu, Liangtao Hou, Jiuru Yang, Yu Zhang, Zhihai Liu
summary: A long-length hollow-core fiber-based few-mode interferometer is developed, aiming to overcome the limitation between the sensitivity and dynamic range of liquid level measurement. The characteristics of cladding-mode distribution are investigated and the constrained multimode interference is achieved and validated experimentally, with the visibility up to 13.8 dB. The results demonstrate the simultaneous achievement of a high wavelength response of 10.1 nm/cm over a large linear range of 9 cm. The sensitivity-range product reaches approximately 91 nm and corresponds to an improvement of more than 300%. Additionally, the measured error from the ambient refractive index is assessed and the accuracy is guaranteed within less than 0.1 mm by an empirical third-order polynomial-based solution.
title_cn: 通过受限多模干扰实现大灵敏度范围的液位乘积
abstract_cn: 研制了一种基于长空心光纤的少模干涉仪，旨在克服液位测量灵敏度和动态范围之间的限制。研究了包层模分布的特性，实现了约束多模干扰并进行了实验验证，能见度高达13.8 dB。结果表明，在 9 cm 的大线性范围内同时实现了 10.1 nm/cm 的高波长响应。灵敏度范围乘积达到约 91 nm，相当于提高了 300% 以上。此外，还评估了环境折射率的测量误差，并通过基于经验的三阶多项式的解决方案保证精度在 0.1 mm 以下。

title: Femtosecond laser (3+1)D printed few-mode fiber mode equalizer
author: Jing Liu, Zhiyong Zhao, Senyu Zhang, Jie Yan, Xi Xiao, Ming Tang
summary: We propose and demonstrate an all-fiber few-mode mode equalizer (ME) fabricated via a novel, to our knowledge, femto-second laser (3 + 1)D printing technique that employs multi-material two-photon polymerization for integrated waveguide fabrication for the first time. The waveguide structure for mode power equalization was directly integrated onto the fiber tip. By precisely tuning both the waveguide length and refractive index (RI) profile, a tunable differential mode attenuation (DMA) range from − 2.4 to 9.2 dB was achieved, significantly surpassing the performance of previously reported all-fiber MEs. This approach provides a compact and highly tunable solution for mode equalization in few-mode fiber transmission systems.
title_cn: 飞秒激光(3+1)D印刷少模光纤模式均衡器
abstract_cn: 据我们所知，我们提出并演示了一种全光纤少模均衡器（ME），该技术是通过一种新颖的飞秒激光（3 + 1）D打印技术制造的，该技术首次采用多材料双光子聚合进行集成波导制造。用于模式功率均衡的波导结构直接集成到光纤尖端上。通过精确调整波导长度和折射率 (RI) 分布，实现了 - 2.4 至 9.2 dB 的可调差模衰减 (DMA) 范围，显着超越了之前报道的全光纤 ME 的性能。这种方法为少模光纤传输系统中的模式均衡提供了紧凑且高度可调的解决方案。

title: Photonics-aided 240-Gbit/s terahertz transmission over 200-m 2 × 2 MIMO links at 300 GHz enabled by non-uniform signaling and CMMA-NAG equalization
author: Zhigang Xin, Jiao Zhang, Min Zhu, Weidong Tong, Qing Zhong, Junhao Zhang, Yuancheng Cai, Bingchang Hua, Mingzheng Lei, Junjie Ding, Xingyu Chen, Yunwu Wang, Long Zhang
summary: This work demonstrates a photonics-aided 2 × 2 multiple-input multiple-output (MIMO) terahertz (THz) wireless communication system operating at 300 GHz, achieving a data rate of 240 Gbit/s over a 200-m outdoor link. To overcome nonlinear distortion and improve spectral efficiency, non-uniform signaling is employed to optimize constellation shaping. A novel, to our knowledge, cascaded multi-module algorithm with a Nesterov accelerated gradient (CMMA-NAG) equalizer is proposed to enhance convergence speed and equalization performance. Experimental results show effective suppression of non-linear effects and inter-channel interference, enabling high-quality recovery of coherent polarization-division multiplexed signals. This work offers significant advancements toward high-capacity, reliable THz wireless links for next-generation 6G communication networks.
title_cn: 通过非均匀信令和 CMMA-NAG 均衡实现 300 GHz 下 200 米 2 × 2 MIMO 链路上的光子辅助 240 Gbit/s 太赫兹传输
abstract_cn: 这项工作展示了一种光子辅助 2 × 2 多输入多输出 (MIMO) 太赫兹 (THz) 无线通信系统，工作频率为 300 GHz，可在 200 米室外链路上实现 240 Gbit/s 的数据速率。为了克服非线性失真并提高频谱效率，采用非均匀信令来优化星座整形。据我们所知，提出了一种带有 Nesterov 加速梯度（CMMA-NAG）均衡器的级联多模块算法，以提高收敛速度和均衡性能。实验结果表明，可以有效抑制非线性效应和通道间干扰，从而实现相干偏振复用信号的高质量恢复。这项工作为下一代 6G 通信网络的高容量、可靠的太赫兹无线链路带来了重大进步。

title: Slow-light grating waveguide with a large delay-bandwidth product based on degenerate band-edge resonance
author: Rujun Liao, Cuiwei Xue, Min Liu, Minni Qu, Xueling Quan, Xiulan Cheng
summary: Due to the mutual constraints of group index and slow-light bandwidth, conventional Bragg grating structures find it difficult to realize a large delay-bandwidth product, which limits their application in optical devices. Therefore, we have proposed a slow-light grating waveguide based on degenerate band-edge resonance by splicing and cascading asymmetric Bragg gratings. The utilization of degenerate band-edge resonance to enhance the slow-light bandwidth has been experimentally validated for the first time, to our knowledge, in the field of grating waveguides. Simulation and experimental results show that the proposed structure can achieve a bandwidth of 16 nm while maintaining a group index of 7.5. This approach significantly improves the delay-bandwidth product to 120 nm while keeping a low transmission loss compared to other Bragg grating structures.
title_cn: 基于简并带边谐振的大延迟带宽积慢光光栅波导
abstract_cn: 由于群折射率和慢光带宽的相互制约，传统的布拉格光栅结构难以实现大的延迟带宽积，限制了其在光学器件中的应用。因此，我们通过拼接和级联非对称布拉格光栅，提出了一种基于简并带边共振的慢光光栅波导。据我们所知，利用简并带边共振来增强慢光带宽在光栅波导领域首次得到了实验验证。仿真和实验结果表明，所提出的结构可以实现16 nm的带宽，同时保持群折射率7.5。与其他布拉格光栅结构相比，这种方法将延迟带宽积显着提高至 120 nm，同时保持较低的传输损耗。

title: Non-Hermitian singularities in a single nanowire resonator
author: Peng Jiang, Kaiyang Wang, Qifeng Ruan, Zhiyuan Gu
summary: Photonic structures with non-Hermitian characteristics show unique phenomena that are not accessible in Hermitian systems. However, most of these intriguing findings are demonstrated in conventionally active or passive systems, such as microcavities, metasurfaces, and waveguides. Till now, the non-Hermitian singularities in nanowire Fabry-Pérot (F-P) resonators were only demonstrated in parity-time symmetric cases, while still absent in the passive situation, which is practical but more important. Here, we show that strong mode coupling intrinsically exists in passive nanowires, by which the quality factors can be improved over an order of magnitude. Furthermore, by tuning the effective index contrast at the end-facets of the nanowire, which corresponds to the energy leakage rate, the transition from strong to weak coupling of eigenstates is realized. Consequently, an exceptional point (EP) is observed in nanowire resonators through this transition, exhibiting enhanced sensitivity compared to conventional nanowires. Our results underpin the general non-Hermitian singularities in a single nanowire F-P cavity, substantially broadening the application scenarios of dielectric resonators.
title_cn: 单个纳米线谐振器中的非厄米奇点
abstract_cn: 具有非厄米特性的光子结构表现出厄米系统中无法实现的独特现象。然而，大多数这些有趣的发现都是在传统的主动或被动系统中得到证明的，例如微腔、超表面和波导。到目前为止，纳米线法布里-珀罗（F-P）谐振器中的非厄米奇点仅在宇称时间对称情况下得到证明，而在无源情况下仍然不存在，这是实用但更重要的。在这里，我们证明了无源纳米线本质上存在强模式耦合，通过这种耦合可以将品质因数提高一个数量级。此外，通过调整纳米线端面的有效折射率对比度（对应于能量泄漏率），实现了本征态从强耦合到弱耦合的转变。因此，通过这种转变，在纳米线谐振器中观察到了一个异常点（EP），与传统纳米线相比，表现出增强的灵敏度。我们的结果支持了单纳米线 F-P 腔中的一般非厄米奇点，大大拓宽了介电谐振器的应用场景。

title: Scattering-amplitude modulated guided-wave-driven metalens for enhanced focusing efficiency
author: Xiao Chen, Bo Chu, Shuqiao Xu, Hao Chen, Zicheng Yang, Haoshuang Zhong, Guoyong Zhang, Zhuo Chen
summary: Guided-wave-driven metasurfaces enable unprecedented control over off-chip light scattering but are often limited by low efficiency. Here, we introduce a scattering-amplitude modulation strategy into guided-wave-driven metalenses to significantly enhance their out-of-plane focusing efficiency. By taking the guided-wave attenuation due to back-reflection and scattering from the meta-atoms into account, the meta-atom sizes are sequentially increased along the guided-wave propagation direction to ensure near-uniform power scattering from each element. Our scattering-amplitude modulated design achieves focusing efficiency 2.3 times that of conventional metalenses composed of uniform meta-atoms. This approach paves the way for highly efficient and uniform integrated metasurface devices critical for next-generation dense photonic circuits.
title_cn: 散射调幅导波驱动超透镜可提高聚焦效率
abstract_cn: 导波驱动的超表面能够对片外光散射进行前所未有的控制，但通常受到低效率的限制。在这里，我们将散射幅度调制策略引入导波驱动的超透镜中，以显着提高其面外聚焦效率。考虑到由于超原子的背反射和散射造成的导波衰减，超原子尺寸沿导波传播方向依次增大，以确保每个元件的功率散射近乎均匀。我们的散射幅度调制设计的聚焦效率是由均匀元原子组成的传统超透镜的 2.3 倍。这种方法为高效、均匀的集成超表面器件铺平了道路，这对下一代密集光子电路至关重要。

title: Parity-time-symmetric theory in noncanonical Laguerre–Gaussian petal mode generation
author: Siyu Han, Gang Huang, Jianing Li, Zhenwei Ou, Bingxuan Li, Ge Zhang
summary: The non-uniform energy distribution in experimentally generated Laguerre – Gaussian (LG) petal modes has long been a persistent challenge in laser transverse mode research, hindering both fundamental understanding and practical applications. This phenomenon manifests in two critical forms: first, there is an imbalance in the energy proportion between two LG modes with the same azimuthal index, opposite signs, and zero radial index. This imbalance causes the petals in the petal mode to gradually fuse. Second, the energy distribution among the petal modes within a single petal mode is non-uniform, with some petals having higher energy and others having lower energy. Notably, this energy asymmetry exhibits a striking and previously unrecognized connection to parity-time (PT) symmetry principles. We integrated the PT symmetry theory with the coupled-mode theory, and combined experimental observations with numerical simulations. This allows us to reveal the fundamental mechanism: PT symmetry breaking and angular modulation in the laser cavity interact to drive the non-uniform energy distribution. This theoretical framework not only clarifies the puzzle of energy distribution in LG petal modes but also provides a solid theoretical basis for advancing optical manipulation techniques, facilitating the development of high-capacity optical communication systems, and inspiring further innovations in related optical fields. We further envision that this mechanistic insight could be generalized to diverse laser systems, thereby extending its implications beyond the current scope of solid-state laser platforms.
title_cn: 非正则拉盖尔-高斯花瓣模式生成中的宇称时间对称理论
abstract_cn: 实验产生的拉盖尔-高斯（LG）花瓣模式的不均匀能量分布长期以来一直是激光横模研究中的一个持续挑战，阻碍了基础理解和实际应用。这种现象表现为两种关键形式：首先，具有相同方位角指数、相反符号和零径向指数的两个LG模式之间的能量比例不平衡。这种不平衡导致花瓣模式下的花瓣逐渐融合。其次，单个花瓣模式内的花瓣模式之间的能量分布是不均匀的，一些花瓣具有较高的能量而另一些花瓣具有较低的能量。值得注意的是，这种能量不对称性与宇称时间（PT）对称原理有着惊人的、以前未被认识到的联系。我们将PT对称理论与耦合模理论相结合，并将实验观察与数值模拟相结合。这使我们能够揭示基本机制：激光腔中的 PT 对称性破缺和角度调制相互作用，驱动不均匀的能量分布。该理论框架不仅阐明了LG花瓣模式的能量分布之谜，而且为推进光操纵技术、促进大容量光通信系统的发展、激发相关光学领域的进一步创新提供了坚实的理论基础。我们进一步设想，这种机械见解可以推广到不同的激光系统，从而将其影响扩展到当前固态激光平台的范围之外。
