title: Low-latency twin-field quantum key distribution breaking the linear key-rate bound
author: Yangguang Shan, Chenshuai Guan, Zhenqiang Yin, Guanjie Fanyuan, Wei Chen, Zhengfu Han
summary: Twin-field (TF) quantum key distribution (QKD) has attracted intense attention because of its ability to break the repeaterless key-rate bound and its high performance at long distances. However, TF QKD usually requires a large post-processing block to achieve good performance, with typical sizes ranging from 10 13 to 10 14 transmitted pulses. Therefore, users may need to wait for hours to get the key. To overcome this limitation, we employ the high-key-rate partial-phase-postselection (PPP) protocol, which can beat the linear key-rate bound with significantly fewer transmitted pulses. Leveraging our low-error, high-speed experimental system, we break the linear key-rate bound with only 10 10 experimental rounds, requiring merely 5 s to transmit the corresponding quantum states. To the best of our knowledge, our experiment is the first experimental verification of the PPP protocol, demonstrating approximately a twofold key-rate enhancement over other mainstream TF-QKD protocols.
title_cn: 低延迟双场量子密钥分配打破线性密钥速率限制
abstract_cn: 双场（TF）量子密钥分发（QKD）因其打破无中继密钥速率限制的能力以及在长距离下的高性能而引起了人们的广泛关注。然而，TF QKD 通常需要大型后处理块才能实现良好的性能，典型大小范围为 10 13 至 10 14 个传输脉冲。因此，用户可能需要等待数小时才能获得密钥。为了克服这一限制，我们采用高密钥速率部分相位后选择（PPP）协议，该协议可以通过显着减少的传输脉冲来打破线性密钥速率限制。利用我们的低误差、高速实验系统，我们仅用 10 10 轮实验就突破了线性密钥速率限制，仅需要 5 秒即可传输相应的量子态。据我们所知，我们的实验是 PPP 协议的首次实验验证，与其他主流 TF-QKD 协议相比，密钥速率大约提高了一倍。

title: Laser‐Scanning Infrared‐Raman‐Fluorescence Microscopy for Metabolic Flux Imaging in Living Organisms
author: Siming Wang, Pengcheng Fu, Hyeon Jeong Lee, Delong Zhang
summary:
<jats:title>ABSTRACT</jats:title>
                  <jats:p>
                    Comprehensive observation of chemical dynamics in living systems is crucial for deciphering metabolic processes, yet current techniques force a compromise between molecular specificity and imaging throughput. This work presents laser‐scanning in situ pump‐probe infrared (IR) and Raman excitation (LS‐INSPIRE) microscopy, a real‐time multimodal imaging platform that simultaneously captures mid‐IR photothermal (MIP), stimulated Raman scattering (SRS), and two‐photon excited fluorescence (TPEF) signals within a single scan. A custom catoptric relay paired with a reverse‐Cassegrain objective yields chromatic‐aberration‐free imaging from UV to mid‐IR, delivering pixel‐registered, multichannel data across a large field of view. The capabilities are demonstrated by tracking deuterium incorporation into lipids in live cells, quantitatively mapping molecular markers during embryogenesis, and uncovering neural development and lipid metabolism mechanisms in
                    <jats:italic>Caenorhabditis elegans</jats:italic>
                    . LS‐INSPIRE transcends the longstanding trade‐off between molecular breadth and dynamic acquisition, establishing a versatile paradigm for chemical imaging in biology, medicine, and materials science.
                  </jats:p>
title_cn: 用于活体代谢通量成像的激光扫描红外拉曼荧光显微镜
abstract_cn:
<jats:title>摘要</jats:title>
                  <贾茨：p>
                    全面观察生命系统中的化学动力学对于破译代谢过程至关重要，但目前的技术迫使分子特异性和成像通量之间做出妥协。这项工作提出了激光扫描原位泵浦探针红外（IR）和拉曼激发（LS-INSPIRE）显微镜，这是一种实时多模态成像平台，可在单次扫描中同时捕获中红外光热（MIP）、受激拉曼散射（SRS）和双光子激发荧光（TPEF）信号。定制的反射中继器与反卡塞格伦物镜配合使用，可产生从紫外到中红外的无色差成像，在大视场中提供像素配准的多通道数据。通过跟踪氘与活细胞脂质的结合、定量绘制胚胎发生过程中的分子标记以及揭示神经发育和脂质代谢机制来证明这些功能。
                    <jats:italic>秀丽隐杆线虫</jats:italic>
                    。 LS-INSPIRE 超越了分子宽度和动态采集之间长期存在的权衡，为生物学、医学和材料科学领域的化学成像建立了通用范例。
                  </贾茨：p>

title: Frozen Differential Scattering in Reconfigurable Complex Media
author: Philipp del Hougne
summary:
<jats:title>ABSTRACT</jats:title>
                  <jats:p>The sensitivity of transmission to the input wavefront is a hallmark feature of complex media and the basis for wavefront shaping techniques. Yet, intriguing special cases exist in which the output wavefront is “frozen” (agnostic to the input wavefront). This happens when special structure in the complex medium collapses the rank of its transmission matrix to unity. Here, an analogous, more universal phenomenon for differential scattering (including reflection) in reconfigurable complex media is demonstrated. Specifically, for a localized perturbation, the differential scattering matrix of any complex medium has rank one. One consequence is that the differential output signal is coherent irrespective of the input wavefront's coherence. Moreover, the thermal noise emitted into the frozen differential output mode has a structure that can be exploited for thermal noise management. Frozen differential scattering is experimentally evidenced in a rich‐scattering wireless link parametrized by a programmable meta‐atom. “Customized freezing” is achieved by optimizing the configuration of programmable meta‐atoms that parametrize the wireless link, as envisioned for 6G networks. Moreover, particular shapes of the frozen differential output mode are imposed, and a signal‐to‐thermal‐noise ratio is maximized. Potential applications include filtering and stabilization of differential wavefronts, as well as imaging, sensing, and communications in complex media.</jats:p>
title_cn: 可重构复杂介质中的冻结差分散射
abstract_cn:
<jats:title>摘要</jats:title>
                  <jats:p>传输对输入波前的敏感性是复杂介质的标志特征，也是波前整形技术的基础。然而，存在一些有趣的特殊情况，其中输出波前被“冻结”（与输入波前无关）。当复杂介质中的特殊结构将其传输矩阵的秩压缩为单位时，就会发生这种情况。这里，演示了可重构复杂介质中差分散射（包括反射）的类似的、更普遍的现象。具体来说，对于局部扰动，任何复杂介质的微分散射矩阵都具有一阶。结果之一是，无论输入波前的相干性如何，差分输出信号都是相干的。此外，发射到冻结差分输出模式中的热噪声具有可用于热噪声管理的结构。冻结的微分散射在由可编程元原子参数化的丰富散射无线链路中得到了实验证明。正如 6G 网络所设想的那样，“定制冻结”是通过优化参数化无线链路的可编程元原子的配置来实现的。此外，还施加了冻结差分输出模式的特定形状，并且使信热噪声比最大化。潜在的应用包括差分波前的滤波和稳定，以及复杂介质中的成像、传感和通信。</jats:p>

title: Quantitative Phase Imaging From Single‐Direction Gradients Based on U‐KAN and Orthogonal Shear Learning
author: Yuheng Wang, Tao Wu, Tao Huang, Huiyang Wang, Weina Zhang, Jianglei Di, Joseph Rosen, Xiaoxu Lu, Liyun Zhong, Yuwen Qin
summary:
<jats:title>ABSTRACT</jats:title>
                  <jats:p>Differential interference contrast microscopy (DIC) plays an irreplaceable role in live‐cell dynamic studies due to its non‐destructive, high‐contrast, and 3D imaging capabilities. However, traditional DIC captures only single‐direction gradients, causing orthogonal gradients loss and limiting quantitative phase imaging and anisotropy analysis. Here, we propose an orthogonal shear learning U‐KAN (OSLU‐KAN) architecture for single‐direction phase gradient‐based quantitative phase imaging. This method integrates highly interpretable Kolmogorov‐Arnold networks (KAN) into the U‐Net framework, efficiently learning to predict orthogonal phase gradients from single‐direction gradients. By combining a physics‐driven spiral phase integration (SPI) model and a highly compatible Fourier loss function, this method achieves fast, high‐precision, and artifact‐free phase reconstruction. Experimental results show an RMSE of 0.913 mrad/µm for orthogonal gradient prediction and 0.0103 rad for phase reconstruction. Importantly, OSLU‐KAN enables accurate phase retrieval and anisotropic phase gradients estimation, with excellent compatibility and generalization capabilities, providing a new interpretable, physics‐informed paradigm for deep learning‐driven quantitative phase imaging.</jats:p>
title_cn: 基于 U-KAN 和正交剪切学习的单向梯度定量相位成像
abstract_cn:
<jats:title>摘要</jats:title>
                  <jat:p>微分干涉显微镜 (DIC) 因其无损、高对比度和 3D 成像能力，在活细胞动态研究中发挥着不可替代的作用。然而，传统的 DIC 仅捕获单向梯度，导致正交梯度损失并限制定量相位成像和各向异性分析。在这里，我们提出了一种正交剪切学习 U-KAN (OSLU-KAN) 架构，用于基于单向相位梯度的定量相位成像。该方法将高度可解释的柯尔莫哥洛夫-阿诺德网络（KAN）集成到 U-Net 框架中，有效地学习从单向梯度预测正交相位梯度。通过结合物理驱动的螺旋相位积分（SPI）模型和高度兼容的傅里叶损失函数，该方法实现了快速、高精度、无伪影的相位重建。实验结果显示，正交梯度预测的 RMSE 为 0.913 mrad/μm，相位重建的 RMSE 为 0.0103 rad。重要的是，OSLU-KAN 能够实现精确的相位检索和各向异性相位梯度估计，具有出色的兼容性和泛化能力，为深度学习驱动的定量相位成像提供了一种新的可解释的、基于物理的范例。</jats:p>

title: Full‐Space Radiation‐Reflection‐Integrated Metasurface for Independent Quad‐Channel Wavefront Manipulation
author: Cheng Pang, Qi Ming Wang, Yu Xuan Wang, Ming Yuan Sun, Xinyuan Xu, Yi Bo Wang, Ziang Yue, Ying Han Wang, Yongkang Dong, Yuzhong Wang, Jiaran Qi
summary:
<jats:title>ABSTRACT</jats:title>
                  <jats:p>The radiation‐reflection‐integrated metasurface (RRIM) has emerged as a promising platform for advancing information science and integrated electronic systems by enabling joint control of both radiated and reflected waves. However, existing RRIMs are largely limited to half‐space modulation of the radiation mode (RA‐mode) and reflection mode (R‐mode), with the two modes typically operating under a time‐division scheme across the spectrum. Although mode multiplexing of radiation reflection has been realized, it has not led to a commensurate improvement in system throughput or spectral efficiency. Here, we present a full‐space radiation‐reflection‐integrated metasurface (FRRIM) system realizing independent and simultaneous control of in‐band quad RA‐and R‐modes. The FRRIM is constructed by the structure‐reused circular‐polarization‐sensitive meta‐atom based on hybrid phase mechanisms and the integration design of feeding strip‐line as well as coupling slots. For validation, a FRRIM prototype is designed and fabricated to illustrate the potential of FRRIM for applications in simultaneous transmit and receive communication systems, radar stealth, and full‐space multiplexing holographic devices. The proposed FRRIM configuration, when incorporated into highly integrated systems, achieves a quadrupling of spectral efficiency and a tripling of system throughput, thereby enabling more flexible resource allocation and significantly enhancing the performance of electronic systems.</jats:p>
title_cn: 用于独立四通道波前操纵的全空间辐射反射集成超表面
abstract_cn:
<jats:title>摘要</jats:title>
                  <jats:p>辐射反射集成超表面（RRIM）通过实现辐射波和反射波的联合控制，已成为推进信息科学和集成电子系统的一个有前景的平台。然而，现有的 RRIM 在很大程度上仅限于辐射模式（RA 模式）和反射模式（R 模式）的半空间调制，这两种模式通常在整个频谱的时分方案下运行。尽管辐射反射的模式复用已经实现，但它并没有带来系统吞吐量或频谱效率的相应改进。在这里，我们提出了一种全空间辐射反射集成超表面（FRRIM）系统，实现了带内四 RA 和 R 模式的独立和同时控制。 FRRIM是由基于混合相机制的结构重复使用的圆偏振敏感元原子以及馈电带状线和耦合槽的集成设计构建的。为了进行验证，设计并制造了 FRRIM 原型，以说明 FRRIM 在同步发送和接收通信系统、雷达隐身和全空间复用全息设备中应用的潜力。所提出的FRRIM配置在集成到高度集成的系统中时，可实现频谱效率提高四倍和系统吞吐量提高两倍，从而实现更灵活的资源分配并显着提高电子系统的性能。</jats:p>

title: Optical coherent perfect absorption and amplification in a time-varying medium

title_detail.value: Optical coherent perfect absorption and amplification in a time-varying medium

content.value:
Nature Photonics, Published online: 26 January 2026; doi:10.1038/s41566-025-01833-8

The researchers show that a subwavelength film of indium tin oxide, the bulk permittivity of which is strategically modulated via optical pumping, can be dynamically tuned to act as both a non-resonant amplifier and a perfect absorber. The findings extend the concept of coherent perfect absorption to the temporal domain and may enable coherent manipulation of light in Floquet-engineered complex photonic systems.

title_cn: 时变介质中的光学相干完美吸收和放大
abstract_cn: 研究人员表明，亚波长氧化铟锡薄膜的体积介电常数通过光泵浦进行策略性调制，可以动态调整以充当非谐振放大器和完美吸收器。这些发现将相干完美吸收的概念扩展到时域，并可能在 Floquet 设计的复杂光子系统中实现光的相干操纵。
